4106252.name: The Lost Cryptarch
4106252.description: Master Ives has been avenged. Return to Amanda Holliday to wrap up.

7242309.name: Future War Cult Arsenal
7242309.description: Weapons obtained by working with Future War Cult to prepare for the wars to come.

7242310.name: Future War Cult Arsenal
7242310.description: Weapons obtained by working with Future War Cult to prepare for the wars to come.

7471106.name: Submachine Gun Dexterity
7471106.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Submachine Guns.

7570426.name: Imbalanced Awoken Talisman
7570426.description: Return to Spider with the empowered Awoken talisman.

7570427.name: Inert Awoken Talisman
7570427.description: Return to Spider with the mended Awoken talisman.

8507332.name: Chaotic Exchanger
8507332.description: Resist incoming damage while charging your Void grenade with Chaos Accelerant, Feed the Void, or Handheld Supernova. Charged Void grenades return a random amount of grenade energy on a hit.

10493725.name: The Pyramidion
10493725.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "The Pyramidion."

10653108.name: Lighthouse Engram
10653108.description: An engram signed with a key unique to the Followers of Osiris.

13792278.name: Hitmark IS
13792278.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

13792279.name: Cleanshot IS
13792279.description:
Snapshot sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

15436366.name: Dead Orbit Engram
15436366.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Dead Orbit.

15675613.name: Arcology Engram
15675613.description: Contains a reward for your efforts at the New Pacific Arcology on Titan.

16392701.name: Compact Arrow Shaft
16392701.description:
Thinner arrows to maximize quiver size.
  •  Increases capacity

17342954.name: WANTED: Nariks Reborn
17342954.description: Begin your hunt in the Carrion Pit on Nessus.

18880282.name: Destination Arsenal
18880282.description: Gather materials from resource nodes on any destination.

18880283.name: Destination Calibrated Frame
18880283.description: Craft the destination weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

19580948.name: Meditation: "Spark"
19580948.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

21163175.name: Show 'Em What You Got
21163175.description: Defeat Guardians of other classes in the Crucible.

25692695.name: The Scientific Method
25692695.description: Damaging an opponent temporarily increases speed and handling.

28135787.name: Raid Clan Engram
28135787.description: Contains rewards for your clan's efforts in a raid.

28231458.name: The Infinite, Saved
28231458.description:
A reward for defeating Panoptes and reuniting the two most powerful Warlocks alive.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 5 shaders from Curse of Osiris, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.

28673365.name: Poultry Petting
28673365.description: Even the meekest among us deserve to be cared for.

29194593.name: For Valor
29194593.description: Displays the number of Valor ranks completed across seasons.

31555988.name: Dual Speed Receiver
31555988.description: When aiming down sights, weapon rate of fire slows while weapon damage increases.

32082376.name: Ill-Fortune Cookies
32082376.description: Deliver these cursed yet delicious treats to Petra Venj wherever she can be found in the Reef.

33173512.name: Fossilized Hermaion Blossom
33173512.description: Acquired by completing Nightfall strikes, Trials of the Nine matches, and Vanguard strikes.

34737361.name: Deliciously Cheerful Blueprint
34737361.description: A secret blueprint from Amanda Holliday for the experimental Dawning Cheer Sparrow.

39135514.name: Dreaming City Arsenal
39135514.description: Complete Blind Well Tier 2 or above in the Dreaming City.

39135515.name: Dreaming City Calibrated Frame
39135515.description: Craft the Dreaming City weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

42076730.name: WANTED: Tattered Dusk Captain
42076730.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in the Rift on Nessus.

43190569.name: Enigmatic Package
43190569.description: The Drifter has a special gift for Guardians who dare to reset their Infamy rank twice.

44084248.name: Weapon Stats Armor Mods
44084248.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that slightly enhances the weapon stats of an equipped Kinetic, Energy, or Power weapon. 

Weapon Stats Affected:
Handling
Stability
Reload Speed

44213067.name: Crucible Clan Engram
44213067.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

44980126.name: The Hunter, Avenged
44980126.description:
A reward for avenging the death of Cayde.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from Forsaken, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

46102161.name: Guardian Evaluation
46102161.description: Complete Gambit or Crucible matches with at least one Black Armory weapon equipped.

46155327.name: Who Are You?
46155327.description: Acquire a Gambit Prime bounty from the Drifter.

47981717.name: Opening Shot
47981717.description: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.

48790291.name: Nope
48790291.description: No way, no time, no how.

52780822.name: Balanced Guard
52780822.description: Sword Guard has balanced efficiency and defense.

53159280.name: Traveler's Chosen
53159280.description: A City-made sidearm, built for those chosen by the Traveler to become Guardians.

53480798.name: Experimental Treatment
53480798.description: Search for the Fallen in charge of the enhanced Ether production and dissemination—and eliminate them.

53973468.name: Diligent Invader
53973468.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by defeating opposing Guardians and denying Motes.

53973469.name: Reap'em All
53973469.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by defeating hostile combatants. Stronger hostiles are worth more.

53973470.name: Collect and Conquer
53973470.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by depositing Motes and sending Blockers.

53973471.name: Sentries Hold the Line
53973471.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by killing Blockers, Invaders, and Primevals.

55709132.name: Go to the ramen shop in the Tower.
55709132.description: Go to the ramen shop in the Tower.

60553218.name: Armor
60553218.description: Exclusive armor available only during the Dawning.

60867488.name: "A Garden World"
60867488.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

61430328.name: EDZ Rewards
61430328.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Devrim Kay:

61894963.name: Powerful Hand Cannon Frame
61894963.description:
Forge a Black Armory Hand Cannon from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

62215533.name: (Heroic) Deep Conversation
62215533.description: Failsafe has a plan to retrieve Vex data. But she'll need Ghost's help.

66825403.name: Legendary Engram
66825403.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

67350175.name: Premeditation
67350175.description: Ikora's agents have reported unusual Taken activity on the plateaus of Io. Confirm the intel.

68113745.name: Base Magazine
68113745.description: Original manufacturer's magazine, with no modifications.

71603056.name: Trials of the Nine
71603056.description: Wait for the Trials to begin. They run from Friday to Monday each week.

72250566.name: Prototype Engram
72250566.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 3 customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Warmind. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

75621677.name: Daily: Iron Banner
75621677.description: Complete 3 challenges in the Iron Banner.

75996681.name: Diary 4/5
75996681.description: The module has unlocked another log for "A.Bray." It can be uploaded into Ana's personal server in the Bray facility.

77845419.name: Bow Frame
77845419.description:
Forge a Black Armory Bow from this frame.

This frame is refunded for Modulus Reports on weekly reset.

78248069.name: Mercury Armor
78248069.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Brother Vance on Mercury.

80733336.name: Refurbished Izanami Igniter
80733336.description: Survive waves of Vex while collecting energy.

81214651.name: Weaponize the Unknown
81214651.description:
Your project is going well. The gun is now mechanically sound, but it is simply a gun: it has no intrinsic power of its own. You'll need to reconnect it to the Light somehow, and the vast dark secrets of the Void seem like the most promising route.

Defeat Guardians in the Crucible using Void energy or Hand Cannons. Precision streaks using Void Hand Cannons grant the most efficient progress. Note that progress is multiplied in the Iron Banner or in Competitive Crucible matches.

85720151.name: Forge Ignition
85720151.description: Bring any Black Armory Sniper Rifle frame, Hand Cannon frame, or research frame to the Gofannon Forge to be crafted.

87782468.name: A Gift for the Clan Overseer
87782468.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Hawthorne in the Tower Bazaar.

87986588.name: GB Iron
87986588.description:
Agile iron sights. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

87986589.name: GA Post
87986589.description:
Agile post sights. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

88348293.name: This Is Our Story
88348293.description: Complete a story mission with a linked friend.

88669873.name: Orientation
88669873.description: In the Crucible, defeat opponents with Pulse Rifle final blows.

88669874.name: The Shape of Things to Come

88669875.name: The Candidate
88669875.description: In the Crucible, rapidly defeat opponents in groups of two or more.

88669876.name: Dead Is Dead
88669876.description: In the Crucible, defeat opponents with precision final blows from any Pulse Rifle.

88669877.name: Further Instructions
88669877.description: In the Crucible, defeat opponents with Arc, Solar, and Void final blows.

88669878.name: This Place Is Death
88669878.description: Complete Crucible matches in Quickplay, Rumble, and Competitive modes.

88669880.name: The Beginning of the End
88669880.description: Reset your Valor rank within a single season.

89995072.name: Macro Field Evaluation
89995072.description: Anywhere in the solar system, complete all of the listed activities with at least one Black Armory weapon equipped.

91083144.name: Rocketing to Prominence
91083144.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Rocket Launcher.

94700995.name: Fashion Hero
94700995.description: Upgrade the full Solstice of Heroes Armor Set to Legendary Quality

95528736.name: Onslaught
95528736.description: This weapon's rate of fire increases as you stack Rampage.

95988838.name: Letter Fragment
95988838.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

97626271.name: Echo Mesa, Io Armor
97626271.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Asher Mir on Io.

99849256.name: Radiant Machine Gun Frame
99849256.description: Craft the Black Armory Machine Gun by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

102952779.name: Radiant Auto Rifle Frame
102952779.description: Craft the Black Armory Auto Rifle by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

103219604.name: Omni-Telemetry
103219604.description: Generate Gunsmith telemetry data on any elemental weapon kills.

103312214.name: Shaders
103312214.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.

106909392.name: Tactical Mag
106909392.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size

108922981.name: Speak with Yuna
108922981.description: Yuna from the Mugunghwa Legion wishes to meet you. Find her in the Bazaar.

109636301.name: Candy Dead Ghosts
109636301.description: Deliver these… things to the Spider in his safehouse on the Tangled Shore.

110696975.name: Visit Ana
110696975.description: Ana is waiting for you in BrayTech Futurescape.

114887354.name: His Highness's Seal
114887354.description: Eliminate bosses and complete raid "Leviathan" to acquire Emperor Seals.

119929156.name: Ill-Fortune Cookies
119929156.description: Deliver these cursed yet delicious treats to Petra Venj wherever she can be found in the Reef.

121068895.name: Grandmother Nature
121068895.description: The Revelry has arrived. Visit Eva Levante in the Tower Bazaar to learn more.

126657265.name: Machine Gun Calibrated Frame
126657265.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

127731051.name: Fusion Rifle Scavenger
127731051.description: Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

128980839.name: Ascendant Challenge
128980839.description: "The Awoken have long practiced the art of walking between worlds." —Techeun Kalli

130812797.name: Iron Banner: Season 3
130812797.description: Complete Iron Banner matches during Season 3.

131173969.name: An Ancient Fire
131173969.description: Complete a forge ignition by successfully stoking the forge and eliminating the Forge Warden.

132405572.name: All Alone
132405572.description: It's OK, I'm fine. Everything is fine…

134357953.name: Imperial Engram
134357953.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

136210645.name: Hand Cannon Loader
136210645.description: Increases reload speed of Hand Cannons.

136852797.name: Sleeper Simulant Catalyst
136852797.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

140100789.name: Letter Fragment
140100789.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

141625708.name: Vex Transponder
141625708.description:
This curious Vex device is receiving a signal with a signature close to the one used by the Black Armory.

Defeat Vex anywhere on Nessus to track the signal's origin.

141625709.name: Vex Transponder
141625709.description: The signal is clearer, which narrows down the search area. Destroy Vex Minotaurs in Artifact's Edge, the Hallows, the Glade of Echoes, and Watcher's Grave to calibrate the device further.

141625710.name: Transponder Signal Lost
141625710.description:
The Vex seem to have predicted your movement. The signal has been jammed by a powerful conflux in the Hallows.

Complete a Heroic "Spire Integration" public event to clear the interference.

142871499.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 9
142871499.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

142905935.name: Unidentified Radiant Frame
142905935.description:
The Unidentified Radiant Frame needs to be crafted in the Bergusia Forge.

Complete the quest "Lock and Key" in the EDZ.

143442373.name: Primary Ammo Finder
143442373.description: Increases the drop chance of Primary ammo on kill.

143865280.name: Dead Orbit Engram
143865280.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Dead Orbit.

146432385.name: Classified
146432385.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

146645456.name: WANTED: Pakrion
146645456.description: Begin your hunt in Ancient's Haunt on Nessus.

146851916.name: Gambit Arsenal
146851916.description: Defeat 2 high-value targets in any Gambit match.

146851917.name: Gambit Calibrated Frame
146851917.description: Craft the Gambit weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

148664963.name: Savathûn's Song
148664963.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Savathûn's Song."

149961592.name: Reaper +3
149961592.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

152729412.name: Shaders
152729412.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.

152970995.name: Leviathan Armor
152970995.description: Armor obtained by increasing your reputation with Emperor Calus.

155063974.name: Ikora Rey
155063974.description: With renewed purpose, Ikora has resumed her role as head of Vanguard Research. Find her in the Bazaar and see how she's doing.

157476369.name: Crucible Armor
157476369.description: Armor awarded to Guardians who hone their skills against each other in the Crucible.

158818624.name: A Gift for the Titan Vanguard
158818624.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

159003722.name: The Fall Will Kill You
159003722.description: The MIDA series features several unconventional features. Banshee wants you to get kills with a Submachine Gun while airborne.

159084247.name: Submachine Gun Targeting
159084247.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Submachine Guns.

163476113.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Banshee
163476113.description:
The Gunsmith has been rebooted so many times that he sometimes has trouble keeping things straight. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat Vex Hobgoblins to collect their metal for melting down
- Collect Datalattice from Nessus for Exo-related modifications

164712560.name: Har-Vex-ting Resources
164712560.description: Harvest Datalattice on Nessus or Simulation Seeds on Mercury.

164712561.name: Harvesting from the Hive
164712561.description: Collect resources from Titan or Mars.

164712563.name: Powerful Beyond Belief
164712563.description: Use Power weapons to get 10 multikills.

164712564.name: Cabal Up Close
164712564.description: Use weapons to defeat enemies at close range, and eliminate Cabal.

164712565.name: Burn the Hive
164712565.description: Defeat enemies with Solar damage, and eliminate Hive.

164712566.name: Negate and Vex
164712566.description: Defeat enemies with Void damage, and eliminate Vex.

164712567.name: Shock and Fallen
164712567.description: Defeat enemies with Arc damage, and eliminate Fallen.

164712574.name: Taken… Their Stuff
164712574.description: Collect resources from Io or the Dreaming City.

164712575.name: Fallen Harvest
164712575.description: Collect resources from the EDZ or the Tangled Shore.

167238049.name: An Eververse Bounty
167238049.description: Tess has requested that you complete a bounty from Eververse.

168673710.name: Unflinching Shotgun Aim
168673710.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Shotguns.

169810642.name: Unidentified Frame
169810642.description:
Thanks to the decryption device found in the mysterious box, Ada-1 has discovered instructions for a new Black Armory vessel. There is no indication of what this frame will become.

Complete a rare bounty to collect the Obsidian Crystal needed for the Unidentified Frame.

171346152.name: Festive Falcon Food
171346152.description: Mix Ether Cane and Personal Touch, add Essence of Dawning, then bake.

171346153.name: Crumbly Crucible Crafts
171346153.description: Mix Cabal Oil and Sharp Flavor, add Essence of Dawning, then bake.

174055791.name: New Monarchy Engram
174055791.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of New Monarchy.

176118904.name: Hypervelocity
176118904.description: Equip this weapon ornament to change the appearance of Thunderlord.

176118905.name: Tlāloc's Wrath
176118905.description: Equip this weapon ornament to change the appearance of Thunderlord.

176919422.name: For the Empire
176919422.description: This weapon is Full Auto, does extra damage to Cabal, and penetrates Phalanx shields.

179151460.name: Ornaments and Armor Glows
179151460.description: Ornaments and armor glows used to alter the appearance of your gear. Once obtained, these items may be used and reused by any of your characters.

180108391.name: Dance the Demons Away
180108391.description: This emblem tracks lifetime Motes banked in Gambit.

181523335.name: Stop and Go
181523335.description: Power generators in the Red Legion base are open to attack—but only for a short time. Speed into the subterranean complex and shut them down.

182444936.name: Energy Weapon Loader
182444936.description: Slightly increases reload speed of any equipped Energy weapon.

185321778.name: The Eternal Return
185321778.description: This emblem tracks the number of times you've conquered Dûl Incaru in the Dreaming City.

185873413.name: (Heroic) Thief of Thieves
185873413.description: Recover the supplies that the Fallen have taken.

190322648.name: An Object in Motion
190322648.description: Land final blows using Kinetic weapons in the Crucible.

191363032.name: Crimson Engram
191363032.description: An engram containing different customization options found exclusively during Crimson Days. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

192890964.name: Basic Sword Frame
192890964.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Photonic Power Cells from the Cabal to charge the Weapon Core.

194952921.name: Transmission MS7
194952921.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

194952922.name: Impulse MS3
194952922.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

194952923.name: Signal MS5
194952923.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

196262240.name: Relics of the Golden Age
196262240.description:
Return to Nessus and collect combat data with Drang for Tyra Karn.  Complete the following objectives: 

Objective 1: Defeat multiple Fallen with Drang without reloading 
Objective 2: Defeat a powerful Fallen with Drang

196262241.name: Talk to Tyra Karn
196262241.description: Return to Tyra Karn with the combat data from Nessus.

196262242.name: Relics of the Golden Age
196262242.description: Pick up engrams and defeat Fallen on Nessus with Drang

196262243.name: Talk to the Cryptarch
196262243.description: You've gathered what Cryptarch Rahool has requested. Speak to him at the Tower.

196262246.name: Relics of the Golden Age
196262246.description: Head to Prodromus Down on Nessus with a fireteam and destroy the Servitor Kendriks-7 in the "Quest: Exodus Crash" strike.

196262247.name: Talk to Tyra Karn
196262247.description: Bring the Artifact to Tyra Karn

198570583.name: The Tower
198570583.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants on the Tangled Shore. Complete strike "The Hollowed Lair."

200829441.name: Lightning Rod
200829441.description: Precision kills grant the next shot chain-lightning capabilities.

201365942.name: Archer's Tempo
201365942.description: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.

202670084.name: Full Bore
202670084.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

204822128.name: Celebration Vehicle Bundle
204822128.description:
A bundle for Guardians to celebrate the Solstice of Heroes.

Contains the exclusive Memorium Sol Sparrow, exclusive Thunderwing jumpship, and 10 Solstice of Heroes shaders.

204822129.name: Function Given Form Bundle
204822129.description:
A bundle for Guardians who exemplify elegance amidst brutality.

Contains the Gray Nitrite ornament, three Solstice Engrams, and one Gleaming Boon of the Crucible.

204822130.name: Generosity Bundle
204822130.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know that the best gifts are those given to others.

Contains one Solstice Engram, one Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard, one Gleaming Boon of the Crucible, and one Fireteam Medallion.

204822131.name: Dance Party Bundle
204822131.description:
A bundle for Guardians to get into the celebratory spirit.

Contains the Teamwork Dance emote, three Solstice Engrams, and one Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.

205720007.name: EDZ Engram
205720007.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the European Dead Zone.

208075062.name: Between the Eyes
208075062.description: Land precision final blows in the Crucible.

210236905.name: Baker's Crate
210236905.description:
A large baker's bundle that contains 24 of a random Common ingredient and 12 of a random Rare ingredient.

Its contents, and Eva's Holiday Oven, are only available during this year's Dawning.

210236906.name: Baker's Box
210236906.description:
A baker's bundle that contains 16 of a random Common ingredient and 8 of a random Rare ingredient.

Its contents, and Eva's Holiday Oven, are only available during this year's Dawning.

210236907.name: Baker's Pouch
210236907.description:
A small baker's bundle that contains 8 of a random Common ingredient and 4 of a random Rare ingredient.

Its contents, and Eva's Holiday Oven, are only available during this year's Dawning.

213655744.name: Relics of the Golden Age
213655744.description: This weapon is a relic from the Golden Age. Perhaps there's more to it than it seems? Cryptarch Rahool may have the answer.

214896340.name: Black Armory Badge
214896340.description: A flat badge not unlike a key card. Emblazoned with a symbol.

215373776.name: Ghost Shells
215373776.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.

215596672.name: Giving
215596672.description: You didn't think I'd forget, did you?

216037026.name: "Six"
216037026.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

216781713.name: Häkke Precision Frame
216781713.description: This weapon fires a small auto-tracking missile. Missiles lock onto targets when aimed.

219088948.name: Ghosts and Emotes
219088948.description: Show your love for Crimson Days with these exclusive Ghost shells and emotes.

219731454.name: The Third Wave
219731454.description: Complete the "In Pursuit of Honor" Glory Triumph.

220181790.name: Radiolarian Pudding
220181790.description: Deliver this unfortunate reminder of Asher's past to him in the Rupture on Io.

220687996.name: (Heroic) Siren Song
220687996.description: Disrupt a Hive Ritual to keep the Rig from sinking.

222972384.name: Mysterious Datapad
222972384.description:
A datapad with the following text:

"Our fates are written on the fine parchment of time
A never-ending cyclone of conflict and character
We struggle to find times of stillness in the shrine of peace
And watch for the next new dawn signaling tomorrow
Our eyes drawn to the sky looking for the brightest constellation
That we will shape the coming days with our own hands
And the Black Armory will endure forever."

224198011.name: Trials of the Nine Armor
224198011.description: Armor obtained by competing in the Trials of the Nine.

224423471.name: Armor
224423471.description: Armor for your current class that may be awarded from Bright Engrams.

224985500.name: Sloane
224985500.description: To strike back against the Red Legion, their transmissions need decrypting. Sloane has an idea.

225112743.name: A Gift in Return
225112743.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

226330008.name: Prime Engram
226330008.description: An engram humming with wild energy. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

226807081.name: Union of Strength
226807081.description: Increased resilience when you're in a fireteam with clanmates.

227756207.name: Hard Light
227756207.description: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

235305603.name: A Few More Couldn't Hurt
235305603.description: Now that you've warmed up Eva's Holiday Oven, use the skills you've learned to bake a few more treats.

236077174.name: Masterwork Upgrade
236077174.description: This weapon can be upgraded into a Masterwork with one of the options below.

236888153.name: Complete Activities on Mars
236888153.description: Complete various activities around Mars, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.

236928239.name: Moments of Triumph Shirt
236928239.description: Visit bungie.net to receive your Moments of Triumph shirt code for the Bungie Store.

237827170.name: Speak to Ikora in the Tower.
237827170.description: Speak to Ikora to claim your reward.

239283077.name: Eververse Dawning Gift
239283077.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate this year's Dawning.

240371989.name: Grooving
240371989.description: Turn it up—I love this song!

242794439.name: Reflective Vents
242794439.description: Improved slide. Sliding reflects incoming projectiles. Reflecting projectiles grant Super energy.

243147342.name: Making an Impact
243147342.description: Speak to Zavala in the Tower.

246238708.name: European Dead Zone Armor
246238708.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Devrim Kay in the EDZ.

247725512.name: Rapid Hit
247725512.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.

248465792.name: Powerful Reaper Mote
248465792.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

248465794.name: Weak Reaper Mote
248465794.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

248465795.name: Middling Reaper Mote
248465795.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

249373318.name: Auto Rifle Targeting
249373318.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Auto Rifles and Trace Rifles.

250575297.name: Trials Engram
250575297.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

251578900.name: Cayde's Will
251578900.description: In any Crucible playlist, defeat opponents with precision final blows from any Hand Cannon to collect the biorhythmic data Banshee needs to tune the Ace of Spades to your hand.

253898492.name: Salute of the Lords
253898492.description: "Beneath the branches of our iron tree we reminisce and sing dirges for the lost." —Lady Skorri

254504851.name: Guardian Effects
254504851.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

255804168.name: (Heroic) A Frame Job
255804168.description: Travel deep into enemy territory, ambush the Red Legion, and trick them into retaliating against the Fallen.

257012452.name: Mercury Armor
257012452.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Brother Vance on Mercury.

257827327.name: Offering to the Oracle
257827327.description: A fragment of amethyst, offered in supplication to the mysterious Oracle Engine.

260521462.name: Blowing a Kiss
260521462.description: I could kiss you right now.

265113466.name: Crucible Rewards
265113466.description: Exchange these items for Crucible rewards:

265428940.name: Funky Dance
265428940.description: It's raid night, and we've got this fight.

269888150.name: Swordmaster's Guard
269888150.description: Sword Guard has low efficiency and low defense.

274396160.name: Cold Embrace
274396160.description: Defeat enemies with Void damage anywhere in the system. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396161.name: Bright and Beautiful
274396161.description: Generate Orbs of Light anywhere in the system.

274396162.name: In Your Face
274396162.description: Defeat enemies anywhere in the system with melee damage. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396163.name: A Head Start
274396163.description: Defeat enemies anywhere in the system with precision damage. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396164.name: A Really Bright Light in the Darkness
274396164.description: Defeat enemies with explosion damage anywhere in the system. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396165.name: Stay Sharp
274396165.description: Use Swords to defeat enemies anywhere in the system. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396166.name: Solar Powered
274396166.description: Defeat enemies with Solar damage anywhere in the system. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396167.name: Electricity in the Air
274396167.description: Defeat enemies with Arc damage anywhere in the system. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

274396172.name: A Dawning Sprayer
274396172.description: Defeat enemies anywhere in the system with Submachine Guns, Machine Guns, or Auto Rifles.

275645401.name: Case of Energized Armor Mods
275645401.description: This case is specifically attuned to the subclass of the Guardian who opens it. There are 5 armor mods inside.

275645403.name: Case of Rare Armor Mods
275645403.description: Inside this case are armor mods—items used to enhance high quality gear that are coveted by Guardians.

276754608.name: Nascent Dawn 4/5
276754608.description: After connecting to CB.NAV, the module is requesting Rasputin's Mindlab. Telemetry suggests that it's near Rasputin's doorstep.

276754609.name: Nascent Dawn 4/5
276754609.description: Return the module to Ana. She has another reward for acquiring another of her pre-Collapse logs.

276754610.name: Nascent Dawn 4/5
276754610.description: These modules have become more curious in their queries, as though there was an intelligent entity gathering data through them, testing limits and prodding at boundaries. This one is requesting telemetry on prototype weaponry through CB.NAV; it's yet another data type that the system wasn't designed to handle.

276754611.name: Nascent Dawn 4/5
276754611.description: The module is now requesting data from a Warmind Vault not located on Mars. Currently, the only accessible Vault is the one on Io.

277148541.name: Protocol "Perfected Form"
277148541.description:
Final calibration requires the engagement of a class 6 or greater biological threat. 

Replay the "Will of the Thousands" with an IKELOS weapon equipped.

280464955.name: Firmly Planted
280464955.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.

280625741.name: Powerful Pulse Rifle Frame
280625741.description:
Forge a Black Armory Pulse Rifle from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

281315705.name: White Nail
281315705.description: Higher base precision damage. Rapidly landing three precision hits will refill the magazine.

282561958.name: Radiant Hand Cannon Frame
282561958.description: Craft the Black Armory Hand Cannon by completing a Gofannon Forge ignition on Nessus.

283753645.name: Thinking About Death
283753645.description: Speak to Failsafe at the Exodus Black.

284441163.name: Fossilized Hermaion Blossom
284441163.description: Acquired by completing Nightfall strikes, Trials of the Nine matches, and Vanguard strikes.

285236952.name: The Gateway
285236952.description: The Vex stir on Mercury, and legendary outcast Osiris is involved. Head to the Lighthouse to investigate.

286192928.name: The Corrupted
286192928.description: Help the Drifter track the thief who stole from him. Complete the mission variant of strike "The Corrupted."

290114209.name: Perpetuation
290114209.description: Reduces class ability cooldown when using your class ability.

292110523.name: Diary 1/5
292110523.description: This log came from the old Bray archives. Help Ana rediscover her past by socketing the data into her personal server.

293615869.name: A Jubilant Gift from Eververse
293615869.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the beginning of Revelry.

293917172.name: Strange Parcel
293917172.description: The parcel doesn't say who it's from, but the Postmaster says a sweeper bot dropped it off for you.

299272945.name: Release the Wolves
299272945.description: Defeating an enemy doubles the number of projectiles per burst for a short period of time.

301115145.name: Light Arms Dexterity
301115145.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons, Sidearms, and Submachine Guns.

302952062.name: Acting Bad, Looking Good
302952062.description: Speak to the Drifter in the Tower.

304186389.name: Hand Cannon Targeting
304186389.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Hand Cannons.

306777816.name: The Harder They Fall
306777816.description: Defeat minibosses and bosses in any strike.

306994888.name: Spring Gathering
306994888.description: Complete Heroic public events with the Spring Fever modifier active.

306994889.name: Spring Daily
306994889.description: Complete a daily Heroic mission with the Spring Fever modifier active.

306994890.name: Spring Gambit
306994890.description: Complete a match of Gambit with the Spring Fever modifier active.

306994891.name: Spring Fighting
306994891.description: Complete a Crucible match with the Spring Fever modifier active.

306994894.name: Bountiful Harvest
306994894.description: Earn a bonus chest in the Verdant Forest.

308604177.name: Forge the Weapon
308604177.description: Complete the weapon frame and craft a Black Armory Machine Gun.

308958803.name: Radiant Pulse Rifle Frame
308958803.description: Craft the Black Armory Pulse Rifle by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

310410239.name: Better Already
310410239.description: Your health begins to regenerate immediately after picking up an Orb of Light.

310743553.name: Eververse Gift
310743553.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company, to celebrate the beginning of a new season.

311763085.name: Six
311763085.description: A crashed colony ship, an interspecies war... Cayde-6 got that adventure he wanted. Go save him from it.

311999292.name: Cracked Talisman
311999292.description: Return to the Traveler's Shard in the EDZ to activate your Subclass.

311999293.name: Cracked Talisman
311999293.description: Rekindle your lost abilities by defeating enemies and fighting alongside fellow Guardians in Public Events.

312904089.name: The World
312904089.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants in the European Dead Zone. Complete strike "Lake of Shadows."

313455276.name: Beam Effects
313455276.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

313685908.name: Taken Resurgence
313685908.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Io.

313685909.name: Ignition Unsparked
313685909.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Io.

313685910.name: Traveler's Departure
313685910.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Io.

313685911.name: Asher's Asylum
313685911.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Io.

314467776.name: Basic Machine Gun Frame
314467776.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

314915701.name: A Bounteous Festival
314915701.description: Complete Festival of the Lost daily bounties while the event is active. You will gain bonus progression to Fighting Lion's catalyst by completing this weekly bounty.

315641484.name: WANTED: Thaan'Hul
315641484.description: Begin your hunt at DS Quarters-2 on Titan.

315641487.name: WANTED: Golmuut
315641487.description: Begin your hunt at Cargo Bay 3 on Titan.

316370330.name: Power of Love
316370330.description: Rapidly defeat multiple enemy combatants without reloading.

316370331.name: Bear Hug
316370331.description: Defeat enemies with melee final blows.

317389601.name: Machine Gun Calibrated Frame
317389601.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

320534106.name: Cosmology
320534106.description: Kills with this weapon cause enemy targets to detonate and spawn Void projectiles that track targets.

320680844.name: Momentum Transfer
320680844.description: Causing damage with a grenade reduces your melee cooldown.

324645011.name: Synthesis
324645011.description: Use your new Synthesizer to create a Mote from Synths found in Gambit Prime.

326979294.name: Collector +1
326979294.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

328725000.name: War for the Dreaming City
328725000.description: "Thank you for coming, my friend. I'm always glad to see you." —Petra Venj

329984368.name: Road to Redemption Bundle
329984368.description:
A bundle for Guardians who seek justice for a fallen friend.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, 10 Forsaken-themed shaders, and 500 Bright Dust. Limit one per account.

329984369.name: Master Archer Bundle
329984369.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose aim is always true.

Contains the Author of Devastation ornament, the Corrupt Ether transmat effect, and 3 Bright Engrams. Limit one per account.

329984370.name: Cerebral Bundle
329984370.description:
A bundle for Guardians who seek to expand their mind at any cost.

Contains the Cerebral Explosion emote, a Fireteam Medallion, and 10 shaders. Limit one per account.

329984371.name: Vanguard Dare Bundle
329984371.description:
A bundle for Guardians who want to honor the history of the Hunter Vanguard.

Contains the Tall Tale jumpship, the Credence weapon ornament, and 10 Forsaken-themed shaders. Limit one per account.

329984372.name: Conductive Bundle
329984372.description:
A bundle for Guardians who consider all their options.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Forsaken-themed shaders. Limit one per account.

329984373.name: Awakened Bundle
329984373.description:
A bundle for Guardians who yearn for the land beyond.

Contains the Freyja Ghost Shell, Upward Spiral jumpship, and Roar Defiant Sparrow—all exclusive to this bundle.

330159795.name: Future War Cult Armor
330159795.description: Armor obtained by working with Future War Cult to prepare for the wars to come.

330650351.name: Grenade Launcher Reserves
330650351.description: Increases the amount of Grenade Launcher ammo you can carry.

330748854.name: Scourge of the Armory
330748854.description:
Siviks's syndicate, the Kell's Scourge, is fearless and growing fast. The Fallen are distributing his tainted Black Armory gear everywhere.

Track the origin of the tainted gear by investigating Fallen caches in the EDZ.

332133599.name: Mini Frags
332133599.description:
Grenades are smaller and more compact for easier reloading.
  •  Increases magazine size
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Decreases blast radius

332773068.name: Volatile Launch
332773068.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed

333041308.name: Good Idea
333041308.description: Is there a light on up there?

334168982.name: Iron Banner: Season 1
334168982.description: Collect 10 Iron Banner packages during Season 1.

334865270.name: Legendary Engram
334865270.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

335206715.name: True Devotion
335206715.description: Complete Crimson Day bounties for Lord Shaxx.

344487615.name: Complete Weapon Frames
344487615.description: Succesfully forge multiple weapon frames in the lost forges of the Black Armory.

345644619.name: Crucible Throat Lozenges
345644619.description: These will be critical for keeping Shaxx's energy up during his Crucible duties. Deliver them to him in the Tower Courtyard.

346263927.name: Purification Ritual
346263927.description: Complete the dungeon "The Shattered Throne" while wearing a full Reverie Dawn set and while Ascendant.

346974120.name: Energy Proficiency
346974120.description: Defeat enemies with Arc, Solar, and Void energy while participating in the ignition of a lost forge.

349457197.name: Dead Orbit Engram
349457197.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Dead Orbit.

351326616.name: Energy Weapon Targeting
351326616.description: Slightly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Energy weapons.

351488606.name: Radiant Machine Gun Frame
351488606.description: Craft the Black Armory Machine Gun by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

353785467.name: Prismatic Facet
353785467.description:
A single-use cipher that permits a one-time activation of the Prismatic Matrix during the Season of the Forge.

Max 3 per account. Expires at the end of Season 5.

354401740.name: Assassin's Blade
354401740.description: Sword Kills boost movement speed and damage.

358639470.name: Classified
358639470.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

360593481.name: SRO-52 Ocular
360593481.description:
SUROS ranged combat scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

360593482.name: SRO-41 Ocular
360593482.description:
SUROS threat evaluation. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range

360593483.name: SRO-37 Ocular
360593483.description:
SUROS ranged combat scope. Long zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

366227720.name: Cayde's Will
366227720.description: Eliminate 250 enemies in strikes with a Hand Cannon to collect the biorhythmic data Banshee needs to tune the Ace of Spades to your hand.

367228552.name: Taken Butter
367228552.description:
An ingredient that adds an echoing deliciousness to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

367228553.name: Dark Ether Cane
367228553.description:
An ingredient that adds a darkly sweet aroma to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

367228556.name: Vex Milk
367228556.description:
An ingredient that adds a bit of radiolarian liquid to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

367228557.name: Ether Cane
367228557.description:
An ingredient that adds an ethereal sweetness to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

367228558.name: Cabal Oil
367228558.description:
An ingredient that toughens and thickens up anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

367228559.name: Chitin Powder
367228559.description:
An ingredient that adds a bit of spice to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

368640227.name: Masterworked Holiday Oven
368640227.description: Eva's Holiday Oven has unlocked its true potential, reducing the Essence of Dawning cost for all recipes.

369738735.description: Find and scan discoverables in the European Dead Zone on Earth.

372430833.name: Shock Blast
372430833.description: This weapon fires blasts of high-damage Arc energy that overpenetrates enemies.

375770440.name: Prankster Dance
375770440.description: …and kick and kick and kick and kick…

376092836.name: Compete in the Mayhem Crucible playlist
376092836.description: Enter and complete matches in the Mayhem Crucible playlist.

377183285.name: Jubilant Engram
377183285.description: An engram containing different customization options found exclusively during the Revelry. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

377666359.name: Energy Dexterity
377666359.description: Slightly faster ready and stow speed for Energy weapons.

379434727.name: Nessus Engram
379434727.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Arcadian Valley of Nessus.

379746735.name: Reagent Resourcing
379746735.description: "The Techeuns call for more spell ingredients." —Petra Venj

380517153.name: Bow Calibrated Frame
380517153.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

383973261.name: Casual Sit
383973261.description: A nice casual way to sit.

384759954.name: Bring the Heat
384759954.description: Fusion Grenades now explode on impact and gain increased throw speed.

384759955.name: Burning Fists
384759955.description: Melee kills increase melee damage for a period of time. Additional kills extend duration and increase effects.

388345008.name: Meditation: "Utopia"
388345008.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

388433755.name: Create Armor Mod
388433755.description: Generate a new random Legendary Armor mod by combining components from other mods.

389268985.name: Arc Traps
389268985.description: Grenades stick to surfaces and chain Arc bolts to other mines.

393325292.name: Ephemeral Bundle
393325292.description:
A bundle for Guardians to celebrate the Festival of the Lost.

Contains 3 Ephemeral Engrams, 150 Bright Dust, and 5 Dark Fluorescence shaders.

393325293.name: Misbehaving Bundle
393325293.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who understand the need to keep everyone's spirits up.

Contains the exclusive Prankster Dance emote, the Arachnophile transmat effect, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

393325294.name: Prideglass Bundle
393325294.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who embody the fighting spirit of kings.

Contains the Prideglass ornament for Fighting Lion, 3 Ephemeral Engrams, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.

394885866.name: Super Competitive
394885866.description: Defeat multiple enemies with a single Super while on Mars.

395489854.name: Sniper Rifle Targeting
395489854.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Sniper Rifles.

395873777.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
395873777.description: This strange Vex device appears to help Vex Minds interface with the Infinite Forest.

396594412.name: Show 'Em What You Got
396594412.description: Defeat Guardians of other classes in the Crucible.

398705109.name: Meditation: "Unbroken"
398705109.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

400000184.name: Iron Banner Armor
400000184.description: Armor obtained by honoring the heroes of old in the Iron Banner Crucible tournament.

400542689.name: New Monarchy Arsenal
400542689.description: Weapons obtained by working with New Monarchy to strengthen the Last City.

400542690.name: New Monarchy Arsenal
400542690.description: Weapons obtained by working with New Monarchy to strengthen the Last City.

402952580.name: A Special Offer
402952580.description: The Drifter has requested your presence in the Tower.

409831596.name: Proximity Grenades
409831596.description: Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.

412299646.name: Dancehall
412299646.description: When your space needs some dance in it…

417561408.name: Flash of Inspiration
417561408.description:
Just the right thing at just the right time.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561409.name: Null Taste
417561409.description:
Between the light and the dark lies deliciousness.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561410.name: Perfect Taste
417561410.description:
This flavor will hit the bull's-eye every time.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561411.name: Personal Touch
417561411.description:
A delicious taste achieved by getting up close and personal.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561412.name: Sharp Flavor
417561412.description:
A taste that will cut right through your taste buds.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561413.name: Delicious Explosion
417561413.description:
Sudden and violent. And also tasty.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561414.name: Electric Flavor
417561414.description:
It courses through everything we touch... and taste.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561415.name: Impossible Heat
417561415.description:
Hotter than a Golden Gun on the surface of the sun.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

417561421.name: Bullet Spray
417561421.description:
The more, the merrier.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

420195688.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Asher
420195688.description:
It gets cold on Io, but Asher's often too busy to do anything about it. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat enemies on Titan to harvest Golden Age microfibers
- Collect Phaseglass Spires on Io for temperature-regulating stitching

425148549.name: Weapon Stats Armor Mods
425148549.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that slightly enhances the weapon stats of an equipped Kinetic, Energy, or Power weapon. 

Weapon Stats Affected:
Handling
Stability
Reload Speed

425960662.name: Delayed Gratification
425960662.description: Grenade projectiles will bounce off surfaces. Hold  to fire, and release to detonate.

426147374.name: New Pacific Arcology
426147374.description: Tracks Ghost Scans, Region Chests, and Lost Sectors on Titan.

426557200.name: The Hero We Need
426557200.description: Join and complete Heroic public events all over the system.

426557202.name: Stirring Up the Hive
426557202.description: Engage and defeat challenging Hive enemies.

426557203.name: Through the Crucible
426557203.description: Compete in the Crucible. Wins count more toward this bounty's progress.

426557204.name: Chest Thumping
426557204.description: Loot enemy supply caches anywhere in the system.

426557205.name: I'm Not Sorry, I'm Lost
426557205.description: Enter and complete Lost Sectors all over the system.

426557206.name: High and Mighty
426557206.description: Defeat high-value targets all over the system.

426557207.name: A Guardian's Duty
426557207.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity all over the system.

429106713.name: Striker's Patience
429106713.description: "When a Striker turns her entire body into a projectile, no one is truly safe. And at close quarters, a fist is better than any gun." —Commander Zavala

430361065.name: Unflinching Grenade Launcher Aim
430361065.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Grenade Launchers.

432217080.name: Ornaments
432217080.description: Ornaments used to alter the appearance of your gear, found in Bright Engrams.

432848324.name: Weekly Clan Engrams
432848324.description: Each week, your clan can complete these activities to earn engrams for the entire clan. At least half of your fireteam must belong to your clan. The Crucible Engram and Gambit Engram each require a single win. Visit Hawthorne to receive your rewards.

433323503.name: Enhanced Heavy Lifting
433323503.description: Gain greater bonus Super energy from Power weapon kills.

433633108.name: The Survival Guide
433633108.description:
After investigating the Drifter's Haul, you discovered he has hidden messages around the EDZ for his protégé. One of those tapes could contain the final piece of evidence that you and Aunor need to prove for once and for all that the Drifter is up to no good.

Search the EDZ for Drifter's tapes. One tape can be found near computer consoles in each of the following patrol areas and Lost Sectors: Trostland, Skydock IV, Flooded Chasm, Soujourner's Camp, Excavation Site XII, Winding Cove, and Scavenger's Den.

433757560.name: Shotgun Targeting
433757560.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Shotguns.

435703857.name: Pilgrimage
435703857.description: You've discovered the fabled BrayTech Futurescape. Investigate and search for traces of the Warmind.

445167986.name: The Inner Storm
445167986.description: Get Arc kills in a strike.

445755704.name: Tactic SAS
445755704.description:
Accurate Sidearm sight. 
  •  Slightly increases range

445755705.name: Shortspec SAS
445755705.description:
Balanced Sidearm sight. 
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

445755706.name: Control SAS
445755706.description:
Stable Sidearm sight. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases stability

445755707.name: QuickDot SAS
445755707.description:
Agile Sidearm sight. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability

445755710.name: FarPoint SAS
445755710.description:
Pinpoint Sidearm sight. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Decreases handling speed

445755711.name: Target SAS
445755711.description:
Sharp Sidearm sight.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

446122123.name: Reaper +2
446122123.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

446518837.name: WANTED: Ruined Mind
446518837.description: Begin your hunt in the Aphix Conduit on Io.

448103877.name: "Deep Storage"
448103877.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

448262266.name: Rev It Up
448262266.description: Get on your Sparrow and make it purr.

450241713.name: WANTED: Consul Partisan
450241713.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee in Soriks's Cut on the Tangled Shore.

453272449.name: WANTED: Downpour Captain
453272449.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in the Weep in the EDZ.

454574832.name: Sniper Rifle Frame
454574832.description:
Forge a Black Armory Sniper Rifle from this frame.

This frame is refunded for Modulus Reports on weekly reset.

456408692.name: Middling Collector Mote
456408692.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Collector armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

456408693.name: Weak Collector Mote
456408693.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Collector armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

456408695.name: Powerful Collector Mote
456408695.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Collector armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

456628588.name: Acrius Catalyst
456628588.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

456628589.name: Tractor Cannon Catalyst
456628589.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

459441288.name: Harmonic Laser
459441288.description: Laser damage has three power levels that oscillate while the trigger is held down.

460017080.name: Headseeker
460017080.description: Body shots landed with this weapon increase precision damage for a short time.

463945442.name: Crucible Engram
463945442.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

466087222.name: Smoothbore
466087222.description: Smooth shotgun barrel. Greatly increases range at the cost of more projectile spread.

466796172.name: Vampiric Touch
466796172.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to challenging enemies and trigger health regeneration on precision kills. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Nightmares in the Haunted Forest.

Its perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest. Choosing this upgrade will lock the selected perks on the mask.

466796173.name: Winged Terror
466796173.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to enemies and provide near-invulnerability while airborne. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Nightmares in the Haunted Forest.

Its perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest. Choosing this upgrade will lock the selected perks on the mask.

466796175.name: Energetic Assassin
466796175.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to Nightmares and grant grenade and melee energy on precision kills. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Nightmares in the Haunted Forest.

Its perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest. Choosing this upgrade will lock the selected perks on the mask.

468823416.name: Power Lifting
468823416.description: Get Power weapon multikills on Mercury.

474269988.name: Lightweight Frame
474269988.description: One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher with remote detonation. Hold  to fire, release to detonate.

476020373.name: "Tree of Probabilities"
476020373.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

476961531.name: Base Grip
476961531.description: Original manufacturer's grip, with no modifications.

481338655.name: Shrapnel Launcher
481338655.description: Fires a powerful short-range burst of Solar damage.

481525267.name: A Balanced Sentry Breakfast
481525267.description: Defeat a Primeval in Gambit Prime.

481525269.name: SENTRY: Kill the Messengers
481525269.description: Defeat Primeval envoys in Gambit Prime.

481525270.name: SENTRY: "Security!"
481525270.description: Defeat Blockers in Gambit Prime using fusion rifles, shotguns, or sniper rifles.

481561984.name: Lost Boon Reward
481561984.description: A gift from a generous Guardian that was lost in the mail. The Postmaster deeply regrets the error.

481860150.name: Wish-Dragon Teeth
481860150.description: Increases Tripmine Grenade duration and blast radius. Ability damage grants Tripmine Grenade energy.

481860151.name: Spring-Loaded Mounting
481860151.description: Increases Sidearm ready and reload speed. While you're critically wounded, swapping to a Sidearm increases its damage.

484491717.name: Riskrunner Catalyst
484491717.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

484753719.name: True Devotion
484753719.description: Return to Lord Shaxx for your reward.

489378202.name: A Reasonable Price
489378202.description:
Spider is willing to stop trading with the Drifter… for the right price. He's asking for quite a lot of Glimmer. You're not happy about the arrangement, nor do you trust Spider, but after a quick consultation with Ghost, you both agree it's likely worth it. Spider does keep his word, after all.

Pay off Spider.

490937579.name: Refurbished Izanami Igniter
490937579.description:
The igniter is partially mended, but not yet fully repaired. Collect components to repower the Izanami igniter.

- Blended Ether from Fallen precision multikills
- Condensed Blights from Taken Blights in Lost Sectors on Io
- Radiolarian Vapor from the investigation on Nessus

491353179.name: Iron Engram
491353179.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

493691702.name: Dawning Engram
493691702.description: An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

495506472.name: Radiant Bow Frame
495506472.description: Craft the Black Armory Bow by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

501717180.name: Ionic Return
501717180.description: Breaking an enemy shield transfers one bullet from reserves. Breaking a combatant shield—or the shield of a Guardian using a Super—with that shield's energy type grants bonus damage for the rest of the magazine.

502607996.name: Semi-Charged Awoken Talisman
502607996.description: Absorb Darkness from the tainted Ether in the public event "Ether Harvest," located in Four-Horn Gulch. Defeat three Chieftains and complete the event to progress.

503951839.name: What Is That?!
503951839.description: I've never seen anything like that before!

504984804.name: Trials of the Nine Armor
504984804.description: Armor obtained by competing in the Trials of the Nine.

505348210.name: Izanami Forge Ignitions
505348210.description: Complete ignitions of the lost Izanami Forge on Nessus.

506041342.name: Legendary Engram
506041342.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

507151084.name: Accomplice
507151084.description: Kills with this weapon fill the magazine of the equipped Energy weapon from reserves.

509574340.name: Alkane Dragée Cookies
509574340.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

514613051.name: Light Reactor
514613051.description: Gain bonus Super energy on Fusion Rifle kills.

516022174.name: Mods
516022174.description: Transmat effects and Ghost projections found when you're opening Bright Engrams.

520901579.name: The Midnight Special
520901579.description: A convincing (though non-functional) replica of a fabled weapon.

522919985.name: Unflinching Hand Cannon Aim
522919985.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Hand Cannons.

526809505.name: And Miles to Go Before I Sleep
526809505.description: Amanda Holliday might know more about what you found in Aphix Conduit. Return to the Hangar and speak with her.

527286589.name: Unflinching Kinetic Aim
527286589.description: Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming your Kinetic weapon.

529424730.name: Upgrade Point
529424730.description: Unlock an ability on one of your subclasses.

530754878.name: Luxurious Toast
530754878.description: Life's good when you make friends.

530968313.name: Cool, Dude
530968313.description: Who is as cool as you? No one, that's who.

534009071.name: Dark Weapon Core
534009071.description: Speak to the Drifter at the Tower.

535212982.name: Sentries Hold the Line
535212982.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by killing Blockers, Invaders, and Primevals.

536311848.name: Aeon Energy
536311848.description:
Throwing grenades grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Barricade energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.

537635903.name: WANTED: Arcane Mind
537635903.description: Begin your hunt in the Cistern on Nessus.

537756633.name: Faction Rally: Nessus
537756633.description: Earn faction tokens by looting a Lost Sector cache on Nessus with at least 3x Renown.

539926283.name: MERCURY REWARDS
539926283.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Brother Vance.

540603118.name: Ludomaniacal
540603118.description: Earned by performing an Infamy rank reset three times in a single season.

540603119.name: Primeval Prime
540603119.description: You can find this rare drop when killing the Malfeasance boss in a Gambit match.

542328999.name: Ascendant Challenge
542328999.description: "The Awoken have long practiced the art of walking between worlds." —Techeun Kalli

546212857.name: Hope
546212857.description: Master Luna's Howl by using it to defeat opponents in the Competitive playlist.

546936951.name: Fusion Rifle Loader
546936951.description: Increases reload speed of Fusion Rifles.

548249507.name: Sentry +2
548249507.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

552724561.name: Engine Key
552724561.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Engine location aboard the Leviathan.

552813909.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 1
552813909.description:
Two siblings cleaved by time and space, reflections never found alone,
The ending of the eldritch race—a path long seen but never known.

554078784.name: Zoom 30 Focus
554078784.description:
Powerful scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

554078785.name: Zoom 10 Point
554078785.description:
Balanced scope. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

558167586.name: The Season of Giving
558167586.description: Deliver holiday treats to recipients all over the system.

560373164.name: EDZ Engram
560373164.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the European Dead Zone.

561964760.name: Future War Cult Armor
561964760.description: Armor obtained by working with Future War Cult to prepare for coming battles.

567019172.name: Ornaments
567019172.description: Ornaments used to alter the appearance of your gear, found in Bright Engrams.

568667342.name: Fusion Rifle Dexterity
568667342.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Fusion Rifles.

569940092.name: Fireworks
569940092.description: Guardians don't need to ignite their Light to shine.

570362378.name: The Ruckus
570362378.description: An intact seedmind recovered from a Warmind complex on Jupiter.

571267712.name: Prismatic Inferno
571267712.description: Fires a Solar trace beam and generates a damaging heat field that grows while the weapon continues to fire.

573818232.name: Meyrin Tribute
573818232.description: Pay homage to the Black Armory's French heritage by defeating enemies with Bows, Submachine Guns, and Hand Cannons.

573818233.name: Satou Tribute
573818233.description: Pay homage to the Black Armory's Japanese heritage by defeating enemies with Swords, Sniper Rifles, and Bows.

573818234.name: Rasmussen Tribute
573818234.description: Pay homage to the Black Armory's Norse heritage by defeating enemies with Power weapons and Shotguns.

575899202.name: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
575899202.description:
You've chosen to steer clear of the Drifter. You should probably tell your new friend Aunor…

Find a terminal in the Tower Hangar where you can compose an encrypted message.

575899203.name: A Message of Solidarity
575899203.description:
Aunor is one of the Hidden, a covert group of Guardians who gather sensitive intelligence. You've heard rumors that they're embedded on just about every active Vanguard front, including the Tower. With your message in hand, you begin to look around, hoping to find one of them. Maybe they can get your message to Aunor.

Find the Hidden agent in the Tower Hangar to drop off your message.

576420065.name: Classified
576420065.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

578479277.name: Spotlight Effects
578479277.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

583960569.name: The Runner
583960569.description: Stop a Cabal simulation carrying heavily encrypted data.

588594999.name: Moving Target
588594999.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.

591998629.name: Ability Cooldown Armor Mods
591998629.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that decreases the cooldown of one Arc, Solar, or Void subclass ability.

Abilities Affected:
Grenade
Melee
Class Ability

592058843.name: Terminator
592058843.description: Multiple times, defeat 20 enemies without dying.

592058844.name: Careful Collector
592058844.description: Deposit three times as many Motes as you lose in a Gambit match. You must deposit at least 36 Motes.

592058845.name: Kill the Mood
592058845.description: As a fireteam, deny Motes from enemy Guardians.

592058846.name: First to the Fight
592058846.description: Be the first to summon a Primeval in a round of Gambit.

593361144.name: Wraithmetal Mail
593361144.description: Dodging reloads all weapons and increases both movement and weapon handling speeds for a brief time.

593361146.name: Synapse Junctions
593361146.description: Quick successive attacks with Arc Staff increase its damage output and duration.

593361147.name: Probability Matrix
593361147.description: Increases the chaining capabilities of Arc Bolt Grenade and has a chance to recharge it each time it deals damage. A full chain always recharges.

594640136.name: Hive Infestation
594640136.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Titan.

594640137.name: Golden Age Tarnished
594640137.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Titan.

594640138.name: Utopia Lost
594640138.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Titan.

594640139.name: Sloane's Watchtower
594640139.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Titan.

595829387.name: Cross Counter
595829387.description: Using your Arc melee ability or being hit by a melee attack will allow you to follow up with an extremely powerful melee counterpunch that will heal you.

599007201.name: Enduring Guard
599007201.description: Sword Guard has high efficiency and low defense.

601624723.name: Recharged the Forge
601624723.description: A reward for completing the Black Armory campaign.

603975123.name: Festival of the Lost… Sector
603975123.description: With your Festival of the Lost mask on, eliminate everything you see in the Sanctum of Bones.

611647505.name: Arcology Engram
611647505.description: Contains a reward for your efforts at the New Pacific Arcology on Titan.

611825400.name: A Friend in Need...
611825400.description: Eva Levante has given you the gift of her treasured family oven. Use it, along with the ingredients she's given you, to create a gift for Commander Zavala.

611825401.name: ...Is a Friend, Indeed
611825401.description: You've successfully used Eva's Holiday Oven to bake a batch of Gjallardoodles. Take them to Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

611825402.name: An Old Friend
611825402.description: Eva Levante, former Guardian outfitter and now event vendor, has returned to the Tower after a long absence. Go welcome her back.

611825406.name: To Grandmother's House We Go
611825406.description: Now that you've delivered the Gjallardoodles to Zavala, return to Eva Levante in the Tower Bazaar.

615063266.name: Graviton Lance Catalyst
615063266.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

615063267.name: Vigilance Wing Catalyst
615063267.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

621701973.name: Aggressively Affirmative
621701973.description: For times when subtlety is a poor way to express oneself.

626649506.name: Classified
626649506.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

630329983.name: Ride the Bull
630329983.description: Increased rate of fire and recoil while you're holding down the trigger. Kills with this weapon reload a portion of the magazine.

640003411.name: Thunderstruck
640003411.description: Land Arc final blows in the Crucible.

644399444.name: Meditation: "Six"
644399444.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

645764324.name: Speak with Arach Jalaal
645764324.description: To celebrate, Dead Orbit offers Guardians a Legendary Weapon.

646467119.name: Prime Engram
646467119.description: An engram humming with wild energy. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

647617635.name: Memento Mori
647617635.description: Reloading after a kill loads magazine with a few extra-damage bullets. Grants radar while aiming down sights.

650933953.name: Serpent's Strike
650933953.description: Show that they can't kill what they can't catch.

651589282.name: For the Vanguard
651589282.description: Get multiple kills in quick succession with a single weapon type.

653948914.name: SUROS Regime
653948914.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

653974707.name: Meditation: "Hijacked"
653974707.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

656200654.name: Conserve Momentum
656200654.description: Non-lethal hits with projectiles make this weapon charge faster until its wielder gets a kill.

657870035.name: Exotic Engram
657870035.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

658317088.name: Skyburner Catalyst
658317088.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

663495154.name: Model 8 Red
663495154.description:
Red-dot. Medium zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range

663495155.name: Model 6 Loop
663495155.description:
Red-dot. Medium zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

666925997.name: Javelin Mooncake
666925997.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

667826789.name: Pulse Rifle Alpha Frame
667826789.description:
An uncalibrated Pulse Rifle frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills and defeat Scorn with Pulse Rifles to start the calibration.

670437048.name: Reaping for the Vanguard
670437048.description: Reaper bounty. Defeat multiple enemies without dying during Vanguard strikes.

670437049.name: Reaping in the Wilds
670437049.description: Reaper bounty. Defeat high-value targets in patrol zones throughout the system.

670437051.name: REAPER: Reaping Swiftly
670437051.description: Reaper bounty. Rapidly defeat three or more enemies.

670437052.name: REAPER: Reaping with the Basics
670437052.description: Reaper bounty. Defeat enemies with primary weapons.

670437053.name: REAPER: Reaping in the Crucible
670437053.description: Reaper bounty. Defeat Guardians in the Crucible.

670437054.name: REAPER: Reaping in Lost Sectors
670437054.description: Reaper bounty. Defeat Lost Sector bosses throughout the system.

670437055.name: REAPER: Reaping Precisely
670437055.description: Reaper Bounty. Defeat elite enemies with precision or ability final blows.

673846245.name: Invigoration
673846245.description: Reduces melee cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Light.

677253260.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
677253260.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

678325266.name: Basic Hand Cannon Frame
678325266.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in Artifact's Edge or the Hallows on Nessus.
- Obtain Unstable Radiolaria from the Vex to charge the Weapon Core.

679077872.name: Rifle Scope SSF
679077872.description:
Focused scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

679077873.name: Rifle Scope ST
679077873.description:
Ranged scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

679225683.name: Light Mag
679225683.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range

681798703.name: Basic Auto Rifle Frame
681798703.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.
