- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Photonic Power Cells from the Cabal to charge the Weapon Core.

682132521.name: Letter Fragment
682132521.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

682927195.name: Brightest Day
682927195.description: Generate Orbs of Light in the Crucible.

685299502.name: Charge of Light—Tier I
685299502.description:
The Light barely radiates from this object, but it's there.

This offering to the Blind Well will provide a small charge to the mechanism.

685751430.name: Super Destructive
685751430.description: Get Super kills in the EDZ.

685908770.name: Exotic Engram
685908770.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

687509824.name: WANTED: Devourer Darg
687509824.description: Begin your hunt in Skydock IV in the EDZ.

687509827.name: WANTED: Fortifier Yann
687509827.description: Begin your hunt in the Quarry in the EDZ.

689005463.name: Accelerated Coils
689005463.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage

691278431.name: Crimson Engram
691278431.description:
An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

It will almost certainly contain a new reward when decrypted until you've received them all.

692480988.name: Bow Calibrated Frame
692480988.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

699693452.name: Vengeance
699693452.description: Marks the enemy that dares to damage you. Track down and destroy your enemy for increased damage and overshield.

699706967.name: Submachine Gun Scavenger
699706967.description: Submachine Guns get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

704714725.name: Dead Orbit Arsenal
704714725.description: Armor obtained by working with Dead Orbit in their mission to push beyond the solar system.

705879203.name: Radiant Bow Frame
705879203.description: Craft the Black Armory Bow by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

706346979.name: The Bits
706346979.description: A live Ghost, held in an anti-transmat cage. He pleads for release.

706527188.name: Quickdraw
706527188.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.

707001742.name: Create Weapon Mod
707001742.description: Generate a new random Legendary Weapon mod by combining components from other mods.

710247990.name: Cache It In
710247990.description: Loot the cache in the Aphix Conduit, a Lost Sector in the Rupture on Io.

710811084.name: Key to the Dreaming City
710811084.description: Petra gave you a talisman that will allow you to enter the Dreaming City. Inspect it in your inventory to begin a quest to mend and charge it.

711349203.name: Seasonal Eververse Gift
711349203.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the beginning of a new season.

712894439.name: Speak with Executor Hideo
712894439.description: To celebrate, New Monarchy offers Guardians a Legendary Weapon.

715195141.name: Precision Frame
715195141.description: Compound bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage. Press  while drawn to cancel the shot.

717228034.name: Gunsmith Engram
717228034.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

718136887.name: Bureaucratic Walk
718136887.description: Please be advised, you must file form 7C and 9D upon each use.

719393360.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
719393360.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

720094037.name: Vanguard Calibrated Frame
720094037.description: Prototype the Vanguard weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

722862450.name: Dearly Departed
722862450.description: Grants Rift energy when you are critically wounded. On your death, creates a healing rift on your corpse.

728658049.name: Io Rewards
728658049.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Asher Mir:

732003810.name: WANTED: Prince of Yul
732003810.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee in the Jetsam of Saturn on the Tangled Shore.

732830231.name: Cache It In
732830231.description: Loot the cache in DS Quarters-2, a Lost Sector on the Rig on Titan.

733863419.name: The First Blacksmith
733863419.description:
You forged your first Black Armory weapon.

Visit Ada-1 and show her what you've accomplished.

735778136.name: Arrow Scavenger
735778136.description: Bows get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

737144025.name: Outreach
737144025.description: Reduces melee cooldown when using your class ability.

739119594.name: Inner System Tour
739119594.description: Complete public events and destination bounties throughout the system. Grants Power 640 gear on completion.

740915223.name: Recycle Mote
740915223.description: Dismantle a Mote back into its component parts.

746294253.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 2
746294253.description:
To Tower comes a war in red; an orphan sounds the empire's call.
Mortal angels mourn the dead while lightless light wraps night in pall.

747611419.name: Traveler Donut Holes
747611419.description: Deliver these unknowable alabaster spheres to Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar.

748466513.name: Black Market Deals
748466513.description:
Drifter tells you he regularly does business with the Spider. Spider is all too happy to supply Drifter's scams with equipment and fresh fodder, and he has a fresh shipment waiting for pick up. "Ask him for 'the jerky,'" Drifter tells you, winking.

Visit Spider in the Tangled Shore.

749131423.name: A Gift in Return
749131423.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

750462461.name: Corsair Down
750462461.description: The fieldcom device crackles weakly. You can just hear an encoded SOS, repeating something about a chamber.

753747952.name: Powerful Reaper Mote
753747952.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

753747954.name: Weak Reaper Mote
753747954.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

753747955.name: Middling Reaper Mote
753747955.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

754979844.name: Dead Orbit Armor
754979844.description: Armor obtained by working with Dead Orbit in their mission to push beyond the Solar System.

757817572.name: Wish-Ender
757817572.description: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

761839504.name: Future War Cult Engram
761839504.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Future War Cult.

762093713.name: Hijacked
762093713.description: Hunt down a Vex Mind that can read your map of the Infinite Forest and point the way to Panoptes.

764258026.name: Radiolarian Pudding
764258026.description: Deliver this unfortunate reminder of Asher's past to him in the Rupture on Io.

767484756.name: 9RECT Telescopic
767484756.description:
Powerful scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

767484757.name: 50VAL Telescopic
767484757.description:
Agile, snappy scope. Short zoom.
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

767759986.name: A Darker Path
767759986.description:
You defeated the Hive weapon master thanks to a mysterious gift, the Last Word.

What would the Drifter say about that?

768801226.name: Chitin Powder
768801226.description:
An ingredient that adds a bit of spice to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

769440797.name: Colony Catalyst
769440797.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

769740913.name: Operation… Oboe?
769740913.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Exodus Crash."

769740914.name: Better Failsafe Than Sorry
769740914.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Exodus Crash."

769740915.name: Operation Piccolo
769740915.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Exodus Crash."

769823713.name: "The Gateway"
769823713.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

770396946.name: A Deadly Trial
770396946.description: Brother Vance says there's a Temple of Osiris in the EDZ where you can revive Sagira.

770480324.name: Speak with Lakshmi-2
770480324.description: To celebrate, Future War Cult offers Guardians a Legendary Weapon.

771233414.name: Sword Calibrated Frame
771233414.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

771273473.name: Charge of Light—Tier III
771273473.description:
You can feel the energy contained within radiating from the orb.

This offering to Blind Well will provide a large charge to the mechanism.

772498175.name: Avenger
772498175.description: Land the final blow on a player who just defeated one of your teammates in the Crucible.

773524094.name: Unknown
773524094.description: This entry's data signature is obscured.

774438828.name: (Heroic) Red Legion, Black Oil
774438828.description: Destroy the dark liquid that the Cabal use to power their technology or contaminate it, for a subtler approach.

774885924.name: Bountiful Bounties
774885924.description: Complete daily and weekly Black Armory bounties.

776878384.name: Fallen Pillage
776878384.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Nessus.

776878385.name: Leviathan's Feast
776878385.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Nessus.

776878386.name: Machine Centaur
776878386.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Nessus.

776878387.name: Failsafe's Prison
776878387.description: You can find this rare emblem only  in chests hidden on Nessus.

776943948.name: Data Requisition
776943948.description: Chase the Fallen out of a control center.

777354830.name: Warmind's Glory
777354830.description:
Rasputin's curiosity grows. He predicts IKELOS weapons will be highly effective in dangerous operations.

Complete strikes with an IKELOS weapon equipped.

777637181.name: Play with Your Prey
777637181.description: The Void rocket suppresses enemies. The Solar rocket causes damage over time.

779733263.name: Black Armory Curator
779733263.description: Speak with Ada-1, the curator of the Black Armory.

780479660.name: A Fabled Reward
780479660.description: Contains seasonal rewards for Guardians who have achieved Fabled status in Glory Ranks.

780760217.name: Crimson Engram
780760217.description:
An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

It will almost certainly contain a new reward when decrypted until you've received them all.

782362349.name: Legendary Engram
782362349.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

785442930.name: Eye for an Eye
785442930.description: This emblem tracks the number of times you've defeated a Scorned Baron.

786080622.name: Unrelenting
786080622.description: Kill multiple enemies in a strike without dying.

786290400.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290400.description: "OK, all I can give you to go on in this one is… it's high up. So… look up, I guess? Don't look at me like that, I'm doing my best.” —Cayde-6

786290401.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290401.description: "I've been all around this system, seen all sorts of transports, but nothing with the resiliency of this old Golden Age rustbucket I found in the EDZ. Used it as a grab-and-go spot for years." —Cayde-6

786290402.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290402.description: "I used to have this old lookout. Scoped out my first FWC bunker there. Just like the Cabal to plop that eyesore of a base right on top of a piece of dark age nostalgia. Do me a favor, if you make it up there: snipe a few rhinos for me." —Cayde-6

786290403.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290403.description: "I tell you what. You get to work cleaning out the angry spider-pirates and space-rhinos, and I give you the deed to this little cabin I won from Ren. With a little work, could become a nice little getaway." —Cayde-6

786290404.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290404.description: "So I took off edging the cliff, Golden Gun down to one shot. Left a lot behind cliffside. Bad day." —Cayde-6

786290405.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290405.description: "So after a full day of pulling loot out of the Fallen's hands, I thought I would just cool my engines down by that old river, but as soon as I cached it all up down there, a Servitor shows up." —Cayde-6

786290406.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290406.description: "You know, I used to think if it's marked a dead zone, it's my kind of place. Vanguard cured me of that, but I left plenty behind there back in the day. Third-floor balcony, above the alley.  Loved that spot…. Hope the Fallen haven't got to it." —Cayde-6

786290407.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290407.description: "You do much driving? Me neither. But I used to spend nights hiding out near this truck just teetering on a ledge, just waiting for the day some dumb Dreg would send it over the ledge. That day never came." —Cayde-6

786290414.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290414.description: "This place is full of old containers. Don't bother raiding them all—I already did. They're all filled with shoes. Mountains of Golden Age footwear, and not a thing in my size." —Cayde-6

786290415.name: EDZ Treasure Map
786290415.description: "So once you get up there, don't be afraid to strut it on the catwalk. We both know the importance of looking good." —Cayde-6

787279094.name: Eververse Gift
787279094.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company, to celebrate the beginning of a new season.

788338850.name: Crucible Gear (Past Seasons)
788338850.description: Weapons, armor, and shaders from previous seasons' Crucible sets.

790090923.name: Machine Gun Scavenger
790090923.description: Machine Guns get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

791862061.name: Assault Mag
791862061.description:
This shotgun's magazine is optimized for quick combat.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases rate of fire

792225296.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 1
792225296.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

792805315.name: Ornaments
792805315.description: Ornaments used to alter the appearance of your gear, found in Bright Engrams.

793340711.name: MERCURY REWARDS
793340711.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Brother Vance.

793651913.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
793651913.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

796709346.name: Auto Rifle Calibrated Frame
796709346.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

797309301.name: WANTED: Qeldron, Keeper
797309301.description: Begin your hunt in the Grove of Ulan-Tan on Io.

798882585.name: WANTED: Irxis Partisan
798882585.description: Begin your hunt in the Gulch in the EDZ.

799325325.name: Synthesize Powerful Mote
799325325.description:
Insert Synths to create a synthesized Mote for use in the Reckoning.

Synths can be found when playing Gambit Prime.

Synths are consumed once inserted, so choose wisely.

799325326.name: Synthesize Middling Mote
799325326.description:
Insert Synths to create a synthesized Mote for use in the Reckoning.

Synths can be found when playing Gambit Prime.

Synths are consumed once inserted, so choose wisely.

799325327.name: Synthesize Weak Mote
799325327.description:
Insert Synths to create a synthesized Mote for use in the Reckoning.

Synths can be found when playing Gambit Prime.

Synths are consumed once inserted, so choose wisely.

799466837.name: Iron Banner Armor
799466837.description: Armor obtained by honoring the heroes of old in the Iron Banner Crucible tournament.

799898425.name: Overnight Dance
799898425.description: Let me spell it out for you.

802197314.name: Inner Light
802197314.description: Land Super final blows in the Crucible.

802464007.name: Vanguard Tactician Armor
802464007.description: Armor obtained by carrying out special operations for Zavala.

804692548.name: Elegant Weaponry
804692548.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Sword.

804749934.name: Legendary Shards
804749934.description: Remnants of powerful items. Used to improve gear or trade for other items.

806159697.name: Trench Barrel
806159697.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, handling, and reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

806997698.name: SUROS Rapid-Fire
806997698.description: Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

807877700.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
807877700.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

809345546.name: Devil Scope D2
809345546.description:
Vicious scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

809345547.name: Dusk Scope D2
809345547.description:
Far scope. Long zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

809542668.name: Bullet Spray
809542668.description:
The more, the merrier.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

810623803.name: Charge of Light—Tier II
810623803.description:
This object hums with the power of the Light.

This offering to the Blind Well will provide a medium charge to the mechanism.

811715412.name: Exotic Engram
811715412.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

812086938.name: Meditation: "A Deadly Trial"
812086938.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

812926911.name: Omega
812926911.description: Enter the Infinite Forest and defeat Panoptes now, before a Vex victory becomes inevitable.

814073777.name: Corsair Down
814073777.description: The fieldcom device crackles weakly. You can just hear an encoded SOS, repeating something about a spine — and mist.

814448788.name: Thank You
814448788.description: A little appreciation goes a long way.

814933120.name: Get Up
814933120.description: Got any fight left in you?

818211479.name: Shattering Blade
818211479.description: If your heavy attack consumes the last of your ammo, it deals significantly increased damage. Excludes aerial attacks.

819191764.name: Mask Upgrade
819191764.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

819191765.name: Mask Upgrade
819191765.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

819191767.name: Mask Upgrade
819191767.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

821844118.name: Solstice Engram
821844118.description: A engram containing different customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Warmind. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

824488952.name: Seriously, Watch Out
824488952.description: Grants an overshield when you're sprinting at full health with Seismic Strike, Hammer Strike, or Shield Bash equipped. Hits with these abilities recharge a portion of your melee energy.

827893076.name: Rise to the Challenge
827893076.description: Complete any available daily or weekly challenges.

829949987.name: Weapon Ornaments
829949987.description: Your favorite weapons will inspire new bonds everywhere when they're customized with these Crimson Days–exclusive ornaments.

830282363.name: Phase Magazine
830282363.description:
Increases damage while lowering rate of fire.
  •  Decreases magazine size

833036833.name: Hand Cannon Reserves
833036833.description: Increases the amount of Hand Cannon ammo you can carry.

833189222.name: Another Lost Forge
833189222.description:
The scan of Siviks's Black Armory crates revealed the true origin of the tainted gear: a second Black Armory forge.

Explore an uncharted location on Nessus and locate the lost forge.

835231335.name: The Runner
835231335.description: Stop a Cabal simulation carrying heavily encrypted data.

836440374.name: Cayde's Will
836440374.description: Cayde's personal cache is on Titan. Fight your way back into the Arcology to claim the parts you need to repair the Ace of Spades by completing mission "Ace in the Hole."

836583820.name: Aggressive Frame
836583820.description: Powerful, heavy swings. Use  to launch a slam attack.

837266425.name: Bullet Locket
837266425.description: Inside this intricately crafted piece of jewelry are artifically recreated memories of Banshee's past. Bring it to him in the Tower Courtyard.

837532412.name: A Visit to Command
837532412.description: Sloane needs your help with the Fallen

839105230.name: Arrowhead Brake
839105230.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed

840062994.name: Crucible Calibrated Frame
840062994.description: Craft the Crucible weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

840062995.name: Crucible Arsenal
840062995.description: Capture 10 Control Zones in any Crucible match.

840314649.name: Visit Brother Vance
840314649.description: Tell Brother Vance about the rift of Light you found in the Infinite Forest.

840802057.name: Grenadier
840802057.description: Get grenade kills in the EDZ.

842062068.name: Untangling the Shore
842062068.description: Clear out Lost Sectors on the Tangled Shore.

842157716.name: Cradle of Invention
842157716.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in Hellas Basin.

842157717.name: Warmind's Fortress
842157717.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in Hellas Basin.

842157718.name: Relic of the Golden Age
842157718.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in Hellas Basin.

842157719.name: Wormslayer
842157719.description: This rare emblem is awarded by opening both Golden Age vaults in Hellas Basin.

843807934.name: Basic Sniper Rifle Frame
843807934.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in Artifact's Edge or the Hallows on Nessus.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

844527243.name: Class Sigil Effects
844527243.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

846801292.name: Unflinching Pulse Rifle Aim
846801292.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Pulse Rifles.

852209214.name: Polymer String
852209214.description:
Unbreakable bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly faster draw time

853243130.name: Radiant Bow Frame
853243130.description: Craft the Black Armory Bow by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

854794537.name: Enhanced Unflinching Sniper Aim
854794537.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Sniper Rifles.

861489047.name: Vermin
861489047.description: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.

862848869.name: Polymer Grip
862848869.description:
This weapon's grip is made of lighter material.
  •  Increases handling speed

865296439.name: Ice and Shadow
865296439.description: A friendly Guardian has requested assistance on Mars. Help her investigate falling Warsats and battle a new threat.

866047521.name: Shaders and Mods
866047521.description: These shaders and mods—in the colors of roses, love, and other bonds—capture the spirit of this year's Crimson Days celebrations.

866518141.name: Grenade Launcher Scavenger
866518141.description: Grenade Launchers get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

868818182.name: First of Many
868818182.description: Reach Glory rank "Brave" within a season.

870041067.name: Popcorn
870041067.description: "I can't believe what I'm seeing!" —Lord Shaxx

871309441.name: Victory Taunt
871309441.description: The Fallen have some good taunts.

871673916.name: Audience with the Queen
871673916.description: Present an Offering to the Oracle Engine.

871833747.name: Mercurial Luck
871833747.description: Chance to receive an additional Simulation Seed when one is collected on Mercury.

871870994.name: Gunsmith Engram
871870994.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

874877120.name: Watch Your Back
874877120.description: It's your neck on the line, pal.

877194565.name: Rifle Dexterity
877194565.description: Faster ready and stow speed for all Rifle-class weapons.

878286503.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
878286503.description: Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

882903532.name: Powerful Invader Mote
882903532.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

882903534.name: Weak Invader Mote
882903534.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

882903535.name: Middling Invader Mote
882903535.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

887717589.name: Hand Cannon Calibrated Frame
887717589.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

887726843.name: FLASHPOINT: TANGLED SHORE: COMPLETE
887726843.description: Visit the Spider for a reward.

889772445.name: Arcadian Valley, Nessus Armor
889772445.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Failsafe on Nessus.

893502917.name: A Garden World
893502917.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "A Garden World."

893526892.name: ATA Scout
893526892.description:
Light sniper scope. Short zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

893526893.name: ATC Rex
893526893.description:
Combat sniper scope. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases range

893526894.name: ATB Long Range
893526894.description:
Long-distance Häkke scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range 
  •  Decreases handling speed

893526895.name: ATD Raptor
893526895.description:
Standard sniper scope. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range 
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

895140517.name: Precision Frame
895140517.description: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

896596804.name: Throwing Shade
896596804.description: Land Void final blows in the Crucible.

897181301.name: Rapid Cooldown
897181301.description: Increased grenade, melee, and dodge regeneration while sprinting. Dodging increases your sprint speed.

897976571.name: Javelin Mooncake
897976571.description: Deliver this reminder of home to Ana Bray in the BrayTech Futurescape on Mars.

901125364.name: Machine Gun Reserves
901125364.description: Increase the amount of Machine Gun ammo you can carry.

902582719.name: Mysterious Box
902582719.description: An ornate box with four locks. Each lock has a different symbol emblazoned on it: a hand, a butterfly, a fishhook, and a Black Armory insignia.

902869770.name: "Fury"
902869770.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

903864129.name: Overnight Dance
903864129.description: Let me spell it out for you.

904793538.name: The Lost Cryptarch
904793538.description: The Festival of the Lost is keeping everyone's spirits up, but something is clearly bothering Amanda Holliday. Pay her a visit to see how you can help.

908147344.name: Sneak Bow
908147344.description: Increases hold time and reload speed while crouched.

909409630.name: Speak with Tess in the Tower
909409630.description: To celebrate your victory over Xol, Tess Everis has a gift for you in the Tower.

911046884.name: Condor SS2
911046884.description:
Lightweight sniper sight. Medium zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

911046885.name: Yepaki SS2
911046885.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

911046886.name: Aquila SS4
911046886.description:
Omolon imaging technology. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range

911046887.name: Corvo SS2
911046887.description:
Omolon ocular technology. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

911695907.name: Collector +2
911695907.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

912222548.name: Soldier On
912222548.description: Earned by completing the "Season 5: Nightfall" Triumph.

914894006.name: Legendary Engram
914894006.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

918511364.name: Spread the Wealth
918511364.description: Gain additional Glimmer when looting engrams.

918679156.name: Precision Frame
918679156.description: Fires a single-slug round. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

918847750.name: Crucible Engram
918847750.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

920755188.name: Telesto Catalyst
920755188.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

921281661.name: WANTED: Student of Beltrik
921281661.description: Begin your hunt near the Exodus Black on Nessus.

924149234.name: Fighting Lion Catalyst
924149234.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

924149235.name: Prospector Catalyst
924149235.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

924468777.name: Purchase Phaseglass
924468777.description:
A resource normally found on Io and of interest to its residents. Sometimes used to upgrade gear.

The cost and availability change daily, so check back often.

924779391.name: Sick
924779391.description: It must have been something I ate.

925771554.name: Watching You
925771554.description: I see what you did there.

925938638.name: (Heroic) Invitation from the Emperor
925938638.description: Cayde's worried about a mysterious message drawing the Red Legion to a remote corner of Nessus.

925953071.name: Faction Rallies: High Renown
925953071.description: Gain Renown by completing public events, patrols, and other activities in the world.

926349160.name: Tome of Dawn
926349160.description: When Dawnblade is equipped, aiming weapons while you're in midair suspends you there for a short time. Weapon hits extend this effect's duration.

926349161.name: Fusion Harness
926349161.description: Fusion Grenades have an additional charge and recharge from empowered weapon damage. Fusion Grenade kills grant Rift energy.

926976844.name: Resolute
926976844.description: Gain an overshield when activating Fists of Havoc.

930064526.name: Bureaucratic Walk
930064526.description: Please be advised, you must file form 7C and 9D upon each use.

930330247.name: WANTED: Pallas Siegebreaker
930330247.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in Thieves' Landing on the Tangled Shore.

930386974.name: Valor Rank: Legend
930386974.description: Return to Shaxx to collect your reward.

934350469.name: Ghost Shells
934350469.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.

934898764.name: Ether Cane
934898764.description:
An ingredient that adds an ethereal sweetness to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

935054193.name: Mods
935054193.description: Transmat effects and Ghost projections found when you're opening Bright Engrams.

937162783.name: Magnificent Dance
937162783.description: Be sure to observe my glorious dance!

938315758.name: A New Season Begins
938315758.description: Tess is waiting for you at her Eververse kiosk in the Courtyard.

938999636.name: Personal Assistant
938999636.description: Aim at an enemy to view its health and other critical information in the scope.

939227542.name: Target Acquired
939227542.description: When Personal Assistant is active, this weapon has better target acquisition and deals significantly more precision damage.

939510105.name: House of Exile Banner
939510105.description: "It's a House of Exile banner marking a Baroness. I wonder why Cayde hung onto this?" —Ghost

942111489.name: Dark Monastery
942111489.description: "We've got strange reports coming in from the Corsairs. I need a sitrep." —Petra Venj

942541111.name: Machine Gun Targeting
942541111.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim down sights speed for Machine Guns.

943675759.name: Road Rage
943675759.description: Asher's worked up about Vex interest in the Io Vault. He's got an unusual suggestion for how to deal with the problem.

944115723.name: Iron Engram
944115723.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

944506345.name: SUROS Legacy
944506345.description: The bottom half of each magazine deals bonus damage and has a chance to return health on kill.

950639725.name: Unexpected Guests
950639725.description: Ikora's worried about some Taken emanations from beneath the moon's surface.

952165152.name: Power Dexterity
952165152.description: Slightly faster ready and stow speed for Power weapons.

952293426.name: Eliksni Birdseed
952293426.description: Deliver this high-end falcon food to Hawthorne's falcon Louis in the Tower Bazaar.

952757932.name: The Runner (Heroic)
952757932.description: Stop a Cabal simulation carrying heavily encrypted data.

953752592.name: Welcome to the Solstice of Heroes
953752592.description: Speak to Tess Everis to claim your free Solstice Engram.

954010055.name: Blindsight
954010055.description: Complete the Blind Well at Tier III or higher with clanmates.

954195907.name: Faction Rally: Crucible
954195907.description: Represent your faction in 5 Crucible matches today.

956685247.name: Vengeance of Volundr
956685247.description: Tracks the number of Volundr Forge ignitions completed.

956899429.name: All Right, All Right
956899429.description: Win a Gambit match with a linked friend or a member of your clan.

957729509.name: Complete Activities on Titan
957729509.description: Complete various activities around the moon Titan, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.

957782887.name: Snapshot Sights
957782887.description: Faster time to aim down sights.

959144972.name: Bright Engram
959144972.description: A vibrant engram containing many different customization options. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

961496619.name: Fishing
961496619.description: Sure, sure. You caught the big one. No, I totally believe you.

962969935.name: Above and Beyond
962969935.description: Masterwork Any Solstice of Heroes Armor

965619220.name: SLO-21 Post
965619220.description:
SUROS projection sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

965619221.name: SLO-12 Post
965619221.description:
SUROS projection sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

965619223.name: SLO-10 Post
965619223.description:
SUROS projection sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

968188548.name: The Machinist
968188548.description: Battle across the toxic wastelands to take down the Scorned Baron known as the Machinist.

968684647.name: At Full Power
968684647.description: Return to Sloane with the methane reactor.

968940964.name: Not Quite a Baker's Dozen
968940964.description: Bake delicious treats in Eva's Holiday Oven.

969863968.name: Victorious Veteran
969863968.description: Displays your lifetime Crucible kills, and how many Guardians of each class you've defeated.

971842471.name: WANTED: Varghul, Fragment of Oryx
971842471.description: Begin your hunt in the Cavern of Souls in the EDZ.

972757866.name: Pulse Monitor
972757866.description: Auto-reloads part of the magazine when wielder is critically wounded.

973499765.name: SUROS Regime
973499765.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

973983247.name: Lost in Rheasilvia
973983247.description: Explore the Chamber of Starlight in the Dreaming City.

973983256.name: Lost in the Strand
973983256.description: Explore Aphelion's Rest in the Dreaming City.

974968653.name: Crimson Engram
974968653.description:
An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

It will almost certainly contain a new reward when decrypted until you've received them all.

981073422.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
981073422.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

981670459.name: Daily: Iron Banner
981670459.description: Return to Saladin at the Iron Banner grounds in the Tower.

981914802.name: Hard Launch
981914802.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed.
  •  Greatly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases blast radius

982948073.name: Luna's Howl
982948073.description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

984152775.name: Cabal Killer
984152775.description:
Seek out Cabal soldiers across the solar system and end their lives with the weapon Acrius.  Complete the following objectives with Acrius: 

Objective 1: Eliminate Cabal 
Objective 2: Eliminate Cabal at close range 
Objective 3: Eliminate multiple Cabal without reloading

984614675.name: WANTED: Sunless Captain
984614675.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee in Terminus East in the EDZ.

988118026.name: Meditation: "Tree of Probabilities"
988118026.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

988935838.name: Trials of the Nine Rewards
988935838.description: Exchange these items for rewards from the Emissary of the Nine:

990298390.name: Hand-Laid Stock
990298390.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability

993006552.name: Luminous Crucible Engram
993006552.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

994049197.name: Helping Hand
994049197.description: Tracks Guided Game raid encounters in the Leviathan

994355424.name: Out of the Woods
994355424.description: Return to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

994729458.name: Enhanced Grenade Launcher Loader
994729458.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Grenade Launchers.

996480235.name: REAPER: Executioner's Rhythm
996480235.description: Defeat enemies with Special ammo in Gambit Prime.

996480236.name: REAPER: Light-Based Killer
996480236.description: Earn any Super multikill medal in a Gambit Prime match.

996480237.name: REAPER: Kill'em All
996480237.description: Defeat enemies or Guardians in a single Gambit Prime match.

996480238.name: REAPER: Killing Machine
996480238.description: Defeat hostiles without dying in Gambit Prime.

996480239.name: REAPER: Get Rich Quick
996480239.description: Neutralize high-value targets in Gambit Prime.

996573084.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
996573084.description: Fires full auto with deeper ammo reserves. Faster reload when weapon is empty.

997047020.name: Broken Izanami Igniter
997047020.description:
You found the lost Izanami Forge, but this forge has released something… unexpected.

Show the item to Ada-1, who may be able to identify it.

997047022.name: Repaired Izanami Igniter
997047022.description:
The igniter is fully repaired.

Bring it to Ada-1 for inspection.

997563763.name: The Arms Dealer
997563763.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "The Arms Dealer."

998352072.name: Classified
998352072.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

1000724343.name: The Perfect Fifth
1000724343.description: Precision hits return ammo to the mag. Landing 4 precision hits loads a delayed Solar explosive round for your next shot.

1001399024.name: Public Works
1001399024.description: "I'm relying on you and the rest of the Guardians for help with day-to-day ops." —Petra Venj

1003670741.name: Five Steps Bundle
1003670741.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know a new path is only a hop, skip, and a jump away.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.

1003670742.name: Two Breaths Bundle
1003670742.description:
A bundle for Guardians who can change their fate in an instant.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.

1003670743.name: One Shot Bundle
1003670743.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know how to make the most of any advantage.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.

1003751297.name: Explore the Infinite
1003751297.description: Chance to receive a Legendary engram when completing Heroic adventures on Mercury with your clan members.

1008237921.name: Strange Cookies
1008237921.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

1008524376.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524376.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1008524377.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524377.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1008524378.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524378.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1008524379.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524379.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1008524380.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524380.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1008524381.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524381.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1008524382.name: Encrypted Cache Key
1008524382.description: This key is scrambled; collect data to decrypt the key.

1009417934.name: Certificate of Friendship
1009417934.description: This document is proof of your commitment to bringing new Guardians into the fold. Bring it to Hawthorne for a reward.

1010316741.name: Powerful Bow Frame
1010316741.description:
Forge a Black Armory Bow from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

1012699414.name: Heavy Grip
1012699414.description:
This grip is weighted for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Decreases handling speed

1014206276.name: Ventilator Key
1014206276.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift in the Ventilator location aboard the Leviathan.

1015611457.name: Kill Clip
1015611457.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.

1015935557.name: Forged in Fire
1015935557.description: Complete matches in any Crucible playlist.

1019291327.name: High-Impact Frame
1019291327.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

1019874420.name: Classified
1019874420.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

1022552290.name: Legendary Shards
1022552290.description: Remnants of powerful items. Used to improve gear or trade for other items.

1023561435.name: Mods
1023561435.description: Transmat mods, armor mods, and weapon mods found when opening Bright Engrams.

1023568405.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 4 Fulfilled
1023568405.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1024370526.name: (Heroic) Cliffhanger
1024370526.description: Asher has information about the Vex's next conversion site, and he wants it stopped.

1027732070.name: Rasputin's Culling
1027732070.description:
Rasputin requires additional information against more powerful enemies, wherever they may be found.

Defeat powerful enemies with an IKELOS weapon equipped.

1030567168.name: Refined Sights
1030567168.description: The weekly clan challenge also grants an Enhancement Core.

1032709883.name: Prime Example
1032709883.description: Speak to Master Rahool in the Tower.

1034907062.name: Leviathan Armor
1034907062.description: Armor obtained by increasing your reputation with Emperor Calus.

1036269296.name: Cold Fusion
1036269296.description: This weapon shoots a steady cold fusion-powered laser.

1036754881.name: Shotgun Dexterity
1036754881.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Shotguns.

1036776535.name: Denial Dance
1036776535.description: Don't be sad! You may have lost, but we can still dance.

1040104747.name: Radiant Sniper Rifle Frame
1040104747.description: Craft the Black Armory Sniper Rifle by completing a Gofannon Forge ignition on Nessus.

1045341587.name: EDZ Engram
1045341587.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the European Dead Zone.

1045822656.name: Radiant Auto Rifle Frame
1045822656.description: Craft the Black Armory Auto Rifle by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

1046757784.name: A Gift from Tess
1046757784.description: A gift from Tess. Visit her to see what's inside!

1046955906.name: Graceful Dance
1046955906.description: "The Awoken shall always be graceful as we dance in remembrance of our Queen." —Petra Venj

1047830412.name: Full Choke
1047830412.description: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.

1048400610.name: Future War Cult Rewards
1048400610.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Lakshmi-2:

1051565163.name: Sparrows
1051565163.description: Speed through Crimson Days alongside your Crimson Bond with these exclusive Sparrows.

1053023440.name: Journeyman Guide
1053023440.description: Tracks Guided Game raid encounters in the "Last Wish" raid.

1053023441.name: Apprentice Guide
1053023441.description: Tracks Guided Game raid encounters in the "Last Wish" raid.

1054493699.name: Hand Cannon Beta Frame
1054493699.description:
A Hand Cannon frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills with Hand Cannons to finish the calibration.

1057027095.name: Pulse Rifle Dexterity
1057027095.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Pulse Rifles.

1057119308.name: Spire Star
1057119308.description: Tracks normal and Prestige completions of "Leviathan, Spire of Stars," as well as the number of Power Conduit Chests opened.

1059304051.name: Wish No More
1059304051.description: This emblem tracks number of completions for raid "Last Wish."

1059887208.name: Corsair Down
1059887208.description: The fieldcom device crackles weakly. You can just hear an encoded SOS, repeating something about an aphelion.

1060902857.name: Signal Light
1060902857.description: Follow an ancient signal to its source.

1065442101.name: Bright Dust
1065442101.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

1066067378.name: Shotgun Scavenger
1066067378.description: Shotguns get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

1066526801.name: Beneath the Bazaar
1066526801.description: Seek out the strange, hacked frame skulking in the bazaar at the Tower.

1066526804.name: Back to the Bazaar
1066526804.description: Seek out the strange, hacked frame skulking in the bazaar at the Tower.

1066526805.name: Imperial Invitation
1066526805.description: Seek out the strange, hacked frame skulking in the Bazaar at the Tower.

1066526806.name: Benedict Beneath
1066526806.description: Seek out the strange, hacked frame skulking in the bazaar at the Tower.

1066526807.name: Benedict at the Bazaar
1066526807.description: Seek out the strange, hacked frame skulking in the bazaar at the Tower.

1067908860.name: Short-Action Stock
1067908860.description:
This weapon is especially easy to grip.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

1068909436.name: Shotgun Reserves
1068909436.description: Increases the amount of Shotgun ammo you can carry.

1068982181.name: Large Weapon Loader
1068982181.description: Faster reload for Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Shotguns.

1070100196.name: Honed Edge
1070100196.description: Holding reload consumes the magazine and loads a round with additional range and damage.

1075536136.name: Bounties Completed
1075536136.description: Return to Ikora in the Tower.

1075647353.name: Vanguard Terminus
1075647353.description: Earned by achieving Vanguard rank 25 in Season 4.

1076207436.name: Warped Armlet
1076207436.description: Return to the Traveler's Shard in the EDZ to activate your Subclass.

1076207437.name: Warped Armlet
1076207437.description: Rekindle your lost abilities by defeating enemies and fighting alongside fellow Guardians in Public Events.

1076254241.name: Vex Slayer
1076254241.description: Improves rewards from eliminating Vex enemies.

1076900568.name: Solar Focus Restored
1076900568.description: Your affinity for the Solar aspect of the Traveler's Light feels strong again. Return to the Shard in the EDZ to restore your connection.

1076900569.name: Solar Light Stirring
1076900569.description: Discovering a scorched Hand Cannon has rekindled something inside you. Rebuild your strength in combat and public events.

1078226393.name: An Inscrutable Amygdaloid Eigenstate
1078226393.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Pyramidion."

1078226394.name: Spiraling into the Infinite
1078226394.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Pyramidion."

1078226395.name: Operation Intrepid
1078226395.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Pyramidion."

1081016486.name: Off-World Recovery
1081016486.description: You need something to draw out Xol. A fragment of the Traveler has been located in the EDZ. Recover it.

1084281489.name: Enhanced Unflinching Bow Aim
1084281489.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Bows.

1084767396.name: Amanda Holliday
1084767396.description: Now that she's back in the Hangar, Amanda Holliday has something special for you.

1085775425.name: Black Armory Devotee
1085775425.description: Defeat enemies with only Black Armory weapons equipped.

1085932194.name: (Heroic) Poor Reception
1085932194.description: The Fallen are trying to block all communications in the EDZ. Find the source of the interference and shut it down.

1086501114.name: The Twins
1086501114.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants on Mars. Complete strike "Strange Terrain."

1087426260.name: Appended Mag
1087426260.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size

1090064112.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
1090064112.description: The last vestiges of a long-lost Vex past.

1090776317.name: Corsair Down
1090776317.description: The fieldcom device crackles weakly. You can just hear an encoded SOS, repeating something about a garden.

1096957638.name: Rasmussen ISA
1096957638.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

1099478215.name: "Combustion"
1099478215.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

1104345304.name: Super Awesome
1104345304.description: Defeat multiple enemies with a single Super while on Nessus.

1107740237.name: Ashes to Assets
1107740237.description: Gain bonus Super energy on grenade kills.

1110923993.name: Machine Gun Alpha Frame
1110923993.description:
An uncalibrated Machine Gun frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat large numbers of Hive with Power weapons to start the calibration.

1113207372.name: Precision Frame
1113207372.description: Fires a single-slug round. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

1115035140.name: From Downtown
1115035140.description: Defeat multiple enemies at a time with your Super.

1117225365.name: Lost Prophecy, Another Verse
1117225365.description:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

1117830762.name: Io Treasure Map
1117830762.description: "I got word on another cache in the Echo Mesa. Some of Asher's 'assistants' chased a Legionary out of the Cabal Base but lost him in a little cave nearby. Must've left it there, since the rhino came out empty handed. That's when the assistants got him. Good thing, 'cause I'd rather it go to you." —Cayde-6

1117830764.name: Io Treasure Map
1117830764.description: "You know Eris Morn, right? Creepy three-eyed old Hunter, too much foundation? Doesn't matter. She comes in and asks me how Io was and I say, wrong Vanguard, ask Ikora; and she's like, I was hoping that cache by the bones marked your grave; and I'm like, I'm an Exo, I left my bones behind a long time ago; and she goes, exactly. You get anything from that?" —Cayde-6

1117830765.name: Io Treasure Map
1117830765.description: "Have you ever had a dream you're in this cave full of mist and you see this amazing cache, but every time you reach to open it, a new layer of mists blocks your path? No? Am I the only one who has this dream?" —Cayde-6

1117830766.name: Io Treasure Map
1117830766.description: "When I was caught in that Vex Teleporter, I would end up in weird places. Once or twice, I swear it was Io and saw one of my own caches on top one of those tall, pointy Vex things. That's all I got for you. That ‘porter was not a fun time!” —Cayde-6

1117830767.name: Io Treasure Map
1117830767.description: "Funny thing, I know I've been to Io, but all the details are pretty hazy. Guess I'm getting old.  I have this memory of a battle on a bridge. Vex everywhere. After crossing a bridge, we took cover to the right, and then, well, it gets fuzzy from there. Maybe worth checking out?" —Cayde-6

1120297673.name: Team Player
1120297673.description: Generate Orbs of Light on Mars.

1122363303.name: Bomber
1122363303.description: Reduces grenade cooldown when using your class ability.

1123124244.name: Purification Ritual
1123124244.description: Defeat any Plague of the Well while Ascendant.

1125939716.name: Five's a Party Bundle
1125939716.description:
A bundle for Guardians with a powerful Bond.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.

1125939718.name: Loneliest Number Bundle
1125939718.description:
A bundle for Guardians to bond over.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.

1125939719.name: Three's a Crowd Bundle
1125939719.description:
A bundle for Guardians committed to their Bond.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.

1126196126.name: Totally Charged
1126196126.description: Complete forge ignitions at maximum charge capacity.

1128713411.name: Forging the Future
1128713411.description: Ignite a forge, eliminate the Warden, and complete the ignition.

1129385189.name: Masterworked Holiday Oven
1129385189.description: Once you've successfully used Eva's Holiday Oven to bake one of everything, it can be upgraded into a Masterwork.

1131244817.name: Damage, Incorporated
1131244817.description: This emblem tracks the number of "Fight Me!" medals you've earned in the Crucible.

1131875567.name: Letter Fragment
1131875567.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

1133737440.name: Oath of the Pack
1133737440.description: Defeat opponents while assisted by at least one other teammate.

1134884869.name: Sidearm Targeting
1134884869.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Sidearms.

1135789475.name: Fast and True
1135789475.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Bow.

1139219783.name: Weapon Ornaments
1139219783.description: Your favorite weapons will inspire new bonds everywhere when they're customized with these Crimson Days–exclusive ornaments.

1139311372.name: Lucky Rabbit's Paw
1139311372.description: "I'm not so sure this paw was lucky for the rabbit… or that it even WAS a rabbit…" —Ghost

1140096971.name: Seraph Rounds
1140096971.description: Rounds overpenetrate targets and bounce off hard surfaces.

1140688064.name: A Gift for the Warlock Vanguard
1140688064.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Ikora in the Tower Bazaar.

1141306110.name: A Mysterious Decryption Device
1141306110.description:
The mysterious box contained an artifact that seems to be a decryption device.

Return to Ada-1 and show her what you've found.

1141377545.name: Postmodern Prometheus
1141377545.description: Ikora is reluctantly allowing Asher to explore a plan where he'd convert the Traveler's energy into a form of synthetic Light.

1141672163.name: Visit Zavala in the Tower
1141672163.description: Zavala has a new task for you.

1142498290.name: Classified
1142498290.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

1142806944.name: Planetary Torrent
1142806944.description: Rifts release an Arc shockwave when cast. Rift energy recharges faster when you are surrounded by enemies.

1143123014.name: Recycle Synths
1143123014.description: Dismantle a stack of these synths to recover Glimmer.

1143596739.name: Classified
1143596739.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

1147638875.name: Cobra Totemic
1147638875.description: Weapons ready and reload very quickly. Melee range is extended.

1147672297.name: Ascendant Challenge
1147672297.description: "The Awoken have long practiced the art of walking between worlds." —Techeun Kalli

1149703256.name: Merciless Catalyst
1149703256.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1153089512.name: High Noon
1153089512.description: Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus precision damage.

1153241482.name: Illuminated Engram
1153241482.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 2 customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Curse of Osiris. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

1155472384.name: Biotic Enhancements
1155472384.description: Increased melee lunge range. Improved melee and Super damage when you're surrounded.

1155472386.name: Fury Conductors
1155472386.description: Melee kills build energy. Being struck by a melee attack reduces incoming damage and unleashes the energy in a devastating explosion.

1155472387.name: Horns of Doom
1155472387.description:
Void melee kills give Super energy.
While Sentinel Shield is active, melee kills recharge Shield Throw, which extends your Super on hits.

1159927294.name: Battered Gauntlet
1159927294.description: Rekindle your lost abilities by defeating enemies and fighting alongside fellow Guardians in Public Events.

1159927295.name: Battered Gauntlet
1159927295.description: Return to the Traveler's Shard in the EDZ to activate your Subclass.

1160544508.name: Middling Synthesizer
1160544508.description:
A Mote synthesizer jimmied off of a defunct Gambit bank, redesigned for recombination rather than energy conversion.

Insert Synths found in Gambit Prime to create Motes.

1160544509.name: Weak Synthesizer
1160544509.description:
A Mote synthesizer jimmied off of a defunct Gambit bank, redesigned for recombination rather than energy conversion.

Insert Synths found in Gambit Prime to create Motes.

1160544511.name: Powerful Synthesizer
1160544511.description:
A Mote synthesizer jimmied off of a defunct Gambit bank, redesigned for recombination rather than energy conversion.

Insert Synths found in Gambit Prime to create Motes.

1160696798.name: Almost Eggnog
1160696798.description: As long as you don't look at it too closely, or smell it, or taste it, this substance could pass for a holiday drink. Bring it to Devrim in the EDZ.

1160722701.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Cayde
1160722701.description:
Cayde made many friends during the Red War, but he's grown especially fond of a certain someone. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat Hive Wizards for pieces of their brittle capes
- Collect Dusklight from the EDZ to craft a perfect replica

1162802884.name: Super Osirian
1162802884.description: Defeat multiple enemies with a single Super while on Mercury.

1162929425.name: The Golden Standard
1162929425.description: This emblem tracks the number of the following Gold-tier medals earned in the Iron Banner.

1168162263.name: Outlaw
1168162263.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.

1169457408.name: Mysterious Box
1169457408.description: An ornate box with four locks. Each lock has a different symbol emblazoned on it: a hand, a butterfly, a fishhook, and a Black Armory insignia.

1170148132.name: Scout Rifle Dexterity
1170148132.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Scout Rifles.

1173801759.name: To the Tower… in Style
1173801759.description: Tess Everis has a request for you. Find her in the Tower Courtyard and see what she has to say.

1174589504.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Devrim
1174589504.description:
Devrim is ready for a change from one of his usual vices. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat Vex Fanatics for their milky radiolarian fluid
- Collect Alkane from Titan to shake on top

1176735155.name: Masterwork Upgrade
1176735155.description: This armor can be upgraded into a Masterwork with one of the options below.

1178686995.name: Mechanized Autoloader
1178686995.description: This weapon automatically reloads on ammo pickup.

1179874484.name: Destination Calibrated Frame
1179874484.description: Craft the destination weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

1179874485.name: Destination Arsenal
1179874485.description: Complete 3 public events on any destination.

1180063380.name: The Fabled Guardian
1180063380.description: Reach Fabled in Valor ranking in Season 3

1180144002.name: Sniper Rifle Reserves
1180144002.description: Increases the amount of Sniper Rifle ammo you can carry.

1180618054.name: Enduring Guard
1180618054.description: Sword Guard has high efficiency and low defense.

1183624542.name: Discovered Recipes
1183624542.description: After successfully baking a new recipe for the first time, it will appear in this list for easy access.

1183779334.name: Enhanced Shotgun Dexterity
1183779334.description: Greatly increased ready and stow speed for Shotguns.

1184965378.name: Lake of Shadows
1184965378.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Lake of Shadows."

1193934646.name: A Gift for the Shipwright
1193934646.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

1194032236.name: Quinary Accolade Bundle
1194032236.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know when to take five.

Contains 5 Steadfast Engrams and 3 random shaders.

1194032238.name: Unary Accolade Bundle
1194032238.description:
A bundle for Guardians who prefer the simplicity of singles.

Contains 1 Steadfast Engram and 1 random shader.

1194032239.name: Ternary Accolade Bundle
1194032239.description:
A bundle for Guardians who believe that good things come in threes.

Contains 3 Steadfast Engrams and 2 random shaders.

1194388516.name: Balanced Awoken Talisman
1194388516.description: A talisman imbued with Darkness and your own innate Light. It proves you are worthy to enter the Dreaming City and walk among the Awoken. Keep hold of it in case you ever need to declare yourself to an Awoken warrior.

1196733167.name: Tactile String
1196733167.description:
Stable, high-friction bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability

1198449474.name: Scion of Mercury
1198449474.description: Increased Glimmer and chance to obtain additional faction consumables on Mercury.

1200129716.name: Dreaming City Calibrated Frame
1200129716.description: Craft the Dreaming City weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

1200129717.name: Dreaming City Arsenal
1200129717.description: Complete 3 Lost Sectors in the Dreaming City.

1201013855.name: Nodes and Protocols
1201013855.description:
Travel to Hellas Basin to gather components and additional data for Rasputin.

Clear Escalation Protocol levels and access Sleeper Nodes with an IKELOS weapon equipped.

1202425489.name: Generator
1202425489.description: Create Orbs of Light in the EDZ.

1204062917.name: Unflinching Power Aim
1204062917.description: Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Power weapon.

1204101093.name: Luminous Vanguard Engram
1204101093.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

1205464964.name: Iron Banner Rewards
1205464964.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Lord Saladin:

1206702241.name: Genesis Rounds
1206702241.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.

1206865288.name: Acting Bad, Looking Good
1206865288.description: Win a Gambit match wearing the full Ancient Apocalypse armor set.

1210807262.name: Repulsor Force
1210807262.description: This weapon emits a powerful impulse that pushes enemies away, suppresses their abilities, and makes them more vulnerable to all incoming damage, especially Void.

1210937132.name: Hellas Basin
1210937132.description: Track Lost Sectors and Region Chests in Hellas Basin.

1215506320.name: Dark Ether Cane
1215506320.description:
An ingredient that adds a darkly sweet aroma to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

1217833950.name: Faction Rallies: High Renown
1217833950.description: Loot a Lost Sector cache with 5x Renown.

1218280746.name: Corsair Down
1218280746.description: The fieldcom device crackles weakly. You can just hear an encoded SOS, repeating something about a harbinger.

1224948362.name: No Safe Distance
1224948362.description: The Red Legion base is full of explosives even more dangerous than usual. Find and neutralize them before they can enter the field.

1225385236.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 10 Fulfilled
1225385236.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1225647738.name: Lost in the Mists
1225647738.description: Explore the Bay of Drowned Wishes in the Dreaming City.

1227994396.name: Enhanced Sniper Rifle Dexterity
1227994396.description: Greatly increased ready and stow speed for Sniper Rifles.

1229016681.name: Zeus-Like Physique
1229016681.description: Let me show you my muscles!

1231347313.name: Book of 1,001 Hilarious Space Jokes
1231347313.description: The idea of Ikora telling these jokes is worth the trouble it took to make the book. Bring it to her in the Tower Bazaar.

1232911832.name: Gambit Clan Engram
1232911832.description: Contains rewards for your clan's efforts in Gambit.

1233336930.name: Invader +3
1233336930.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

1234572357.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572357.description: "Snow. It's cold, it's wet, and it's generally pretty great to throw at people. But you know what else it's good for? Hiding things. I wonder where I can get some white paint around here…" —Cayde-6

1234572360.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572360.description: "Wherever it is, you're gonna want to bring a coat, 'cause it sounds real cold. My horn was frozen like a popsicle, if you could imagine. When you find it, you're in for a splendid view. But yeah, bring a coat." —Cayde-6

1234572361.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572361.description: "Have you ever heard of a Warsat doing something OTHER than crashing? Don't get me wrong, I appreciate the service of our Warsats, but at a certain point you have to ask: what do they do?" —Cayde-6

1234572362.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572362.description: "Bray's an interesting place. I have a complicated relationship with it, given my past and all. But I've gotta admit, they've built some dang impressive stuff for the whole system. The Golden Age must have been a wild time to be alive." —Cayde-6

1234572363.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572363.description: "Hiding treasure is an art. And there are a lot of different kinds of art, right? This would be an art piece that's an ironic metacommentary about art, if that makes sense. Yeah, that totally doesn't make sense." —Cayde-6

1234572364.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572364.description: "I'm not an engineer, but I'd bet half my stash on the fact that no one has any idea what any of this stuff actually does. I think these guys just like how all these nooks and hidey-holes look." —Cayde-6

1234572365.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572365.description: "Y'know, I'd tell you to look for the power generator, but I'll be honest—all this computer-y stuff? Looks the same to me. This one was pretty… small. I guess we all look pretty small standing next to Rasputin, though." —Cayde-6

1234572366.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572366.description: "Let me tell you the real truth about machines—they're a lot more like people than you'd think. Some are fine, some are just jerks. Rasputin? Totally right-brained. I think." —Cayde-6

1234572367.name: Hellas Basin Treasure Map
1234572367.description: "Have you ever actually crawled through an air duct? Not nearly as easy as it looks. I mean, I'm good at it, but I'm…well, me. All I'm saying is the trick is in angling your shoulders. And not having a big lunch." —Cayde-6

1236001742.name: Precision Frame
1236001742.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

1236444985.name: Aeon Energy
1236444985.description:
Summoning a barricade grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Barricade energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.

1236930676.name: Machine Gun Alpha Frame
1236930676.description:
An uncalibrated Machine Gun frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat large numbers of Hive with Power weapons to start the calibration.

1238137409.name: Sword Beta Frame
1238137409.description:
A Sword frame with unbalanced heft obtained from Ada-1.
Get Multikills with Swords to balance the blade.

1239488577.name: Meditation: "Payback"
1239488577.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

1240759655.name: Warmind Reputation
1240759655.description: Reputation with Ana Bray and, by extension, with Rasputin the Warmind.

1244181000.name: Exodus Siege
1244181000.description: The Fallen prepare to attack Failsafe's mainframe aboard the Exodus Black.

1245383023.name: Javelin Mooncake
1245383023.description: Deliver this reminder of home to Ana Bray in the BrayTech Futurescape on Mars.

1245900184.name: Envoy While It Lasts
1245900184.description: Defeat Primeval envoys during Gambit matches.

1245900185.name: Face-to-Face
1245900185.description: Summon Primevals in Gambit by filling up your team's bank.

1246047974.name: Our Crucible
1246047974.description: Complete three Crucible matches with a linked friend.

1247444892.name: A Gift for Io's Experimenter
1247444892.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Asher on Io.

1248384978.name: Will of the Thousands
1248384978.description: Xol has surfaced and is attacking Rasputin. You're out of time. But Ana has one last plan.

1249968538.name: Sweet Business Catalyst
1249968538.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1249968539.name: Coldheart Catalyst
1249968539.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1251626781.name: Gentleman's Shortbread
1251626781.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

1254636257.name: Talk to Eva
1254636257.description: Speak to Eva Levante at the Tower Bazaar.

1258088978.name: Machine Gun Calibrated Frame
1258088978.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1258366898.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 5 Fulfilled
1258366898.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1259799250.name: Strange Cookies
1259799250.description: Deliver these treats, whose will is clearly not their own, to Xûr wherever the Nine have wished him to be.

1259799252.name: Candy Dead Ghosts
1259799252.description: Deliver these… things to the Spider in his safehouse on the Tangled Shore.

1259799253.name: Ill-Fortune Cookies
1259799253.description: Deliver these cursed yet delicious treats to Petra Venj wherever she can be found in the Reef.

1259799254.name: Javelin Mooncake
1259799254.description: Deliver this reminder of home to Ana Bray in the BrayTech Futurescape on Mars.

1259799255.name: Dark Chocolate Motes
1259799255.description: Deliver these tempting morsels to the Drifter in the Tower Bazaar.

1260222231.name: The Steel
1260222231.description:
Next on the list of required components is Plasteel Plating, a durable hybrid plastic favored by Titans for its balance of strength and workability. Plasteel is not commonly available for artisan use these days: the Red War wiped out the DIY supply chain within the City.

Gather Plasteel Plating by completing bounties for Sloane on Titan, by defeating Titans in the Crucible, or by completing encounters at the Blind Well. Heroic Blind Well encounters grant the most efficient progress.

1261178282.name: Enduring Blade
1261178282.description: Greatly increased sword ammo at the cost of damage.

1261230489.name: Activate Matrix
1261230489.description: Activate the Prismatic Matrix to receive a random Activation Reward from the list below that you have not previously acquired.

1261433463.name: Legendary Engram
1261433463.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

1262618231.name: Hand Cannon Calibrated Frame
1262618231.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1263189958.name: Reaper +1
1263189958.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

1267161032.name: Warm Up
1267161032.description: It's important to stretch thoroughly after each resurrection.

1269621203.name: Arcadian Valley, Nessus Armor
1269621203.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Failsafe on Nessus.

1270564331.name: FWC Token
1270564331.description:
Proof of your efforts in support of the Future War Cult. 

Bring this to Lakshmi-2 while pledged to Future War Cult to increase your Future War Cult reputation.

1271008956.name: Iron Engram
1271008956.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

1272349641.name: Sniper Rifle Calibrated Frame
1272349641.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1274706335.name: Short Fuse
1274706335.description: Defeat Minotaurs on Mercury with a Fusion Rifle.

1275523777.name: Io Engram
1275523777.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Echo Mesa of Io.

1275731761.name: Cluster Bomb
1275731761.description: Rockets spawn cluster bombs upon detonation.

1275790619.name: Fizzled Ornament
1275790619.description:
“Duplicate Data Found”

This item is granted instead of an ornament when the ornament has been previously unlocked.

Dismantles into a pile of Bright Dust.

1276327882.name: Illuminated Engram
1276327882.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 2 customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Curse of Osiris. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

1279125912.name: Hand Cannon Alpha Frame
1279125912.description:
An uncalibrated Hand Cannon frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat Hive with Hand Cannons to start the calibration.

1280248869.name: Good Idea
1280248869.description: Is there a light on up there?

1280540149.name: Let's Chat
1280540149.description: It's time to have a serious conversation.

1280758692.name: Mysterious Package
1280758692.description: The Drifter has a special gift for Guardians dedicated enough to reset their Infamy rank.

1282171576.name: The Con Man
1282171576.description: The Drifter has requested your presence in the Tower.

1287012273.name: Solstice Engram
1287012273.description: A engram containing different customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Warmind. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

1288081796.name: Wolf Sight W1
1288081796.description:
Lightweight sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

1288081797.name: King Sight K1
1288081797.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

1288081798.name: Dusk Sight D1
1288081798.description:
Lightweight sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

1288676952.name: War Machine
1288676952.description: Get Power weapon multikills on Nessus.

1289604610.name: Spread Shot Package
1289604610.description: Aiming this weapon reduces the spread of its projectiles.

1291438773.name: Gunsmith Engram
1291438773.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

1294026524.name: Adaptive Frame
1294026524.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

1294235518.name: Repair the Izanami Igniter
1294235518.description: Complete this advanced version of "The Insight Terminus" and collect a Cabal component from the boss to fully repair the Izanami igniter.

1294717622.name: Sick
1294717622.description: It must have been something I ate.

1297871573.name: Lost Territory
1297871573.description: Acquire cache codes in Lost Sectors in the EDZ.

1299027081.name: Recycle Shaders
1299027081.description: Dismantle a stack of these shaders to recover useful materials or currencies.

1300023272.name: Barrel Shroud
1300023272.description:
Balanced shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed

1300953061.name: Ornaments
1300953061.description: Ornaments used to alter the appearance of your gear, found in Bright Engrams.

1301744348.name: Shaders and Transmat Effects
1301744348.description: Shaders and transmat effects available from the Solstice Engram.

1302938582.name: Throw Down
1302938582.description: Land melee final blows in the Crucible.

1307144225.name: Utopia
1307144225.description: Venture deep into the heart of the Hive to retrieve a powerful Golden Age CPU—and make it out alive.

1309445830.name: Under the Hood
