1309445830.description: Banshee is still working to recreate the old MIDA schematics. Dismantle Rare or Legendary Scout Rifles to aid him.

1311874829.name: (Heroic) Deathless
1311874829.description: Clear out the Knight that's keeping Sloane's crews from their work.

1312472209.name: Fields of Glass
1312472209.description: Tracks Region Chests and Lost Sectors on Mercury.

1312493689.name: Spreading Cheer
1312493689.description: Defeat enemies anywhere in the system. Opposing Guardians count more toward this bounty's progress.

1312493694.name: Event Events
1312493694.description: Complete public events anywhere in the system.

1313623599.name: Machine Gun Beta Frame
1313623599.description:
A Machine Gun frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Defeat powerful enemies with Power weapons to finish the calibration.

1313805249.name: LC Ranged
1313805249.description:
Häkke marksman scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

1313805250.name: LB Assault
1313805250.description:
Assault scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

1313805251.name: LD Watchdog
1313805251.description:
Häkke threat evaluation tech. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

1316076079.name: Red Legion, Black Oil
1316076079.description: Destroy the dark liquid that the Cabal use to power their technology or contaminate it, for a subtler approach.

1316177012.name: Insulation
1316177012.description: Reduces class ability cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Light.

1316229364.name: Lovestruck Bundle
1316229364.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to spread the love.

Contains the exclusive Tiny Bow emote, shaders, and a Fireteam Medallion.

1316229365.name: Dressed to Thrill Bundle
1316229365.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to look their best for their Crimson Bond.

Contains an exclusive Legendary ornament and Fireteam Medallions.

1316899174.name: Lost on the Edge
1316899174.description: Explore the Lost Sector Shipyard AWO-43 near the Jetsam of Saturn on the Tangled Shore.

1316899175.name: Lost on the Landing
1316899175.description: Explore the Lost Sector Kingship Dock near Thieves' Landing on the Tangled Shore.

1316899176.name: Lost in the Cut
1316899176.description: Explore the Lost Sector Wolfship Turbine near Soriks's Cut on the Tangled Shore.

1316899177.name: Lost in the Gulch
1316899177.description: Explore the Lost Sector Trapper's Cave near Four-Horn Gulch on the Tangled Shore.

1317670974.name: EDZ Rewards
1317670974.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Devrim Kay:

1318547442.name: Street Smarts Bundle
1318547442.description:
A bundle for Guardians with a talent for surviving ruthless times.

Contains the exclusive Outwit ornament for Outlast, 1 Bright Engram, and 5 shaders from the Season of the Drifter.

1318547443.name: Lightning Rod Bundle
1318547443.description:
A bundle for any Arcstrider looking to quietly pass the time.

Contains the exclusive class-locked Arcstrider's Patience emote, 1 Fireteam Medallion, and 150 Bright Dust.

1318547448.name: Ether Supply Bundle
1318547448.description:
A bundle for Guardians who seek symbiosis with their Ghost.

Contains the exclusive Totem Shell Ghost, 2 Bright Engrams, and 5 shaders from the Season of the Drifter.

1318547449.name: Sorrowful Bundle
1318547449.description:
A bundle for Guardians who are fated to walk a darker path.

Contains the exclusive Wishes of Sorrow ornament for Thorn, 3 Bright Engrams, and the Illicit Transmat transmat effect.

1318547450.name: Prime Time Bundle
1318547450.description:
A one-time bundle to kick off the Season of the Drifter.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 250 Bright Dust.

1318547451.name: Gravitational Effects Bundle
1318547451.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who are fascinated by the inexorable power of black holes.

Contains the exclusive General Relativity ornament for Graviton Lance, 3 Bright Engrams, and the Sterile Neutrino transmat effect.

1318547452.name: Delectable Motes Bundle
1318547452.description:
A bundle for Guardians who have thrown themselves head first into the Drifter's latest scheme.

Contains the exclusive Still Hungry ornament for Gnawing Hunger, 1 Bright Engram, and 5 shaders from the Season of the Drifter.

1318547453.name: You Gonna Eat That Bundle
1318547453.description:
A bundle for Guardians who reject etiquette and push boundaries.

Contains the exclusive Table Scraps ornament for Spare Rations, 1 Bright Engram, and 5 shaders from the Season of the Drifter.

1318547454.name: Warshark Bundle
1318547454.description:
A bundle for Guardians who look toward the past with curious minds.

Contains the exclusive Zambezi-00 Sparrow, 2 Bright Engrams, and 10 shaders from the Season of the Drifter.

1318547455.name: Forward Scout Bundle
1318547455.description:
A bundle for Guardians who wish to forge new fronts for the Vanguard.

Contains the exclusive Black Peregrine jumpship, 3 Gleaming Boons of the Vanguard, and 5 shaders from the Season of the Drifter.

1319723906.name: Gateway Between Worlds
1319723906.description: "The Blind Well can split wide the veins that run between realities." —Techeun Sedia

1320113564.name: Triumphalism
1320113564.description: This emblem tracks total Triumph score.

1321261072.name: Reclaim Mysterious Package
1321261072.description: The Drifter has a special gift for Guardians dedicated enough to reset their Infamy rank.

1321546045.name: European Dead Zone
1321546045.description: Tracks Ghost Scans, Region Chests, and Lost Sectors in the European Dead Zone.

1322033535.name: Wish Granter
1322033535.description: Tracks Guided Game raid encounters in the "Last Wish" raid.

1322370662.name: Precision Frame
1322370662.description: Recoil pattern on this weapon is more predictably vertical. Fires quickly with high accuracy.

1324862386.name: WANTED: Subterranean Mind
1324862386.description: Begin your hunt in Pariah's Refuge on Mercury.

1325595568.name: Enhanced Unflinching Linear Fusion Aim
1325595568.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Linear Fusion Rifles.

1326668122.name: Aggressive Frame
1326668122.description: High-recoil weapon with slow charge time. Fires reduced number of fusion bolts that deal more impact damage.

1331592343.name: Starless Night
1331592343.description: Enemies that enter Ward of Dawn are blinded, while allies that pass through gain an overshield. Guarding with Sentinel Shield blinds nearby enemies.

1331669929.name: Strikes
1331669929.description: Return to Zavala to collect your reward.

1331670505.name: The Rout
1331670505.description: Defeat opponents in the Iron Banner. Earn bonus progress by landing final blows on opponents with a higher Power level.

1332244541.name: Rifled Barrel
1332244541.description:
Ranged shotgun barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Greatly decreases handling speed

1334297391.name: Gentleman's Shortbread
1334297391.description: Deliver this tasteful, tasty treat to Devrim Kay in Trostland in the European Dead Zone.

1334592906.name: Rocket Launcher Dexterity
1334592906.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Rocket Launchers.

1334959255.name: Arcstrider
1334959255.description: Flow like lightning. Strike like thunder.

1339190438.name: Cayde's Will
1339190438.description: Search the solar system for Cayde's personal caches.

1345324235.name: Warmind Reputation
1345324235.description: Reputation with Ana Bray and, by extension, with Rasputin the Warmind.

1347384481.name: Satou's Secret
1347384481.description:
The earth is weary.
What has no future perceives
No path, just chaos.

1347384482.name: Meyrin's Vision
1347384482.description: The wandering soul seeks an answer, only to find a path leading through a fog of uncertainty.

1347384483.name: Rasmussen's Gift
1347384483.description: There is one path forward, and we must pave it ourselves.

1348944144.name: Hold the Line
1348944144.description: Complete the Hold the Line challenge.

1349232063.name: "Looped"
1349232063.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

1350157124.name: Radiant Pulse Rifle Frame
1350157124.description: Craft the Black Armory Pulse Rifle by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

1353730260.name: Vanguard Research Engram
1353730260.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting Ikora Rey with her research.

1354429876.name: Fourth Time's the Charm
1354429876.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.

1356474366.name: Enhanced Hand Cannon Targeting
1356474366.description: Greatly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Hand Cannons.

1358652620.name: Temporal Surge
1358652620.description: Only manifesting in this timeline for a short while, the Temporal Surge somehow brings Guardians echoes of beloved relics from past Eververse inventory.

1359896290.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
1359896290.description: When holding down the trigger, this weapon's sway-reduction system boosts accuracy over time.

1363121710.name: The Traveler, Alive (Warlock)
1363121710.description:
A reward for defeating Ghaul and saving the Last City.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from the Red War, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

1365398473.name: Speak with Executor Hideo
1365398473.description: To celebrate, New Monarchy offers Guardians a Legendary Weapon.

1368500138.name: Dawning Ingredients: Scorn
1368500138.description: Defeat Scorn enemies anywhere in the system.

1368500139.name: Dawning Ingredients: Taken
1368500139.description: Defeat Taken enemies anywhere in the system.

1368500140.name: Dawning Ingredients: Hive
1368500140.description: Defeat Hive enemies anywhere in the system.

1368500141.name: Dawning Ingredients: Cabal
1368500141.description: Defeat Cabal enemies anywhere in the system.

1368500142.name: Dawning Ingredients: Fallen
1368500142.description: Defeat Fallen enemies anywhere in the system.

1368500143.name: Dawning Ingredients: Vex
1368500143.description: Defeat Vex enemies anywhere in the system.

1368565477.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

1371918942.name: Machine Gun Dexterity
1371918942.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Machine Guns.

1372151242.name: Silly Salute
1372151242.description: A very special salute for very special Guardians.

Defeat Hive and Cabal in Hellas Basin. You must equip IKELOS weapon and defeat Cabal with precision shots.

1375769660.name: Await the World-Eater
1375769660.description: The decrypted communications indicate something is coming. Look for the arrival of the "World-Eater."

1375769661.name: On the Comms
1375769661.description: Return to Nessus and recover communication ciphers from Red Legion troops.

1376578654.name: Lantern Effects

1376713467.name: Gift of Shaders

1378047685.name: Spinning Up

1378463583.name: WANTED: Phyzann, Drowned Captain

1380253176.name: High-Explosive Ordnance

1381881897.name: To Each Their Own

1386238359.name: The Jade Rabbit
1386238359.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

1386742949.name: Pulse Rifle Calibrated Frame
1386742949.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1386992122.name: Become Legend
1386992122.description: Contains seasonal rewards for Guardians who have become Legend in Valor Ranks.

1388845184.name: Nessus Engram
1388845184.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Arcadian Valley of Nessus.

1389394014.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 7 Fulfilled
1389394014.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1391363409.description: "For every enemy commander that steps forward, we need to destroy two." —Petra Venj

1392496348.name: Polygonal Rifling
1392496348.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.

1394713337.name: The Traveler, Alive (Hunter)

A reward for defeating Ghaul and saving the Last City.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from the Red War, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

1395968355.name: Machine Gun Calibrated Frame

1398781283.name: Letter Fragment

 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by depositing Motes and sending Blockers.

1432633204.name: Black Armory Key Mold

1432633205.description:
The mold first requires a material that comes only from Watchers on the Leviathan.

Harvest parts from every Watcher in the underbelly of the Leviathan.

1432633206.name: Black Armory Key Mold

The mold now requires a material known as Glimmering Amethyst.

You can find concentrations of it in supply caches, public event chests, and strike chests.

1432633207.description:
Charge the Bergusia Forge in the EDZ to its fullest to gain Maximum Temper.
Complete the forge ignition to obtain the Black Armory Key.

1434482690.name: Desert Matte

Drifter's concerned that his old enemy, Shin Malphur, is roaming the EDZ. As a preemptive show of strength, he wants you to get into the Crucible and make it a bad day to be a Gunslinger.

Defeat Guardians in the Crucible.

1460578929.name: Clan Banner

Resilience

1471300080.name: A Cold Wind Blowin'

1473923371.description: Contains one random Solar glow to adorn Solstice of Heroes armor sets.

1481312847.description: Investigate a mysterious broadcast that only you and your Ghost can hear.

- Obtain Unstable Radiolaria from the Vex to charge the Weapon Core.

The new syndicate is making a push on the Tangled Shore. Seek out anyone who's been in contact with it.

- Defeat Fallen with melee damage on the Tangled Shore

1496699324.name: Jade Rabbit Catalyst

  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability

The artifact is calling to something dark.

Uncover a dark ritual on Titan and stop the twisted ceremony.

Arc

Void

1518990696.name: Redeployment
1518990696.description: Return to Zavala to claim your Oxygen SR3.

1519748029.name: "A Deadly Trial"
1519748029.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

1520167422.name: Speak with Ana Bray
1520167422.description: Ana is waiting for you in BrayTech Futurescape.

1522110717.name: Diary 3/5
1522110717.description: The module has unlocked another log for "A.Bray." It can be uploaded into Ana's personal server in the Bray facility.

1524950365.name: Power Handicap
1524950365.description: Increasing the Power handicap applied by this card will increase the score multiplier.

1525239159.name: Aggressive Frame
1525239159.description: High damage, high recoil. Deals bonus damage at close range.

1525693276.name: Meditation: "Fury"
1525693276.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.
