1527780517.description: An engram containing different customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found during the Festival of the Lost. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

1529188379.name: Dreaming Token of Querim
1529188379.description: The worthless token of a slain Minotaur, sworn enemy of Sjur Eido.

1530804125.name: Superconductor
1530804125.description: When Arc Conductor is active, shots fired have the chance to become chain lightning and return ammo.

1531126198.name: Wire Rifle
1531126198.description: Fires a long-range precision Arc bolt that blinds enemies on hit.

1531478589.name: Offering to the Oracle
1531478589.description: A fragment of amethyst, offered in supplication to the mysterious Oracle Engine.

1538383050.name: Future War Cult Engram
1538383050.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Future War Cult.

1539578239.name: Sneaky
1539578239.description: I'm sure no one can see you…

1540812339.name: Lighthouse Engram
1540812339.description: An engram signed with a key unique to the Followers of Osiris.

1540982869.name: Perfect Energy
1540982869.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Fusion Rifle.

1541490821.name: Fury
1541490821.description: Help Ikora use the Warmind on Io to learn more about the Almighty—and turn the tide of the war.

1542067821.name: Meditation: "Ice and Shadow"
1542067821.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

1546605019.name: Letter Fragment
1546605019.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

1547720376.name: Meditation: "Larceny"
1547720376.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

1547952904.name: Recycle Synths
1547952904.description: Dismantle a stack of these synths to recover Glimmer.

1551307742.name: Powerful Auto Rifle Frame
1551307742.description:
Forge a Black Armory Auto Rifle from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

1552235509.name: Newish Dance
1552235509.description: Nobody is watching. Time to bust out some new moves.

1553728269.name: Future War Cult Engram
1553728269.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Future War Cult.

1556056713.name: Complete Activities in the EDZ
1556056713.description: Complete various activities around the EDZ, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.

1558250725.name: Strength in Numbers
1558250725.description: Increases chance of receiving an engram when completing playlist activities with a clan member.

1561002382.name: High-Caliber Rounds
1561002382.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range

1561679219.name: Killing Wind
1561679219.description: Defeat three opponents in the Crucible without dying.

1561789734.name: Firefly
1561789734.description: Precision kills with this weapon increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby enemies.

1567158947.name: Lost Prophecy, Another Verse
1567158947.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1567314459.name: Hands-On
1567314459.description: Gain bonus Super energy on melee kills.

1572280253.name: Light Arms Loader
1572280253.description: Faster reload for Hand Cannons, Sidearms, Submachine Guns, and Bows.

1573888036.name: Split Electron
1573888036.description: Fires an arrow that splits when released. Aiming down sights and fully drawing the bow both decrease the spread.

1574678248.name: Crucible Engram
1574678248.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

1574692519.name: Stand with the Drifter
1574692519.description:
Turn your back on the Vanguard to stand with the Drifter.

This decision has consequences:

 • This character will experience different quest content and receive different rewards than characters who stand with the Vanguard.
 • The Drifter will remember your choice.
 • This character will not have complete access to the "The Warlock Aunor" lore book.
 • This choice may impact future content for this character.

1576284847.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 10
1576284847.description:
See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!

1576700957.name: Enhanced Bow Targeting
1576700957.description: Greatly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Bows.

1578899659.name: Auto Rifle Calibrated Frame
1578899659.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

1579897984.name: Curator's Bundle
1579897984.description:
A bundle for Guardians who welcome the past's return.

Contains the exclusive Dark Horse Sparrow, 2 Bright Engrams, and 10 shaders from the Season of the Forge.

1579897985.name: Forge's Ignition Bundle
1579897985.description:
A one-time bundle to kick off the Season of the Forge.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 250 Bright Dust.

1579897986.name: Feathered Friend Bundle
1579897986.description:
A one-time bundle for true friends of Cayde-6.

Contains the Salute to the Colonel ornament for Ace of Spades, 3 Bright Engrams, and the Only the Finest transmat effect.

1579897987.name: Visions of Iron Bundle
1579897987.description:
A one-time bundle to welcome the Iron Banner's return.

Contains three Ghost projections exclusive to this bundle, 1 Fireteam Medallion, and 2 Gleaming Boons of the Crucible.

1579897988.name: Form Given Function Bundle
1579897988.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who believe in elegance amidst brutality.

Contains the Suros Chrome ornament for Suros Regime, 3 Bright Engrams, and the Past Unearthed transmat effect.

1579897989.name: Forges Burn Bright Bundle
1579897989.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who welcome the Black Armory's return.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Lilac Bombast shaders.

1581741477.name: Powerful Machine Gun Frame
1581741477.description:
Forge a Black Armory Machine Gun from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

1582507554.name: Collapse of the Elders
1582507554.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Warden of Nothing."

1583801629.name: Choose a faction
1583801629.description: Pledge your loyalty to one of the City factions.

1588735570.name: Homecoming
1588735570.description: The Last City is under attack by the Red Legion. It's time to fight back.

1590498252.name: Mask Upgrade
1590498252.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

1590498254.name: Mask Upgrade
1590498254.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

1590498255.name: Mask Upgrade
1590498255.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

1593412701.name: Emotes
1593412701.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

1595521942.name: Atop the Spire
1595521942.description: Earned by completing the "Spire of Stars" raid lair on Prestige difficulty.

1598687622.name: Thumos's Keycodes
1598687622.description: The command codes needed to steal Thumos's ship and infiltrate the Almighty.

1599898966.name: Arcadian Valley
1599898966.description: Tracks Ghost Scans, Region Chests, and Lost Sectors on Nessus.

1600092898.name: Backup Plan
1600092898.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.

1601376681.name: Complete Activities on Mercury
1601376681.description: Complete various activities around Mercury, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic Adventures.

1603826857.name: Ghost Shells
1603826857.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.

1606326513.name: Return to Ada-1
1606326513.description: Return to Ada-1 to report on the status of the Izanami Forge.

1608112177.name: Pump Action
1608112177.description: Gain bonus Super energy on Shotgun kills.

1612078667.name: Speed Demon
1612078667.description: Your vehicles take less time to summon and reload your weapons while you ride.

1612405153.name: A Piece of the Past
1612405153.description: Return to Rasputin with the mysterious engram.

1612719672.name: Fated Engram
1612719672.description: An engram with a predestined outcome. It will contain a new Exotic if any remain to be collected.

1615051908.name: Delicious Explosion
1615051908.description:
Sudden and violent. And also tasty.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

1616415576.name: Hand Cannon Calibrated Frame
1616415576.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1616736576.name: Vanguard Tactician Arsenal
1616736576.description: Weapons obtained by carrying out special operations for Zavala.

1617583310.name: Standoff
1617583310.description: The fastest draw in the solar system.

1617987572.name: SSO-08 Sniper
1617987572.description:
Lightweight scope. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

1617987574.name: SSO-05 Sniper
1617987574.description:
Suros imaging technology. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

1617987575.name: SSO-07 Sniper
1617987575.description:
Suros scope technology. Medium zoom.
  •  Increases range

1618160060.name: Arc Focus Restored
1618160060.description: Your affinity for the Arc aspect of the Traveler's Light feels strong again. Return to the Shard in the EDZ to restore your connection.

1618160061.name: Arc Light Stirring
1618160061.description: Discovering a pitted storm pendant has rekindled something inside you. Rebuild your strength in combat and public events.

1618249918.name: Dark Chocolate Motes
1618249918.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

1623988481.name: My Captain
1623988481.description: Follow the strange Harpy to discover what the Vex know.

1626219726.name: Talisman Fragment
1626219726.description: A missing fragment from the Awoken talisman Petra gave you.

1626219727.name: Talisman Fragment
1626219727.description: A missing fragment from the Awoken talisman Petra gave you.

1628165636.name: Torch HS3
1628165636.description:
Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

1628165637.name: Flash HS5
1628165637.description:
Omolon red-dot. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

1628365319.name: Pulse Rifle Calibrated Frame
1628365319.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

1631667848.name: Grave Robber
1631667848.description: Melee kills reload a portion of this weapon's magazine. Grants ammo for Primary ammo weapons; reloads from reserves for Special and Heavy ammo weapons.

1631727638.name: Bow Calibrated Frame
1631727638.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1633854071.name: Dark Fragment
1633854071.description: This fragment hums with dark energy and feels warm to the touch. Petra Venj and the Techeuns of the Dreaming City may have a use for it.

1636108362.name: Precision Frame
1636108362.description: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

1636533728.name: Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
1636533728.description: Get grenade kills in a strike.

1639160638.name: The Hollowed Lair
1639160638.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "The Hollowed Lair."

1640471548.name: Depleted Weapon Core
1640471548.description: Deliver the depleted weapon core you found at Callum's grave to the Drifter.

1644761560.name: (Heroic) Hack the Planet
1644761560.description: Ghost has a plan to interface with the Nessus core. But he'll need Failsafe's help.

1645158859.name: Under Pressure
1645158859.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.

1646373547.name: A Gift in Return
1646373547.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

1650852150.name: Long March
1650852150.description: Detect enemies on your radar from farther away.

1651632912.name: Arcology Engram
1651632912.description: Contains a reward for your efforts at the New Pacific Arcology on Titan.

1652306520.name: Masked Strike
1652306520.description: Complete a strike while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

1652306521.name: Masked Looter
1652306521.description: Loot five Lost Sector caches while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

1652306522.name: Masked Remembrance
1652306522.description: Complete a Heroic story mission while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

1652306523.name: Masked Intentions
1652306523.description: Complete a Gambit match while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

1655058209.name: Cliffhanger
1655058209.description: Asher has information about the Vex's next conversion site, and he wants it stopped.

1655811178.name: Combustion
1655811178.description: Hawthorne's waiting on the cliffs above the salt mines. Help her get the word out: we rally at the Farm.

1656943324.name: Basic Pulse Rifle Frame
1656943324.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in Artifact's Edge or the Hallows on Nessus.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

1656957541.name: Charge Shot
1656957541.description: Hold down the trigger to charge up a tracking shot that explodes and burns on impact.

1657056865.name: Ahamkara's Eye
1657056865.description: Charging this weapon unleashes a giant continuous beam of death.

1658733671.name: The Roadborn
1658733671.description: Precision kills briefly grant bonus handling, range, and precision damage with this weapon.

1659799750.name: Pulse Rifle Reserves
1659799750.description: Increases the amount of Pulse Rifle ammo you can carry.

1662345671.name: Into the Abyss
1662345671.description: Get Void kills in a strike.

1664208562.name: European Dead Zone Armor
1664208562.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Devrim Kay in the EDZ.

1664927774.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 8
1664927774.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1667376042.name: Gift of Eververse Shaders
1667376042.description: A generous gift from another Guardian with whom you completed a recent activity.

1667892708.name: Sunfire Furnace
1667892708.description: Improves the recharge rate of your Solar abilities. Greatly improves recharge rate while your Super is charged.

1667892710.name: Survival Well
1667892710.description: Generates an additional Orb of Light from Supers and a healing pulse when Barricade is activated.

1667892711.name: Auto-Loading Link
1667892711.description: Steadily reloads a portion of your equipped Auto Rifle's magazine from reserves.

1669012658.name: (Heroic) Lost Crew
1669012658.description: Help Failsafe find two long-lost members of her crew.

1670056281.name: A Gift in Return
1670056281.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

1670941495.name: Imperial Engram
1670941495.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

1671128831.name: All Right, All Right
1671128831.description: Win a Gambit match with a linked friend.

1671674386.name: Venture Capital
1671674386.description: Increases the chance of receiving reputation tokens when completing Nightfalls, Raids, and Trials.

1671775166.name: Wing of the Crow
1671775166.description: Can be found as a very rare drop from bounties in the Tangled Shore.

1671775167.name: Untangled
1671775167.description: Earned by completing all Tangled Shore Triumphs.

1675957467.name: Irrigation Key
1675957467.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Irrigation location aboard the Leviathan.

1678217779.name: Powerful Auto Rifle Frame
1678217779.description:
Forge a Black Armory Auto Rifle from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

1682095403.name: Around the Fire
1682095403.description: Capture zones in the Iron Banner playlist. Earn bonus progress for each additional teammate in the zone with you.

1682861415.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861415.description: "They just kept warping in out of nowhere. I was handling it, you know, until—you get it. Anyway, I wasn't hiding behind the waterfall. Just regrouping." —Cayde-6

1682861416.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861416.description: "Vance still won't let me in the Lighthouse! Can you believe it? Tried to hack that stupid door of his. Almost got it, too. Left some supplies behind for the next try." —Cayde-6

1682861417.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861417.description: "Is it just me, or does the Lighthouse have a lot of broken doors? Well, if no one's using them as doors, I might as well use them as stash markers." —Cayde-6

1682861418.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861418.description: "Got it in my head to scale that canyon on Mercury, the one so deep you can't see the bottom. Left a stash on a ledge near the top. Shouldn't have to go too far to find it." —Cayde-6

1682861419.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861419.description: "Good news: I left myself a note for this one. Bad news: the note just says 'live on the edge.' So… there you go." —Cayde-6

1682861420.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861420.description: "I was trying to find a back door to the Infinite Forest. First place I looked? The actual back of the Forest door. No Vex doomsday machine, but I found a good spot for a stash." —Cayde-6

1682861421.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861421.description: "So it's like a big stone ball, but it's got a fountain of radio-whatever on it. Don't look at me like that. I'm literally describing the topography." —Cayde-6

1682861422.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861422.description: "I have this feeling the Followers don't go outside much. Shame, too. If it was me, I'd be sunning myself on that patio thing they got going out there. Top-notch real estate." —Cayde-6

1682861423.name: Mercury Treasure Map
1682861423.description: "Was actually trying to bring the Lighthouse some supplies. You know, since Almighty ate half the planet. But Vance wouldn't let me in! Couldn't find another way in, so I just left the stash near the door… near-ish." —Cayde-6

1683379515.name: Disruption Break
1683379515.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.

1683816497.name: Shaders
1683816497.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.

1684153732.name: Prometheus Catalyst
1684153732.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1685431615.name: En Garde
1685431615.description: Quick attacks immediately after swapping to this sword do additional damage.

1685575082.name: Ghost Shells
1685575082.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.

1687452232.name: Liquid Coils
1687452232.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time

1692839504.name: Bug in the System (Heroic)
1692839504.description: Corrupt a Vex data-harvesting operation by withstanding an onslaught of Hive.

1694242448.name: Illegally Modded Holster
1694242448.description: Precision hits load one round to the chamber of stowed Hand Cannons. Hand Cannons ready faster and are more accurate immediately after swapping to them.

1694242449.name: Uncanny Arrows
1694242449.description: Provides ability energy for each enemy tethered by Deadfall anchors. Moebius Quiver has more shots.

1694242450.name: Hydraulic Boosters
1694242450.description: Increases sprint speed and slide distance. Improves High Jump, Strafe Jump, and Triple Jump.

1697418394.name: Dark Alliance
1697418394.description: Red Legion Psions are meddling with forces best left alone. Investigate their connection to dark forces in the region.

1700819274.name: Eververse Dawning Gift
1700819274.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate this year's Dawning.

1704828370.name: Sullied Light
1704828370.description:
The Hive weapon master is creating new Weapons of Sorrow. You need to stop it.
Gather powerful objects to sully your Light and complete the ritual.

- Collect Etched Crystals from Lost Sector wanted escapees.
- Earn multiple "Best served cold" and "Blood for blood" medals in the crucible.
- Defeat Hive with precision damage to collect larvae.
- Sacrifice Hive bosses summoned in witches' rituals.

1704959157.name: WANTED: Silent Fang
1704959157.description: Hunt down the wanted Silent Fang who escaped from the Prison of Elders.

1705009261.name: In Their Face
1705009261.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Shotgun.

1708101438.name: Broken Awoken Talisman
1708101438.description: Petra told you this item is your key to following her to the Dreaming City. Spider can help you repair it.

1708410059.name: Roryx Test
1708410059.description: "Some see a fun, engaging challenge. I only see pain." —Ghost

1708415886.name: Baking Cookies
1708415886.description: So many cookies. So little time.

1708677635.name: Union of Recovery
1708677635.description: Increased recovery when you're in a fireteam with clanmates.

1709300692.name: Glory Rank: Legend
1709300692.description: Return to Shaxx to collect your reward.

1709466621.name: Sword Calibrated Frame
1709466621.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1711302444.name: Lifeguard Duty
1711302444.description:
Aunor says that the Drifter has been flooding the Crucible with his followers. She's worried that Drifter's fake-Dredgens will collide with genuine Dredgens, and someone might get legitimately killed. But your reputation precedes you. If you're there as a lifeguard, people will likely behave.

Defeat Guardians in the Crucible.

1711459689.name: Dancehall
1711459689.description: When your space needs some dance in it…

1712870644.name: Banshee's Favorite
1712870644.description: Generate Gunsmith telemetry data on any elemental weapon kills at an increased rate.

1713206376.name: Lightweight Frame
1713206376.description: Fast movement and quick strikes. Use  to launch a dash attack.

1715316155.name: The Gateway
1715316155.description: The Vex stir on Mercury, and legendary outcast Osiris is involved. Head to the Lighthouse to investigate.

1716000303.name: Concussion Grenades
1716000303.description: Grenades fired from this weapon emit a blast that staggers enemies.

1716413779.name: Vanguard Research Engram
1716413779.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting Ikora Rey with her research.

1716988729.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Ikora
1716988729.description:
Ikora is looking for something to augment her new outlook on life. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat Hive Thrall to harvest their leathery hides
- Collect Datalattice from Nessus to imbue the receptacle with Golden Age information

1717486905.name: Gambit Clan Engram
1717486905.description: Contains rewards for your clan's efforts in Gambit.

1718158916.name: The Jade Rabbit
1718158916.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

1723273963.name: Festival Reward Bundle
1723273963.description: A reward from Amanda Holliday for dealing with yet another dire threat to humanity's existence. A Guardian's work is never done.

1723645866.name: Future War Cult Engram
1723645866.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Future War Cult.

1725443969.name: Competitive Dance
1725443969.description: A dance for the most contest-loving of Guardians.

1725667667.name: Black Armory Key
1725667667.description: An ornate key with a butterfly symbol.

1727214349.name: Seek Visions
1727214349.description: Keep an eye out for Visions of Light as you complete adventures, Lost Sectors, strikes, and Crucible matches, or when you defeat powerful enemies.

1727531792.name: Back to the Tower… in Style
1727531792.description: Now that you've completed the challenge, return to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard.

1727646073.name: Black Armory Regalia
1727646073.description: Defeat enemies or other Guardians while equipping a full set of Black Armory weapons and armor.

1728121941.name: Exotic Engram
1728121941.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

1731450287.name: Clenched Fist
1731450287.description: Guarding with Swords increases move speed and does not drain ammo. Shots blocked immediately after guarding will heal you.

1731756697.name: Taken Butter
1731756697.description:
An ingredient that adds an echoing deliciousness to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

1732717825.name: Complete Crimson Days Crucible matches.
1732717825.description: Complete Crimson Days matches to earn holiday-themed rewards.

1733620422.name: SUROS Regime Catalyst
1733620422.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1733820941.name: Visit Ana in the BrayTech Futurescape
1733820941.description: The BrayTech Futurescape is full of secrets. Ana Bray can help you unlock them.

1733927730.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
1733927730.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

1739345730.name: Gjallardoodles
1739345730.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

1741380622.name: Friends?
1741380622.description: Complete matches of Gambit Prime with clanmates.

1741800086.name: Payback
1741800086.description: Land the final blow on the player who last defeated you in the Crucible.

1744115122.name: Legend of Acrius
1744115122.description: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

1744720571.name: Future War Cult Engram
1744720571.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Future War Cult.

1746616250.name: For the Vanguard
1746616250.description: Complete any Vanguard Strike and open the final chest.

1747355904.name: Cache It In
1747355904.description: Loot the cache in Ancient's Haunt, a Lost Sector in the Tangle on Nessus.

1748019836.name: A Gift in Return
1748019836.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

1749209109.name: Relentless Strikes
1749209109.description: Landing three light attack  hits within a short time grants sword ammo.

1749896152.name: Grenade Launcher Dexterity
1749896152.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Grenade Launchers.

1752995192.name: Chocolate Ship Cookies
1752995192.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

1757762246.name: Unflinching Sniper Aim
1757762246.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Sniper Rifles.

1758592809.name: Rat King Catalyst
1758592809.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1759579767.name: Radiant Bow Frame
1759579767.description: Craft the Black Armory Bow by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

1759671963.name: Basic Pulse Rifle Frame
1759671963.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in Artifact's Edge or the Hallows on Nessus.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

1759884967.name: Meditation: "Homecoming"
1759884967.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

1761169910.name: Anomalous Archaeologist
1761169910.description: Grants a chance to receive additional Etheric and Baryon resources when collecting them in the Reef.

1762720585.name: Vanguard Research Engram
1762720585.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting Ikora Rey with her research.

1762796941.name: Iron Engram
1762796941.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

1763144111.name: The Gateway
1763144111.description: The Vex stir on Mercury, and legendary outcast Osiris is involved. Head to the Lighthouse to investigate.

1765290973.name: The Up and Up
1765290973.description: Prevent the Vex from completing a simulation of Fallen combat tactics.

1769115308.name: Middling Reaper Mote
1769115308.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

1769115309.name: Weak Reaper Mote
1769115309.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

1769115311.name: Powerful Reaper Mote
1769115311.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Reaper armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

1771339417.name: Firing Line
1771339417.description: This weapon deals increased precision damage when near two or more allies.

1771897777.name: Augmented Drum
1771897777.description:
Heavy, high capacity drum.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed

1772682177.name: Unflinching Machine Gun
1772682177.description: Reduces hit flinch from incoming fire while aiming Machine Guns.

1777460225.name: Sedia's Curse
1777460225.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Corrupted."

1781061075.name: WANTED: Arcadian Chord
1781061075.description: Hunt down the wanted Arcadian Chord that escaped from the Prison of Elders.

1783582993.name: Crimson Catalyst
1783582993.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1783727000.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
1783727000.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

1784898267.name: Natural String
1784898267.description:
Simple balanced string.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability

1787189405.name: New Monarchy Armor
1787189405.description: Armor obtained by working with the New Monarchy to strengthen the Last City.

1788892384.name: Smoldering Flame
1788892384.description: Can be found as a Rare drop upon Crucible faction rank up.

1788892385.name: Persistent Blaze
1788892385.description: Earned by completing all Triumphs in the Mastery category.

1791416691.name: Create Flair
1791416691.description: Create a random Legendary-quality transmat effect using parts from dismantling other Legendary effects.

1791592647.name: Explosive Shadow
1791592647.description: Shoot tainted slugs that burrow into the enemy. Stacking enough slugs causes them all to explode.

1792562474.name: Avenger
1792562474.description: Land the final blow on a player who just defeated one of your teammates in the Crucible.

1792994173.name: Sword Alpha Frame
1792994173.description: An uncalibrated Sword frame obtained from Ada-1. Kill Vex and defeat powerful foes with Swords to finish the calibration.

1795180951.name: Nessus Engram
1795180951.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Arcadian Valley of Nessus.

1796087388.name: Radiant Matrix
1796087388.description:
A faint glow emanates from it.

Used by Ada-1 to transform a Black Armory Calibrated Frame into a Radiant Frame.

1796393620.name: Ill-Fortune Cookies
1796393620.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

1797869995.name: Leviathan Rewards
1797869995.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Benedict 99-40.

1798676003.name: Bright Engram
1798676003.description: A vibrant engram containing many different customization options. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

1799949329.name: Armor
1799949329.description: Armor for your current class that may be awarded from Bright Engrams.

1800172820.name: Luminous Vanguard Engram
1800172820.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

1802769213.name: Strike Evaluation
1802769213.description: Complete strikes with at least one Black Armory weapon equipped.

1804684565.name: Diary 2/5
1804684565.description: This electronic diary came from the old Bray archives. Help Ana rediscover her past by socketing the data into her personal server.

1806363885.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 7
1806363885.description:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.

1806697845.name: Radiant Sword Frame
1806697845.description: Craft the Black Armory Sword by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

1806698542.name: Adieu
1806698542.description: The Red Legion has overrun the Last City. The Light is gone. You are powerless. Live to fight another day.

1807895392.name: Auto Rifle Calibrated Frame
1807895392.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

1808134965.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Loader
1808134965.description: Increases reload speed of Linear Fusion Rifles.

1809014285.name: Grenade Launcher Loader
1809014285.description: Increases reload speed of Grenade Launchers.

1810079281.name: Dead Orbit Armor
1810079281.description: Armor obtained by working with Dead Orbit in their mission to push beyond the Solar System.

1812356167.name: Rocket Launcher Reserves
1812356167.description: Increases the amount of Rocket Launcher ammo you can carry.

1812969468.name: Purchase Enhancement Cores
1812969468.description:
Coveted components for upgrading gear. Highly prized by the Spider and others.

The cost doubles for each purchase from the Spider on the same day.

1814407142.name: Warden of Nothing
1814407142.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall strike "Warden of Nothing."

1814780188.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Failsafe
1814780188.description:
Failsafe feels a bit cooped up on Nessus and could use a night out on the town. Complete the following objectives:

- Collect Dusklight Crystals from the EDZ
- Defeat Vex Minotaurs to collect their ultra-hard metal

1816807008.name: Trials Engram
1816807008.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

1816867457.name: Create a Dawning's Gift
1816867457.description: Complete a Dawning's Gift and deliver it to its lucky recipient.

1818103563.name: Traction
1818103563.description: Grants increased mobility and tighter turn radius while sprinting.

1818113173.name: New Monarchy Rewards
1818113173.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Executor Hideo:

1820235745.name: Subsistence
1820235745.description: Kills partially reload the magazine from reserves, but reserve capacity is reduced.

1820472737.name: Powerful Sword Frame
1820472737.description:
Forge a Black Armory Sword from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

1823465090.name: A Gift for Titan's Watcher
1823465090.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Sloane on Titan.

1824496860.name: Sturm Catalyst
1824496860.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1824496861.name: Sunshot Catalyst
1824496861.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

Upgrade: Increased range and stability.

1827816196.name: Letter Fragment
1827816196.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

1829956558.name: A Gift in Return
1829956558.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

1835551337.name: WANTED: Combustor Valus
1835551337.description: Hunt down the wanted Combustor Valus that escaped from the Prison of Elders.

1838074630.name: Diary 5/5
1838074630.description: The module has unlocked another log for "A.Bray." It can be uploaded into Ana's personal server in the Bray facility.

1839077078.name: Release
1839077078.description: The Vex appear to be capturing the Fallen, and Failsafe wants it stopped.

1840239774.name: Fluted Barrel
1840239774.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability

1842067488.name: Powerful Hand Cannon Frame
1842067488.description:
Forge a Black Armory Hand Cannon from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

1843625978.name: Sword Alpha Frame
1843625978.description: An uncalibrated Sword frame obtained from Ada-1. Kill Vex and defeat powerful foes with Swords to finish the calibration.

1844309202.name: Burnt Edge Transits
1844309202.description:
Deliver these highly sought-after treats to Master Rahool in the Tower Courtyard.

They do not accumulate progress toward Triumphs, bounties, or quests.

1844523823.name: Confined Launch
1844523823.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed

1845310989.name: Purchase Datalattice
1845310989.description:
A resource normally found on Nessus and of interest to its residents. Sometimes used to upgrade gear.

The cost and availability change daily, so check back often.

1847064514.name: Unidentified Frame
1847064514.description: Complete the dungeon "The Shattered Throne" and recover an Ascendant Glass Shard for the Unidentified Frame.

1848503472.name: Radiant Sword Frame
1848503472.description: Craft the Black Armory Sword by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

1852457366.name: Ghost Shells
1852457366.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.

1853177948.name: Business Time
1853177948.description: Holding down the trigger boosts this weapon's range and rate of fire, and automatically loads ammo pickups into the magazine.

1863355414.name: Mark of the Devourer
1863355414.description: Rounds pierce targets and deal damage over time. Kills with this weapon leave behind Remnants.

1864989992.name: Hard Light Catalyst
1864989992.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

1866048759.name: Hip-Fire Grip
1866048759.description: Ergonomic grips that increase accuracy and stability when firing from the hip.

1878869144.name: Sovereign's Grace Bundle
1878869144.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose future is inextricably tied to Earth.

Contains a New Monarchy emote, 5 New Monarchy Succession shaders, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

1879053658.name: Bow Reserves
1879053658.description: Increases the amount of Bow ammo you can carry.

1881577581.name: Radiant Sniper Rifle Frame
1881577581.description: Craft the Black Armory Sniper Rifle by completing a Gofannon Forge ignition on Nessus.

1882871700.name: Titan and Warlock
1882871700.description:
Upgrade the Dawning Cheer Sparrow by baking Traveler Donut Holes for Ikora and Alkane Dragée Cookies for Sloane, then delivering the gifts.

Must be completed during the Dawning.

1882871701.name: Sniper and Scribe
1882871701.description:
Upgrade the Dawning Cheer Sparrow by baking Radiolarian Pudding for Asher Mir and Gentleman's Shortbread for Devrim Kay, then delivering the gifts.

Must be completed during the Dawning.

1882871702.name: Gunsmith and Navigator
1882871702.description:
Upgrade the Dawning Cheer Sparrow by baking Telemetry Tapioca for Banshee-44 and Infinite Forest Cake for Failsafe, then delivering the gifts.

Must be completed during the Dawning.

1885400500.name: Ricochet Rounds
1885400500.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range

1888512509.name: Forge Super Kills
1888512509.description: Defeat enemies with your Super while participating in a lost forge ignition.

1888588732.name: Hard Truths
1888588732.description:
You are a Guardian of the Last City. You live by your principles: loyalty, honor, justice. It chafes at you that you've heard messages the Drifter intended for someone else. You send him a message to let him know—and further, that you intend to visit him in person.

Visit Drifter in the Annex of the Tower.

1889318524.name: Leviathan Rewards
1889318524.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Benedict 99-40.

1889478731.name: Fireteam Up
1889478731.description: Defeat enemies while in any strike, and complete strikes. Grants Power 640 gear.

1890422124.name: Tap the Trigger
1890422124.description: Grants a short period of increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.

1890642983.name: Crucible Hoarder
1890642983.description: Chance to gain a second Crucible token whenever you receive one.

1891373428.name: Omni-Elemental Glow Pack
1891373428.description: Contains one random Arc, Solar, or Void armor glow to adorn Solstice of Heroes armor sets.

1891880743.name: Unflinching Fusion Rifle Aim
1891880743.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Fusion Rifles.

1892068017.name: Remember Who You Are
1892068017.description: Complete Each Redux Mission at Least Once

1893186832.name: Chrysopoeia
1893186832.description: Complete a Black Armory weapon frame and claim its rewards.

1893323658.name: Future War Cult Armor
1893323658.description: Armor obtained by working with Future War Cult to prepare for the wars to come.

1893992073.name: Shared Experience
1893992073.description: Equip this shader to change the appearance of the Double Rainbow Sparrow. Unlocked for all characters on your account.

1896295346.name: "Riptide"
1896295346.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

1897536429.name: Slow Clap
1897536429.description: Great. Just great. That was really, really great.

1901100184.name: Purifying Light
1901100184.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Strange Terrain."

1901100185.name: Maleficarum Interrupted
1901100185.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Strange Terrain."

1901100187.name: Bane of Nokris
1901100187.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Strange Terrain."

1903831530.name: Speak with Tess in the Tower
1903831530.description: To celebrate your victory over Ghaul, Tess Everis has a gift for you in the Tower.

1907699366.name: WANTED: Karugul
1907699366.description: Begin your hunt in the Methane Flush on Titan.

1912977068.name: Nascent Dawn 2/5
1912977068.description: The module now has full access to CB.NAV and is looking for a Sleeper Node in Ma'adim Subterrane. System logs suggest that the node is inside a natural formation.

1912977069.name: Nascent Dawn 2/5
1912977069.description: Return the module to Ana. She has another reward for acquiring another of her pre-Collapse logs.

1912977070.name: Nascent Dawn 2/5
1912977070.description: The module is reacting heavily to the residual javelin energy you've been shedding since you defeated Xol. It must require access to the Rasputin Neural Net to decrypt this layer of data.

1912977071.name: Nascent Dawn 2/5
1912977071.description: The module has stabilized with access to the Neural Net, and is now trying to sync with an unknown signal. Ana has a task for you that may allow the module to synchronize.

1912981534.name: Challenge: Plaguebreaker
1912981534.description: "Our enemies are drawn to the Blind Well like moths to a flame…" —Techeun Sedia

1913940603.name: Compete in the Mayhem Crucible playlist
1913940603.description: Enter and complete matches in the Mayhem Crucible playlist.

1919923227.name: Overflowing Light
1919923227.description: Using an ability (grenade, melee, or Barricade) empowers the other two abilities. Empowered means abilities have faster regen, melees and grenades do more damage, and Barricades have more hit points.

1923236933.name: Veteran of the Hunt
1923236933.description: This emblem tracks total Triumph score.

1926090090.name: Crossfire HCS
1926090090.description:
Sharp Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

1926090091.name: Sureshot HCS
1926090091.description:
Pinpoint Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Decreases handling speed

1926090092.name: TrueSight HCS
1926090092.description:
Balanced Hand Cannon sight.
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

1926090093.name: HitMark HCS
1926090093.description:
Accurate Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Slightly increases range

1926090094.name: Fastdraw HCS
1926090094.description:
Agile Hand Cannon sight.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability

1926090095.name: SteadyHand HCS
1926090095.description:
Stable Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed

1927916065.name: Unplanned Reprieve
1927916065.description: Fusion projectiles attach and detonate with a delayed Void blast.

1933575153.name: Infinite Forest Cake
1933575153.description: Deliver this conflicted confection to Failsafe in the Exodus Black on Nessus.

1937967230.name: Crucible Arsenal
1937967230.description: Defeat Guardians in the Crucible with Kinetic weapons.

1937967231.name: Crucible Calibrated Frame
1937967231.description: Craft the Crucible weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

1938071654.name: Personal Touch
1938071654.description:
A delicious taste achieved by getting up close and personal.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

1939153390.name: Close Enough
1939153390.description: When Chaos Reach Super energy is almost full, sprinting tops it off. Damaging enemies with Chaos Reach extends its duration.

1940299264.name: Making an Impact
1940299264.description: Complete a strike wearing the full Vigil of Heroes armor set.

1940788333.name: Scourge of the Taken
1940788333.description: "The Taken have infected the City at its core. Every kill helps ease the pressure." —Petra Venj

1941129888.name: Iron Engram
1941129888.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

1941225610.name: Meganeura
1941225610.description: Dragonfly deals more damage based on the number of precision hits dealt to the target beforehand.

1942183672.name: Echo Mesa, Io Armor
1942183672.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Asher Mir on Io.

1946763995.name: Deadeye
1946763995.description: Get precision kills in the EDZ.

1947863700.name: WANTED: Keresh, Champion of Xol
1947863700.description: Begin your hunt in the Core Terminus on Mars.

1949951625.name: Master Guide
1949951625.description: "kkkkkkzk His Highness weeps with joy at your benevolence _%$&*%%." —Benedict 99-40

1949951626.name: Apprentice Guide
1949951626.description: "So altruuuuuistic! So brave! Emperor Calus speaks highly of your deedzzzzz." —Benedict 99-40

1949951627.name: Neophyte Guide
1949951627.description: "The mmmmmagnificent Emperor finds your _$%& generosity delightful." —Benedict 99-40

1954441616.name: Machine Gun Beta Frame
1954441616.description:
A Machine Gun frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Defeat powerful enemies with Power weapons to finish the calibration.

1954620775.name: Timed Payload
1954620775.description: Projectiles attached to enemies explode after a short delay.

1955132232.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 8 Fulfilled
1955132232.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

1956212994.name: The Good News
1956212994.description: Keys to the personal quarters of a certain Executor in the Last City.

1956407267.name: Initiation
1956407267.description: Locate the entrance to the Black Armory.

1957318879.name: Two Flames in the Dark
1957318879.description: Complete a Nightfall strike with a linked friend or a member of your clan.

1966373462.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
1966373462.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

1966791455.name: Trials of the Nine
1966791455.description: Speak to the Emissary to collect your reward.

1968497646.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
1968497646.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range

1971489086.name: The Fourth Magic
1971489086.description: Energy weapon kills boost grenade recharge rate for you and nearby allies.

1972005324.name: Radiant Sword Frame
1972005324.description: Craft the Black Armory Sword by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

1974750772.name: A Gift for the Cryptarch
1974750772.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Rahool in the Tower Courtyard.

1974894064.name: Under the Hood
1974894064.description: Talk to Banshee-44 at the Tower.

1974894065.name: Sight, Shoot, Repeat
1974894065.description: Talk to Banshee-44 at the Tower.

1974894067.name: The Fall Will Kill You
1974894067.description: Talk to Banshee-44 at the Tower.

1975231911.name: A Baking Break
1975231911.description: The fires of the oven are low once more. Visit Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard for a reward.

1980445927.name: Public Event Evaluation
1980445927.description: Complete public events with at least one Black Armory weapon equipped.

1982646204.name: Rat King's Crew
1982646204.description: "The Rat King's Crew / Runs to and fro / Good girls and boys / Know where to go / Pick up your toys and darn your socks / On errands of woe, on errands we walk" —Old Children's Rhyme

1982646205.name: Rat King's Crew
1982646205.description: "The Rat King's Crew / Goes arm in arm / To fight as one / To do no harm / So have your fun and run outside / Rally the flag and we'll never die" —Old Children's Rhyme

1982646206.name: Rat King's Crew
1982646206.description: "The Rat King's Crew / Goes four and four / With good good fights / They learn to score / Then three as one they stand upright / Return from past the wall and wanting more" —Old Children's Rhyme

1982646207.name: Rat King's Crew
1982646207.description: "The Rat King's Crew / Stands three as one / They see Night's fall / And fear it none / But gather close, with squeaking friends / Lest lonely rats meet violent ends" —Old Children's Rhyme

1983861079.name: Enhanced Sniper Rifle Targeting
1983861079.description: Greatly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Sniper Rifles.

1984434144.name: Radiant Sniper Rifle Frame
1984434144.description: Craft the Black Armory Sniper Rifle by completing a Gofannon Forge ignition on Nessus.

1984480472.name: WANTED: Metal Captain
1984480472.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in the Drain in the EDZ.

1984480475.name: WANTED: Drained Captain
1984480475.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in the Whispered Falls in the EDZ.

1984983201.name: Maneuver Warfare
1984983201.description: Defeat opponents while your team holds Zone Advantage. Earn bonus progress during the Hunt.

1986296060.name: The Up and Up (Heroic)
1986296060.description: Prevent the Vex from completing a simulation of Fallen combat tactics.

1987790789.name: After the Nightfall
1987790789.description: This emblem tracks total number of Nightfall challenges completed.

1988113912.name: Solstice of Heroes
1988113912.description: Interact with the Solstice of Heroes statue.

1992361643.name: Anti-Taken Fletching
1992361643.description:
Specialized to fight Taken targets.
  •  Increases accuracy

1996142143.name: Black Powder
1996142143.description:
This weapon's explosives are more effective.
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Decreases stability

2001380918.name: Reputation Bundle
2001380918.description: Contains a large stack of reputation tokens.

2002130360.name: Sidearm Dexterity
2002130360.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Sidearms.

2003108620.name: Thin the Herd
2003108620.description: Direct hits do more damage to enemy combatant shields. Rapid kills against grenade-damaged enemies refill the magazine. Kills always drop Primary ammo.

2008662417.name: Eagle's Fall
2008662417.description: Unlocked after you defeat a thousand Warlocks.

2010132761.name: Public Defender
2010132761.description: Increased loot from public events on all destinations.

2010801679.name: Ambitious Assassin
2010801679.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.

2015125095.name: Fossilized Hermaion Blossom
2015125095.description: Acquired by completing Nightfall strikes, Trials of the Nine matches, and Vanguard strikes.

2016001725.name: Spark
2016001725.description: While Hawthorne offers shelter to those who fled the City, a vision points to a long-forgotten place.

2016450349.name: Vanguard Research Engram
2016450349.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting Ikora Rey with her research.

2016631002.name: Fancy Earrings
2016631002.description: The Dusklight glitters brightly in these gorgeous earrings. Bring them to Failsafe on Nessus, and let her figure out the rest.

2017104093.name: Complete Vanguard Strikes
2017104093.description: Complete strikes to earn Dawning-themed rewards.

2018958710.name: The Hero We Deserve
2018958710.description: Complete 25 Public Events on Heroic Difficulty

2019952880.name: Serve the Colony
2019952880.description: Insectoid robot grenades quickly repopulate the magazine from reserves while the Colony is unequipped.

2022386690.name: Spider's Word
2022386690.description: Nothing on the Tangled Shore comes free.

2025628945.name: Decrease Handicap
2025628945.description: Decrease the Power handicap to lower difficulty, but also decrease the score multiplier.

2025720383.name: Hive Slayer
2025720383.description: Improves rewards from eliminating Hive enemies.

2029153090.name: Visit the Spider
2029153090.description: Visit the Spider on the Tangled Shore.

2029506313.name: You Are Worthy
2029506313.description: Tracks the number of flawless tickets you've acquired in Trials of the Nine.

2030344701.name: Death
2030344701.description: Complete Crucible matches in the Quickplay, Rumble, and Competitive playlists.

2032101621.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
2032101621.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

2032901917.name: Journal of the Reef Cryptarch
2032901917.description: Amanda reached out to you with a simple message: "Found 'em." Visit her in the Tower and see what she's learned.

2034622599.name: Sword Scavenger
2034622599.description: Swords get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

2038017661.name: Blowing a Kiss
2038017661.description: I could kiss you right now.

2039302152.name: Slideways
2039302152.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.

2041229079.name: Hailstorm
2041229079.description: Kills increase this weapon's damage and begin to steadily reload the magazine from reserves until you stop firing.

2042637506.name: Journal of the Reef Cryptarch
2042637506.description: Amanda won't reveal her source, but her efforts have paid off. The journal of Master Ives is decrypted and points to a new lead: the Fallen. Travel to the European Dead Zone, and scour Lost Sectors in Trostland for clues.

2042848612.name: Heavy Lifting
2042848612.description: Gain bonus Super energy from Power weapon kills.

2043215681.name: EDZ Engram
2043215681.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the European Dead Zone.

2044758613.name: Trials of the Nine Armor
2044758613.description: Armor obtained by competing in the Trials of the Nine.

2050509438.name: Hand Cannon Frame
2050509438.description:
Forge a Black Armory Hand Cannon from this frame.

This frame is refunded for Modulus Reports on weekly reset.

2052426051.name: Rocket Launcher Loader
2052426051.description: Increases reload speed of Rocket Launchers.

2053271485.name: Nessus Rewards
2053271485.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Failsafe:

2054312700.name: SC Holo
2054312700.description:
Häkke holo sights. Medium zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range 
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

2054312701.name: SD Thermal
2054312701.description:
Häkke thermal imaging scope. Medium-zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range

2057203855.name: Precision Frame
2057203855.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

2060791019.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 8
2060791019.description:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

2064394295.name: Wish-Ender
2064394295.description: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

2072148145.name: Loot-a-Palooza Key
2072148145.description: A key used for the Tower Loot-a-Palooza.

2073167962.name: Enhanced Linear Fusion Targeting
2073167962.description: Greatly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Linear Fusion Rifles.

2074446744.name: The Seething Heart
2074446744.description: Speak to the Drifter at the Tower.

2076310706.name: Become Legend
2076310706.description: Contains seasonal rewards for Guadians who have become Legend in Glory Ranks.

2078267281.name: Cool, Dude
2078267281.description: Who is as cool as you? No one, that's who.

2078789916.name: Legacy Code
2078789916.description: Investigate the blank spot in Rasputin's system memory.

2079457774.name: Lighthouse Engram
2079457774.description: An engram signed with a key unique to the Followers of Osiris.

2080470161.name: Talk to the Drifter
2080470161.description: Speak to the Drifter in the Tower.

2082610316.name: Meditation: "Riptide"
2082610316.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2083980383.name: Radiant Pulse Rifle Frame
2083980383.description: Craft the Black Armory Pulse Rifle by completing an Izanami Forge ignition on Nessus.

2085058762.name: D.A.R.C.I. Catalyst
2085058762.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

Upgrade: Greatly increased stability.

2085058763.name: Borealis Catalyst
2085058763.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

2087670067.name: An Oath Broken
2087670067.description: Return to Lord Shaxx in the Tower.

2088608451.name: Black Armory Key
2088608451.description: An ornate key with a fishhook symbol.

2089363823.name: Legendary Engram
2089363823.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2091855327.name: Legendarie, by Eververse
2091855327.description: "For every Guardian who needs that purple shine?" —Ghost

2091936097.name: Dead Orbit Arsenal
2091936097.description: Armor obtained by working with Dead Orbit in their mission to push beyond the solar system.

2091936098.name: Dead Orbit Arsenal
2091936098.description: Armor obtained by working with Dead Orbit in their mission to push beyond the solar system.

2092562789.name: The Binding
2092562789.description:
Last on the list of Guardian-grade components is Sapphire Wire, another hard-to-come-by item formerly favored by Hunters because of its versatility. Sapphire Wire, like Plasteel Plating, was another casualty of the Red War… but you feel confident that you can scrounge some up.

Gather Sapphire Wire by completing bounties for Ana Bray on Mars, by defeating Hunters in the Crucible, or by completing an Escalation Protocol wave. Escalation Protocol waves grant the most efficient progress.

2093762600.name: Banner Staff
2093762600.description: Your inaugural staff for Clan Banners.

2099873907.name: Not Forgotten
2099873907.description: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

2101431249.name: Explore the Dreaming City
2101431249.description: Seek out Petra in Rheasilvia. Work with her to activate the Oracle Engine.

2103539490.name: Explore the Dreaming City
2103539490.description: Seek out Petra in the Strand. Work with her to activate the Oracle Engine.

2103790854.name: Scorned
2103790854.description: Follow Spider's tip to the Scorned Barons' hideout and avenge Cayde-6.

2104923550.name: WANTED: Disgraced Bracus
2104923550.description: Begin your hunt in the Winding Cove in the EDZ.

2107367383.name: Glory to the Emperor
2107367383.description: Tracks the number of times you've cleared the "Leviathan" raid and raid lairs on Prestige difficulty.

2108556049.name: Lightweight Frame
2108556049.description: Recurve bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped. Press  while drawn to cancel the shot.

2109436534.name: Charred Celery
2109436534.description: "We truly lost some of our greatest possessions in the attack on the Tower." —Ghost

2110992349.name: Faction Rally: Io
2110992349.description: Earn faction tokens by looting a Lost Sector cache on Io with at least 3x Renown.

2111651017.name: Rifle Loader
2111651017.description: Increases reload speed for any Rifle-class weapon.

2116967332.name: Arcology Engram
2116967332.description: Contains a reward for your efforts at the New Pacific Arcology on Titan.

2117324018.name: "Utopia"
2117324018.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

2117683199.name: Full Auto Trigger System
2117683199.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

2117992050.name: The Lost Cryptarch
2117992050.description: Amanda's coordinates seem quite familiar—they're inside the Whispered Falls, in the Outskirts of the EDZ. Find the Fallen transmat pad and see where it leads.

2118848740.name: Chocolate Ship Cookies
2118848740.description: Deliver these finely tuned treats to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

2119206193.name: Siviks's Delivery Note
2119206193.description:
The tainted Black Armory gear found in the EDZ appears to have come from an unexpected location: Nessus.

Track down roaming Captains on Nessus to further pinpoint where the tainted gear originates from.

2119325971.name: Vanishing Shadow
2119325971.description: Increases the duration of any invisibility effects. Your melee recharges faster while you are invisible.

2121086290.name: Rat Pack
2121086290.description: This fully automatic weapon becomes stronger when nearby allies also have it equipped. Stacks up to 6 times.

2123410592.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
2123410592.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

2129059110.name: Once More
2129059110.description: Reloading increases this weapon's damage if you hit with at least half the rounds in the magazine, but fail to kill anything.

2129470962.name: Anti-Anti-Air
2129470962.description: Infiltrate the Red Legion base and disable their network of flak turrets.

2130042297.name: Taken Predator
2130042297.description: Bonus damage against Taken enemies and Gambit invaders.

2130304234.name: Iron Engram
2130304234.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

2133500862.name: The Forsaken
2133500862.description: This emblem tracks lifetime Scorn kills.

2136479687.name: Strange Terrain
2136479687.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Strange Terrain."

2138431565.name: Fusion Rifle Targeting
2138431565.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Fusion Rifles.

2142527298.name: Gjallardoodles
2142527298.description: Deliver these explosively delicious treats to Commander Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

2154191829.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft
2154191829.description:
Light and stable shaft material. 
  •  Increases stability

2154267066.name: Earn Spider's Trust
2154267066.description: Prove the Spider can trust you by acquiring and completing five of his bounties, then claiming their rewards from your inventory.

2155163551.name: Crucible Engram
2155163551.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

2157651564.name: Into the Abyss
2157651564.description: Get Void kills in a strike.

2157694759.name: Speak to Tyra Karn at the Farm.
2157694759.description: Speak to Tyra Karn at the Farm to claim your prize.

2162502468.name: Random Mod
2162502468.description: A mod with arbitrarily generated upgrades.

2162824284.name: Classified
2162824284.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

2163383276.name: Hand Cannon Dexterity
2163383276.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons.

2167159522.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159522.description: "Do me a favor and just look into that Pyramidion thing, would you?  If the Vex are studying the best of humanity, you know they've got stuff on me in there.” —Cayde-6

2167159523.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159523.description: "Gotta love the views on Io. I remember watching Jupiter float over the horizon, all big and stormy. I left a cache up there, and… fell asleep. Next thing I know, my Ghost's reviving me at the base of the cliff. Guess I roll around in my sleep.” —Cayde-6

2167159528.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159528.description: "Bear with me. I have this memory on Io where I was just sniping Vex from a ledge. Then the sky went dark, and man, I can't remember anything but pain and running and calling for an evac. I know I left something behind on that one." —Cayde-6

2167159529.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159529.description: "Asher called me to rant about a Taken Blight destroying a research wing of the Cabal base, and I'm like, why are you telling me? We're not friends; and then he mentions seeing one of my caches in the debris. Survived a Taken Blight. Not a bad design, if I do say so myself." —Cayde-6

2167159530.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159530.description: "Damn Rhinos. Made off with everything from my lockers when they ransacked the Tower. This one here, they dragged to Io and apparently left it behind. Last ping I got came from their abandoned base on the Echo Mesa." —Cayde-6

2167159531.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159531.description: "The lead I got from Asher was some Psion was seen making off with this one somewhere in the Echo Mesa. He mumbled something about it being on top of some Cabal checkpoint, before it—well—fell into a pit of Taken. And we all know how that turns out." —Cayde-6

2167159532.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159532.description: "You ever talk to Banshee much? He's got this saying: Sometime the deeper you go, the less you'll ever understand. The Cabal are kind of like that. Why they feel the need to drag my stuff into their damn Io base… beyond me." —Cayde-6

2167159533.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159533.description: "OK, another live cache report here… Gotta give the Cabal credit. They're great at digging tunnels. Then again, so are worms… and snakes… and woodchucks… and crabs... and ants… ugh, I hate ants." —Cayde-6

2167159534.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159534.description: "OK, so, Albios's memorial service was on Io. Sacred to Warlocks, blah blah blah. Don't get me wrong, I liked Al—but the service ran a bit long. Ended up betting Banshee I could make a few hairy jumps high up on the Mesa. Broke both my legs, but I did it. I forget what Banshee gave me, but I know I left it in a cache up there somewhere.” —Cayde-6

2167159535.name: Io Treasure Map
2167159535.description: "So word is one of the Cabal's drill engineers found another one of my caches. I don't know if I did such a good job sealing it or if those dumb rhino fingers are too fat to pry it open. Anyway, it's been spotted in some hole near that drill site. I guess Ghaul called them back before they could get into it." —Cayde-6

2168140710.name: Classified
2168140710.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

2168438856.name: Chest Thumping
2168438856.description: Loot enemy supply caches anywhere in the system.

2168438857.name: I'm Not Sorry, I'm Lost
2168438857.description: Enter and complete Lost Sectors all over the system.

2168438858.name: High and Mighty
2168438858.description: Defeat high-value targets all over the system.

2168438859.name: A Guardian's Duty
2168438859.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity all over the system.

2168438860.name: The Hero We Need
2168438860.description: Join and complete Heroic public events all over the system.

2168438862.name: Stirring Up the Hive
2168438862.description: Engage and defeat challenging Hive enemies.

2168438863.name: Through the Crucible
2168438863.description: Compete in the Crucible. Wins count more toward this bounty's progress.

2168981082.name: Show Them the Light
2168981082.description: Defeat enemies with your Super in a strike.

2169340581.name: Ballistics Log
2169340581.description:
Valuable ballistics data employed by the Black Armory to refine their arsenal.

Used to buy weapon frames from Ada-1.

2169515393.name: Business as Usual
2169515393.description: Deposit Motes. Dropped Motes subtract x2 score. Win Gambit matches.

2169515412.name: Lights Out
2169515412.description: Have an ally invader defeat four opposing Guardians in a single invasion three times, OR defeat four opposing Guardians as an invader. As an invader, defeat 25 opposing Guardians in Gambit.

2169736092.name: A Gift for the EDZ Sniper
2169736092.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Devrim in the EDZ.

2169941019.name: Meditation: "Looped"
2169941019.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2170044259.name: Crossed Out
2170044259.description: Disable warp gates in public event "Vex Crossroads."

2172953869.name: New Monarchy Loyalty
2172953869.description:
Pledge loyalty to New Monarchy.

Once you pledge to a faction for this rally, you cannot pledge to another faction for any characters on your account. Choose wisely!

2173508794.name: Defender of the Well
2173508794.description: "We don't have the resources to repair the Well if it fails. We must defend it." —Petra Venj

2177359449.name: An Object in Motion
2177359449.description: Land final blows using Kinetic weapons in the Crucible.

2178028908.name: Brute Force
2178028908.description: Defeat enemies with a Machine Gun while participating in the ignition of a lost forge.

2178159620.name: A Forest of Red
2178159620.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Tree of Probabilities."

2178159622.name: Valus Intrigue
2178159622.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Tree of Probabilities."

2178159623.name: No More Lasers
2178159623.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Tree of Probabilities."

2179275514.name: The Cleansing
2179275514.description: Purge the artifact of its sickness.

2179934441.name: MIDA Synergy
2179934441.description: This weapon grants speed benefits when MIDA Multi-Tool is also equipped.

2182330181.name: True Glory
2182330181.description: Displays feats of Glory across seasons.

2182378279.name: Meditation: "Chosen"
2182378279.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2186532310.name: Poison Arrows
2186532310.description: Arrows fired quickly after a full draw become poison arrows. Precision hits with poison arrows spread poison to nearby enemies.

2189764947.name: Gunsmith Engram
2189764947.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

2192406064.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 9
2192406064.description:
A sacred eye that speaks in lies—upending futures in its path.
The way before us to the skies shall see itself in ancient wrath.

2192598950.name: The Jade Rabbit
2192598950.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

2192678014.name: Roving Assassin
2192678014.description: Each Spectral Blades kill you make before going into stealth will restore more of your Super energy.

2192699203.name: Decimation
2192699203.description: "Our enemies outnumber the Awoken, but they cannot outlast the Guardians." —Petra Venj

2193118393.name: Longview SLR10
2193118393.description:
Balanced scope. Medium zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

2193118396.name: Ambush SLH25
2193118396.description:
Agile, snappy scope. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

2193118397.description:
Powerful scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
