2193118398.description:
Thin-lens scope. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

2193118399.name: Longview SLR20
2193118399.description:
Strong optics. Long zoom.
  •  Increases range

2196878528.name: Remote Connection
2196878528.description: Gain bonus Super energy on Sniper Rifle kills.

2200771684.name: Speak with Tess in the Tower
2200771684.description: To celebrate all your achievements as a Guardian and to welcome you to Eververse, Tess Everis in the Tower would like to give you a gift.

2203680314.name: Basic Auto Rifle Frame
2203680314.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Photonic Power Cells from the Cabal to charge the Weapon Core.

2203768862.name: High Plains Blues
2203768862.description: Search the Tangled Shore for Cayde's killers.

2204713148.name: Crystalline Transistor
2204713148.description: Precision kills with your Kinetic weapon create an explosion in the element of your equipped subclass.

2204713149.name: Battle-Hearth
2204713149.description: Kills and assists you make while standing in your Well of Radiance return Super energy.

2205382146.name: Publicity Event
2205382146.description: Complete a public event on Mars.

2209280306.name: IS 5 Circle
2209280306.description:
Circular iron sights. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

2209280307.name: IS 2 Classic
2209280307.description:
Rugged and simple iron sights. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

2213355989.name: High-Impact Reserves
2213355989.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.

2218275250.name: Chair Pop
2218275250.description: This is going to be good…

2219005833.name: Elemental Weapon Mods
2219005833.description:
Chance to contain a weapon mod that changes the element of an Energy or Power weapon.

Weapon Elements:
Arc
Solar
Void

2219528896.name: Farm to Table
2219528896.description:
"Good. Good. We got Motes—those'll keep the defenses runnin' for a while. But, we're gonna need fuel and we're gonna need food. Lots of food." —The Drifter

Gather fuel by defeating Vex strike bosses. Gather meat by defeating Cabal strike bosses.

2220653602.name: Iron Banner Armor
2220653602.description: Armor obtained by honoring the heroes of old in the Iron Banner Crucible tournament.

2221042414.name: Whisper of the Worm
2221042414.description: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

2221042415.name: Whisper of the Worm
2221042415.description: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

2222463999.name: Show Them the Light
2222463999.description: Defeat enemies with your Super in a strike.

2224123579.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Lord Shaxx
2224123579.description:
The Crucible Lord's booming voice can be heard all over the Tower. It must get tiring. Complete the following objectives:

- Collect Phaseglass from Io to melt down
- Defeat Servitors to harvest their unrefined Ether

2225445033.name: Guardians United
2225445033.description: Complete public events with a linked friend.

2226587760.name: Meditation: "Hope"
2226587760.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2227061199.name: Invitation from the Emperor
2227061199.description: Cayde's worried about a mysterious message drawing the Red Legion to a remote corner of Nessus.

2227664598.name: Eagle's Flight
2227664598.description: Show that your power cannot be contained.

2229716851.name: All-Nighter
2229716851.description: Complete the Nightfall strike with clanmates.

2231414196.name: Sky Deity Bundle
2231414196.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know the power in the clouds.

Contains the exclusive Tlāloc's Wrath ornament for Thunderlord, the Reef Oracle transmat effect, and 150 Bright Dust.

2231414197.name: Faster than Speed Bundle
2231414197.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose firepower can always be faster.

Contains the exclusive Hypervelocity ornament for Thunderlord, the Corrupt Ether transmat effect, and 150 Bright Dust.

2235733301.name: Riptide
2235733301.description: Without power, Zavala's resistance has hit a wall. Travel deeper into the Arcology and help them past it.

2236159170.name: (Heroic) Getting Your Hands Dirty
2236159170.description: Seize upon the Taken invasion of the EDZ, direct their assault against the Red Legion, and end it before it gets out of control.

2238035098.name: Storm and Stress
2238035098.description: Kills with Drang reload this weapon and overflow 1 bonus damage round into the mag, up to 20.

2242078967.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
2242078967.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

2243093675.name: Letter Fragment
2243093675.description: Torn Remnants from a Vanguard Missive

2248837196.name: Speak to Shaxx in the Tower.
2248837196.description: Speak to Shaxx in the Tower to claim your prize.

2250489190.name: Powerful Sword Frame
2250489190.description:
Forge a Black Armory Sword from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

2253030945.name: 50 Triumph Points
2253030945.description: Complete Triumphs to earn points you can redeem for unique rewards.

2256480378.name: Purification Ritual
2256480378.description: Defeat Abyssal Champions in Ascendant challenges while Ascendant.

2257699986.name: The Jade Rabbit
2257699986.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

2261409832.name: The Conversation
2261409832.description:
Enkaar, the Hive weapon master, is hiding in Hellrise Canyon in the Tangled Shore.

Hunt him down!

2263007481.name: Union of Speed

2270228604.name: New Monarchy Token
2270228604.description:
Proof of your efforts in support of New Monarchy. 

Bring this to Executor Hideo while pledged to New Monarchy to increase your New Monarchy reputation.

2271002093.name: Challenge: Deathproof
2271002093.description: "You're causing quite a stir among my Corsairs. They think you're invincible." —Petra Venj

2271249245.name: Golden Sevens Bundle
2271249245.description:
A bundle for Guardians fond of sevens.

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, shaders, and a unique ship.

2271249246.name: Sub-Zero Bundle
2271249246.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to stay frosty.

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, and the Sub-Zero Ornament for Coldheart.

2271249247.name: Silver Starter Pack
2271249247.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to start off in style.

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, and SUROS-brand shaders.

2276139500.name: Infinite Possibilities
2276139500.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Mercury.

2276139501.name: Vex Convergence
2276139501.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Mercury.

2276139502.name: Vance's Temple
2276139502.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Mercury.

2276139503.name: Burning Silicon
2276139503.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden on Mercury.

2277930478.name: WANTED: Gravetide Summoner
2277930478.description: Hunt down the wanted Gravetide Summoner who escaped from the Prison of Elders.

2283361089.name: Letter Fragment
2283361089.description: Torn Remnants of a Vanguard Missive

2284399300.name: Nascent Dawn 3/5
2284399300.description: This module requires interface with a unique node in Olympus Descent. The signal is fairly strong, meaning that the node may not be buried in an icy cavern.

2284399301.name: Nascent Dawn 3/5
2284399301.description: Return the module to Ana. She has another reward for acquiring another of her pre-Collapse logs.

2284399302.name: Nascent Dawn 3/5
2284399302.description: This iteration is looking for new data. The specific frequencies are related to the Hive. Look for areas where Rasputin has initiated the Escalation Protocol.

2284399303.name: Nascent Dawn 3/5
2284399303.description: The module has successfully connected to CB.NAV, but it seems to be querying for data on Vanguard initiatives. Obviously, this isn't data that CB.NAV was designed to handle. It will need to be acquired by manually spinning up strike protocols.

2285466241.name: Unbreakable
2285466241.description: Failsafe has caught wind of Vex tech that could result in unstoppable barriers.

2286586119.name: 30 Triumph Points
2286586119.description: Complete Triumphs to earn points you can redeem for unique rewards.

2286856676.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 6
2286856676.description:
Amid the endless death one flew—Unnatural all-consuming need—
And in the space between the two, accursed comprehension freed.

2287012504.name: A Gift for the Hunter Vanguard
2287012504.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Cayde in the Tower Hangar.

2287556848.name: Slow Clap
2287556848.description: Great. Just great. That was really, really great.

2287699930.name: Broadhead
2287699930.description: Piercing arrowhead that damages the target on entry and exit. One shot can overpenetrate multiple targets.

2289410285.name: The Big Guns
2289410285.description: Get Power weapon multikills in the EDZ.

2289586068.name: (Heroic) Unbreakable
2289586068.description: Failsafe has caught wind of Vex tech that could result in unstoppable barriers.

2292335025.name: Siren Song
2292335025.description: Disrupt a Hive Ritual to keep the Rig from sinking.

2293314698.name: Justice
2293314698.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants on Titan. Complete strike "Savathûn's Song."

2293597301.name: Small Offerings
2293597301.description: Unlocks an additional weekly bounty for Hawthorne.

2294092935.name: Complete Vanguard Strikes
2294092935.description: Complete strikes to earn Dawning-themed rewards.

2294983474.name: Honor of the Vanguard
2294983474.description: You can find this rare drop when you rank up with the Vanguard.

2294983475.name: Strikes of All Stripes
2294983475.description: Earned by completing all Triumphs in the Strikes category.

2296261125.name: Iron Banner Arsenal
2296261125.description: Weapons obtained by honoring the heroes of old in the Iron Banner Crucible tournament.

2299313708.name: Disco Dance
2299313708.description: It's a dance that one must do…

2301231888.name: Meditation: "The Gateway"
2301231888.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2303035102.name: Speak with Amanda
2303035102.description: Deliver the completed Deliciously Cheerful Blueprint to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

2303643316.name: Kaboom
2303643316.description: Get Power weapon multikills on Titan.

2305512973.name: Sharp Flavor
2305512973.description:
A taste that will cut right through your taste buds.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

2305895071.name: Traveler Donut Holes
2305895071.description: Deliver these unknowable alabaster spheres to Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar.

2306441428.name: Supercharged Battery
2306441428.description: Collecting an Orb of Light grants a short period of maximum power that starts with an automatic reload.

2307143135.name: Harsh Truths
2307143135.description: This weapon fires a 5-round burst. When a nearby ally is killed, gain health regeneration and increased movement speed.

2311027942.name: Refugee Boots
2311027942.description: Keep it moving. Swift of foot and long of stride.

2312363006.name: Emotes
2312363006.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

2317587052.name: Unflinching Energy Aim
2317587052.description: Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming your Energy weapon.

2318225451.name: Sword Reserves
2318225451.description: Increases the amount of Sword ammo you can carry.

2320141416.name: 15 Triumph Points
2320141416.description: Complete Triumphs to earn points you can redeem for unique rewards.

2320141421.name: 10 Triumph Points
2320141421.description: Complete Triumphs to earn points you can redeem for unique rewards.

2320697233.name: Mercury Armor
2320697233.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Brother Vance on Mercury.

2321015144.name: Crucible Clan Engram
2321015144.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

2321189501.name: You
2321189501.description: You. You're the best. Just the best.

2326218464.name: Kinetic Dexterity
2326218464.description: Slightly faster ready and stow speed for Kinetic weapons.

2328497849.name: Random Mod
2328497849.description: A mod with arbitrarily generated upgrades.

2331063860.name: Grind Underfoot
2331063860.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests in the raid lair "Leviathan, Spire of Stars".

2331063861.name: Together, For Glory!
2331063861.description: You can find this rare emblem only in the Power Conduit chest in raid lair "Leviathan, Spire of Stars."

2333607307.name: Impetus
2333607307.description: Reloading immediately after a kill increases weapon damage for a short time.

2337944624.name: Make It Rain
2337944624.description: Generate Orbs of Light on Titan.

2338128705.name: Ascendant Challenge
2338128705.description: "The Awoken have long practiced the art of walking between worlds." —Techeun Kalli

2340300214.name: Shaders and Mods
2340300214.description: These shaders and mods—in the colors of roses, love, and other bonds—capture the spirit of this year's Crimson Days celebrations.

2342716696.name: Visit the Lighthouse
2342716696.description: Tell Brother Vance about the fate of Saint-14.

2344113285.name: Enhanced Momentum Transfer
2344113285.description: Causing damage with a grenade greatly reduces your melee cooldown.

2344502022.name: (Heroic) Postmodern Prometheus
2344502022.description: Ikora is reluctantly allowing Asher to explore a plan where he'd convert the Traveler's energy into a form of synthetic Light.

2345892032.name: A Gift in Return
2345892032.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

2346609008.name: Cringe
2346609008.description: Oh no! No, no, no, no, no, no…

2349202967.name: Heavy Guard
2349202967.description: Sword Guard has high efficiency and high defense.

2354839244.name: Crucible Arsenal
2354839244.description: Defeat Guardians in the Crucible with Energy weapons.

2354839245.name: Crucible Calibrated Frame
2354839245.description: Craft the Crucible weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

2355041704.name: Solar Rampart
2355041704.description: Solar damage kills recharge your Barricade, which unleashes a blast of Solar energy when summoned.

2358007759.name: Emotes
2358007759.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

2360283797.name: Crucible Engram
2360283797.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

2360754333.name: Trench Barrel
2360754333.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, handling, and reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

2362667514.name: Vanguard Calibrated Frame
2362667514.description: Prototype the Vanguard weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

2363751990.name: Infinite Guard
2363751990.description: Sword Guard has very high efficiency and balanced defense.

2365513928.name: Shaders and Mods
2365513928.description: Shaders, transmat effects, and Ghost projections awarded during Festival of the Lost.

2367373121.name: Io Rewards
2367373121.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Asher Mir:

2367713531.name: Tincture of Queensfoil
2367713531.description: The viscous liquid within swirls and writhes, as if searching for escape.

2369362080.name: WANTED: Shayotet Partisan
2369362080.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in the Conflux on Nessus.

2371013925.name: Five Golden Rings Bundle
2371013925.description:
A bundle for Guardians who remember even the fifth verse.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.

2371013926.name: Wizened Three Bundle
2371013926.description:
A bundle for Guardians who love three-part harmonies.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.

2371013927.name: First Snowflake Bundle
2371013927.description:
A bundle for Guardians who sing the first note.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.

2371161810.name: Imperial Engram
2371161810.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

2371749021.name: Infinite Forest Cake
2371749021.description: Deliver this conflicted confection to Failsafe in the Exodus Black on Nessus.

2374934928.name: Differential Diagnosis
2374934928.description: Search for any remaining trace of enhanced Ether in the region and destroy it before the Fallen rise again.

2376255824.name: Big-Game Hunter
2376255824.description: Eliminate a high-value target in Gambit.

2376255826.name: Blockade
2376255826.description: Send a small, a medium, and a large Blocker in Gambit.

2376255827.name: All Right, All Right, All Right

2376255828.name: Electri-fried
2376255828.description: Use Arc abilities to defeat enemies in Gambit. Defeated Guardians are worth extra points.

2376255829.name: Sun Charred
2376255829.description: Use Solar abilities to defeat enemies in Gambit. Defeated Guardians are worth extra points.

2376255831.name: Line 'Em Up
2376255831.description: As a fireteam, defeat enemy Guardians in Gambit.

2376255834.name: Lest It Stare Back
2376255834.description: Use Void abilities to defeat enemies in Gambit. Defeated Guardians are worth extra points.

2376441337.name: Initial Consultation
2376441337.description: Devrim has a strange tale to tell of the Fallen. Get in touch with him and learn more.

2377856986.name: Chances and Choices
2377856986.description: Find the methane reactor for Sloane before the Fallen Captain does.

2378129814.name: Steadfast Engram
2378129814.description: A engram containing different customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Forsaken and Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

2378215640.name: The High Priestess
2378215640.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants on Nessus. Complete strike "The Inverted Spire."

2378467684.name: A Gift for the Lonely AI
2378467684.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Failsafe on Nessus.

2381486111.name: Channel the Arc
2381486111.description: Defeat enemies with Arc damage in the EDZ.

2381763476.name: Disco Dance
2381763476.description: It's a dance that one must do…

2383960413.name: Cruel Remedy
2383960413.description: Kills with this weapon heal the wielder. Precision kills also refill the magazine.

2384078014.name: Ghost Shells and Sparrows
2384078014.description: Ghost Shells and Sparrows available only during the Solstice of Heroes.

2384869346.name: Impossible Heat
2384869346.description:
Hotter than a Golden Gun on the surface of the sun.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

2387244414.name: Zen Moment
2387244414.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

2391800984.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
2391800984.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

2394866220.name: Keep on Drifting
2394866220.description: Earned by completing the "Forged in the Dark" Gambit Triumph during Season 5.

2395087958.name: Starter Pack of Shaders
2395087958.description: Shaders allow Guardians to distinguish themselves by more than just their prowess in battle. Inside are 5 shaders to change the color of your gear. Not all of them may be new, but they're all stylish.

2397149812.name: Party in Style
2397149812.description: Speak to Tess in the Tower.

2398132950.name: The Essence
2398132950.description:
Banshee has recommended a number of rare components that you should be able to use to restore your ruined Thorn to working order. First on the list is Hadronic Essence, a dense lattice of exotic baryons and mesons, once commonly favored as an infusion in Warlock fieldweave.

Gather Hadronic Essence by completing bounties for Asher Mir on Io, by defeating Warlocks in the Crucible, or by completing Nightfall strikes. Nightfall strikes grant the most efficient progress.

2398854155.name: Sorrow's Road
2398854155.description: You have all you need to track the Hive weapon master.

2398854156.name: A New Jagged Purpose
2398854156.description: You found a Guardian's helmet penetrated by a unique bullet.

2398854157.name: A Cleansed Artifact
2398854157.description: The artifact is now cleansed. But what is its purpose?

2399682324.name: No More Flame Turrets
2399682324.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Arms Dealer."

2399682325.name: Outlawed and Unsanctioned
2399682325.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Arms Dealer."

2399682327.name: A Flare for the Dramatic
2399682327.description: You can find this rare emblem only once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Arms Dealer."

2399824877.name: New Monarchy Engram
2399824877.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of New Monarchy.

2404852074.name: You're Welcome
2404852074.description: Detects caches and resources within a 75-meter range on Mercury.

2405638014.name: Red Dot Micro
2405638014.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

2405638015.name: Red Dot 2 MOA
2405638015.description:
Snapshot sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

2408007540.name: Danger After Dark
2408007540.description: Complete Vanguard bounties to earn the reprised Nightshade Pulse Rifle.

2408007541.name: Another Night Survived
2408007541.description: Speak with Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

2408713302.name: Auto Rifle Beta Frame
2408713302.description:
An Auto Rifle frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills with Auto Rifles to finish the calibration.

2409031770.name: Wardcliff Coil Catalyst
2409031770.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

Upgrade: Improved tracking on projectiles.

2409470636.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
2409470636.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

2410284308.name: TrueSight IS
2410284308.description:
Light, flexible sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

2410284310.name: Fastdraw IS
2410284310.description:
Lightweight sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range

2410284311.name: Quickdraw IS
2410284311.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

2410543665.name: The First Blacksmith
2410543665.description:
You forged your first Black Armory weapon.

Visit Ada-1 and show her what you've accomplished.

2411453869.name: Ghost Shells and Emotes
2411453869.description: Ghost Shells and emotes awarded during Festival of the Lost.

2412280506.name: The Warmind, Resurgent
2412280506.description:
A reward for reviving Rasputin and befriending Ana Bray.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary Sparrow, 5 shaders from Warmind, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.

2412366792.name: Enigmatic Blueprint
2412366792.description:
Schematic for an otherworldly ship hull of ancient design and ominous purpose.

Complete "The Whisper" with the following weekly modifiers to build this ship.

2412585884.name: Classified
2412585884.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

2413629160.name: Radiant Seed
2413629160.description: Emits a beautiful glow. If look closely enough, you notice its shape appears to be unstable.

2413867249.name: Scout Rifle Loader
2413867249.description: Increases reload speed of Scout Rifles.

2413899256.name: Letter Fragment
2413899256.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

2414281283.name: Radiant Machine Gun Frame
2414281283.description: Craft the Black Armory Machine Gun by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

2414564781.name: Punctuation Marks
2414564781.description: This emblem tracks lifetime Grenade Launcher and Sniper Rifle final blows in the Crucible.

2414725840.name: Satou Focus Lens
2414725840.description:
Far scope. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

2414725841.name: Satou Precision Lens
2414725841.description:
Precision scope. Long zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed

2414923993.name: Precision Weapon Targeting
2414923993.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Trace Rifles, Bows, Linear Fusion, Snipers, and Slug Shotguns.

2416487888.name: Before the Storm
2416487888.description: Complete the following objectives in Gambit matches. Your reward will be the fully Masterworked Breakneck Auto Rifle.

2416487889.name: Aftermath
2416487889.description: Return to the Drifter in the Tower Bazaar.

2420153990.name: Redrix's Preferred
2420153990.description: This emblem tracks the number of opponents defeated with Pulse Rifles in the Crucible.

2420153991.name: Made Shaxx Proud
2420153991.description: This emblem tracks the number of top-tier medals earned in the Crucible.

2420567618.name: The Shattered Throne
2420567618.description: Strike back at the curse that plagues the Dreaming City.

2420895100.name: Extended Mag
2420895100.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed

2421798309.name: Fancy Shootin'
2421798309.description: Kill multiple enemies in a strike without reloading.

2422592326.name: Mods
2422592326.description: Transmat mods, armor mods, and weapon mods found when opening Bright Engrams.

2422825785.name: Gunsmith Engram
2422825785.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

2423772518.name: Cayde's Will
2423772518.description: Take the broken Ace of Spades to Banshee-44.

2426346371.name: Hand Cannon Alpha Frame
2426346371.description:
An uncalibrated Hand Cannon frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat Hive with Hand Cannons to start the calibration.

2427328578.name: Alliterative Dance
2427328578.description: You have a dance! Put on your party pants and prance.

2429049553.name: Traveler Donut Holes
2429049553.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

2433173867.name: Crucible Tournament
2433173867.description: Defeat opponents using a Shotgun in the Crucible.

2433223313.name: Sidearm Reserves
2433223313.description: Increases the amount of Sidearm ammo you can carry.

2433229738.name: Enhanced Rocket Launcher Loader
2433229738.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Rocket Launchers.

2434439500.name: Expired Prismatic Facet
2434439500.description: Once used to activate the Prismatic Matrix, this facet's authenticator has expired. It should be dismantled into Bright Dust.

2435231469.name: Forsaken Character Boost
2435231469.description: Advance this character to Level 30 and to the start of the Destiny 2: Forsaken campaign.

2436012488.name: "1AU"
2436012488.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

2437968453.name: Watch Your Back
2437968453.description: It's your neck on the line, pal.

2439956537.name: Nessus Engram
2439956537.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Arcadian Valley of Nessus.

2441562029.name: Sight, Shoot, Repeat
2441562029.description:
Help Banshee-44 recreate his MIDA schematics by gathering data with a Scout Rifle. 
 Complete the following objectives with a Scout Rifle: 

Objective 1: Eliminate enemies with precision shots. 
Objective 2: Eliminate multiple enemies without reloading.

2443379543.name: Stand with the Vanguard
2443379543.description:
Defy the Drifter to stand with the Vanguard.

This decision has consequences:

 • This character will experience different quest content and receive different rewards than characters who stand with the Drifter.
 • The Drifter will remember your choice.
 • This character will have complete access to the "The Warlock Aunor" lore book.
 • This choice may impact future content for this character.

2446681048.name: Nessus Treasure Map
2446681048.description: "Thought I'd escaped, but you know how the Vex are. I got as far as this energy shield, thinking it was a way out. Dead end. So I dropped what I had there and tried to shoot through. Bam! Right back into the loop.”

2446681052.name: Nessus Treasure Map
2446681052.description: "So there I was, two choices: I could've tried climbing the red ivy, or just jump. What do you think I did?" —Cayde-6

2446681053.name: Nessus Treasure Map
2446681053.description: "I had no choice. Once I saw the floating rocks, there was no way I was going to weigh myself down with extra gear. I was Lightless after all, remember?" —Cayde-6

2446681054.name: Nessus Treasure Map
2446681054.description: "I should've realized something was up when the Vex were letting me move through portals so freely. And I usually have a good nose for traps. Maybe you'll have better luck?" —Cayde-6

2446681055.name: Nessus Treasure Map
2446681055.description: "I felt bad using their wreckage to hide my stuff, but Failsafe said it was cool. And she says she's been keeping the Vex from converting the Exodus Black, so I figured it would be safe.” —Cayde-6

2448407251.name: The Hunter, Avenged
2448407251.description:
A reward for avenging the death of Cayde.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from Forsaken, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

2449148832.name: Trials of the Nine
2449148832.description: Speak to the Emissary to collect your reward.

2449379146.name: Armor
2449379146.description: Armor for your current class that may be awarded from Bright Engrams.

2449744270.name: Renown
2449744270.description: Your bravery has drawn attention… from both friends and enemies.

2452709416.name: Treasure Hunter
2452709416.description: Loot treasure chests on the Tangled Shore.

2452709417.name: Defend the Shore
2452709417.description: Complete two public events on the Tangled Shore.

2452709418.name: Patrol the Shore
2452709418.description: Complete three patrols on the Tangled Shore.

2452709419.name: Shoreline Scavenging
2452709419.description: Harvest Etheric Spirals on the Tangled Shore.

2452709423.name: Orbital Drop
2452709423.description: Generate Orbs of Light while on the Tangled Shore.

2456110611.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
2456110611.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

2456970433.name: Nightfall
2456970433.description: Raise your Power to 260 by earning gear in strikes, world activities, or the Crucible.

2458213969.name: Multikill Clip
2458213969.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.

2458813458.name: WANTED: Ghaul Devotee
2458813458.description: Begin your hunt in the Lost Oasis on Io.

2461527582.name: A Gift in Return
2461527582.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

2463984038.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Zavala
2463984038.description:
Zavala needs something to help him relieve the stress of having lost the City to the Red Legion. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat Red Legion enemies to synthesize their armor
- Collect Phaseglass from Io to enable dynamic resizing of bonded solids

2464214444.name: Tainted Black Armory Gear
2464214444.description: You have gathered enough evidence to approach the Spider.

2464214445.name: The New Syndicate's Identity
2464214445.description:
The Fallen have dropped a clue identifying the Spider's mysterious competitor.

His name is Siviks, and he is the leader of the Kell's Scourge syndicate, a group of anti-everything Fallen, hell-bent on sowing chaos wherever they go.

The Spider would surely appreciate hearing this information from you.

2467293104.name: Ghosts and Emotes
2467293104.description: Show your love for Crimson Days with these exclusive Ghost shells and emotes.

2471849886.name: Explore the Dreaming City
2471849886.description: Seek out Petra in the Divalian Mists. Work with her to activate the Oracle Engine.

2473252800.name: Unstable Charge of Light
2473252800.description:
The charge pulses and arcs with the Traveler's energy as well as something far more sinister. 

This offering to the Blind Well will provide a very large charge to the mechanism.

2473404935.name: Mad Scientist
2473404935.description: This weapon fires a volley of rockets.

2479868260.name: Public Works
2479868260.description: Complete public events in the EDZ.

2480779718.name: Pyrrhic Victory
2480779718.description: We won, but at what cost?

2480873224.name: Thunderstruck
2480873224.description: Land Arc final blows in the Crucible.

2481239683.name: Luminous Vanguard Engram
2481239683.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2481256761.name: "Payback"
2481256761.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

2482418662.name: Longest Winter
2482418662.description: Coldheart's laser does exponentially more damage the longer it remains on a target.

2483066872.name: Meditation: "Pilgrimage"
2483066872.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2483380952.name: Gambit Calibrated Frame
2483380952.description: Craft the Gambit weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

2483380953.name: Gambit Arsenal
2483380953.description: Defeat 2 Taken Primevals in any Gambit match.

2484429224.name: Supply and Demand
2484429224.description: An old friend is looking for Red Legion supplies to… reappropriate. Scour Fallen territory for anything to scavenge.

2484791497.name: Luminous Planetary Engram
2484791497.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2485376619.name: Classified
2485376619.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

2494871935.name: Challenge: The Shattered
2494871935.description: "Is it true that the spirit of a Guardian wanders the Ascendant Plane?" —Petra Venj

2494969817.name: Shaders and Mods
2494969817.description: Shaders, transmat effects, and more available during the Dawning.

2496824396.name: Reap'em All
2496824396.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by defeating hostile combatants. Stronger hostiles are worth more.

2499409254.name: Ships and Sparrows
2499409254.description: Ride in style and celebrate the Dawning with new ships and Sparrows.

2499419064.name: Catch!
2499419064.description: Land grenade final blows in the Crucible.

2499957056.name: For the Public Good
2499957056.description: Complete public events anywhere in the system.

2500308040.name: Marc's Man
2500308040.description: Get Sniper Rifle kills in the EDZ.

2502004249.name: Lost Forge Power Kills
2502004249.description: Defeat enemies with Power weapons while participating in the ignition of a lost forge.

2502327959.name: Chosen
2502327959.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

2505971849.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
2505971849.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

2508868337.name: Bandana Variety Pack
2508868337.description: Containing scarlet, carmine, crimson, vermilion, cardinal, ruby, and red. Bring this to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

2511194732.name: Letter Fragment
2511194732.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

2514786932.name: Bound Hammer Bundle
2514786932.description:
A one-time-purchase bundle containing the exclusive weapon ornament, Bound Hammer, for the Exotic Sniper Rifle, Whisper of the Worm.

Contains a weapon ornament, a transmat effect, and Bright Dust.

2514786933.name: Between Breaths Bundle
2514786933.description:
A one-time-purchase bundle containing the exclusive weapon ornament, Between Breaths, for the Exotic Sniper Rifle, Whisper of the Worm.

Contains a weapon ornament, a transmat effect, and Bright Dust.

2515691897.name: Trials Engram
2515691897.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

2516532331.name: Arc Conductor
2516532331.description: When taking Arc Damage, this weapon becomes more powerful and resists incoming Arc Damage. Kills extend the time in this overcharged state.

2522587561.name: Five Etchings Bundle
2522587561.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know the merits of excess.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.

2522587562.name: Thrice Etched Bundle
2522587562.description:
A bundle for Guardians who prize efficiency.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.

2522587563.name: Once Etched Bundle
2522587563.description:
A bundle for Guardians who prefer a minimalist touch.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.

2522667664.name: Lion's End
2522667664.description: Unlocked after you defeat a thousand Titans.

2525409949.name: Reclaim Enigmatic Package
2525409949.description: The Drifter has a special gift for Guardians who dare to reset their Infamy rank twice.

2525626415.name: True Valor
2525626415.description: Displays feats of Valor across seasons.

2526538979.name: Get Up
2526538979.description: Got any fight left in you?

2528830834.name: Oh Snap
2528830834.description: It is my firm belief that you should not have done that.

2534812173.name: Faction Rally: EDZ
2534812173.description: Earn faction tokens by looting a Lost Sector cache in the EDZ with at least 3x Renown.

2535236757.name: New Monarchy Engram
2535236757.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of New Monarchy.

2535989027.name: Classified
2535989027.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

2536727186.name: Forsaken
2536727186.description: Defeat the Barons on the Tangled Shore.

2536947844.name: Purchase Seraphite
2536947844.description:
A resource normally found in Hellas Basin on Mars and of interest to its residents. Sometimes used to upgrade gear.

The cost and availability change daily, so check back often.

2540008660.name: Personal Weekly Objectives
2540008660.description:
Help your clan level up by completing bounties for Hawthorne each week.

Bounties with higher levels of challenge provide more clan XP.

2541271812.name: Ability Cooldown Armor Mods
2541271812.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that decreases the cooldown of one Arc, Solar, or Void subclass ability.

Abilities Affected:
Grenade
Melee
Class Ability

2542451185.name: Commander Zavala
2542451185.description: The Underwatch is gone, but Commander Zavala is still the head of Vanguard Tactical. Find him in the Courtyard and see how he's doing.

2543787847.name: Bug in the System
2543787847.description: Corrupt a Vex data-harvesting operation by withstanding an onslaught of Hive.

2543806755.name: Funky Dance
2543806755.description: It's raid night, and we've got this fight.

2543982191.name: Meditation: "Strange Terrain"
2543982191.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2544513644.name: Return TYRANT++
2544513644.description: Tracks the number of final bosses defeated in the Escalation Protocol.

2545687917.name: Auto Rifle Beta Frame
2545687917.description:
An Auto Rifle frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills with Auto Rifles to finish the calibration.

2546902820.name: Ice and Shadow
2546902820.description: A friendly Guardian has requested assistance on Mars. Help her investigate falling Warsats and battle a new threat.

2553244024.name: Speak with Lakshmi-2
2553244024.description: To celebrate, Future War Cult offers Guardians a Legendary Weapon.

2556881452.name: Sword Calibrated Frame
2556881452.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

2558839803.name: Luminous Planetary Engram
2558839803.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2560498841.name: Io Engram
2560498841.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Echo Mesa of Io.

2561177094.name: Report to Sloane
2561177094.description: Bring Sloane the data you recovered from the control room

2562261661.name: Victory Banners
2562261661.description: Complete matches in the Iron Banner playlist. Wins award bonus progress.

2564164194.name: Compounding Force
2564164194.description: Fires slugs that cause massive damage to elemental shields of enemy combatants.

2564613094.name: Journal of the Reef Cryptarch
2564613094.description: No sign of any clues related to Master Ives, but there's increased Fallen chatter coming from the Whispered Falls in the Outskirts of the European Dead Zone.

2566956006.name: Luminous Crucible Engram
2566956006.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2569113415.name: Strange Coin
2569113415.description: A curious artifact of the Nine. Present it to Xûr during his weekly visits for a reward.

2570480076.name: Pulse Rifle Beta Frame
2570480076.description:
A Pulse Rifle frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills with Pulse Rifles to finish the calibration.

2571335083.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 6 Fulfilled
2571335083.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

2574447446.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
2574447446.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

2575042148.name: Invader +1
2575042148.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

2576702804.name: "Omega"
2576702804.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

2576752991.name: Guardians United
2576752991.description: Complete public events with a linked friend.

2577707742.name: A Gift from Tess
2577707742.description: A gift containing items that celebrate the beginning of a new season.

2581197678.name: Hunter of the Heart
2581197678.description: "'So the brave Hunter pulled the shivering Warlock to his chest and—' This is what Cayde reads in his down time?!" —Ghost

2584162645.name: (Heroic) Release
2584162645.description: The Vex appear to be capturing the Fallen, and Failsafe wants it stopped.

2587922978.name: A Jubilant Gift from Eververse
2587922978.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the beginning of Revelry.

2589185654.name: Exotic Infusion
2589185654.description: Select a piece of Exotic gear to consume. That item will be used to infuse another item with power.

2590365289.name: Together Forever
2590365289.description: Kills with this weapon reload Sturm. Consecutive kills overflow Sturm's magazine with bonus damage rounds.

2590710093.name: Tireless Blade
2590710093.description: Sword ammo granted for every other powered sword kill.

2591965195.name: Gentleman's Shortbread
2591965195.description: Deliver this tasteful, tasty treat to Devrim Kay in Trostland in the European Dead Zone.

2592651789.name: Timely Dance
2592651789.description: Adapting the power of the Vex.

2600330634.name: Sniper Rifle Scavenger
2600330634.description: Sniper Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

2600906801.name: Dawning Engram
2600906801.description: An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

2602176822.name: The Jade Rabbit
2602176822.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

2604614112.name: SENTRY: Sentry Duty, Full of Light
2604614112.description: Sentry bounty. Generate Orbs of Light.

2604614114.name: SENTRY: Sentry Duty at Pace
2604614114.description: Sentry bounty. Rapidly defeat three Taken Psions or Taken Thrall.

2604614115.name: Sentry Duty from Afar
2604614115.description: Sentry bounty. Defeat Taken Vandals or Taken Hobgoblins from long range.

2604614116.name: SENTRY: Sentry Duty in Once-Lost Places
2604614116.description: Sentry bounty. Complete Heroic public events on Io or in the Dreaming City.

2604614117.name: SENTRY: Sentry Duty for the Awoken
2604614117.description: Sentry bounty. Defeat elite Taken enemies in the Dreaming City.

2604614119.name: SENTRY: Sentry Duty at the Well
2604614119.description: Sentry bounty. Complete Blind Well encounters in the Dreaming City.

2607559478.name: Sniper Rifle Loader
2607559478.description: Increases reload speed of Sniper Rifles.

2610215900.name: Distribution
2610215900.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns when using your class ability.

2610757989.name: Collaborative Dance
2610757989.description: It's great to be able to depend on others.

2617788016.name: Fractured Arrow
2617788016.description: Rekindle your lost abilities by defeating enemies and fighting alongside fellow Guardians in Public Events.

2617788017.name: Fractured Arrow
2617788017.description: Return to the Traveler's Shard in the EDZ to activate your Subclass.

2620589274.name: The Fundamentals
2620589274.description: Holding  changes this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

2620835322.name: Special Ammo Finder
2620835322.description: Increases the drop chance of Special ammo on kill.

2624113750.name: Emotes
2624113750.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

2625406776.name: Pulse Rifle Loader
2625406776.description: Increases reload speed of Pulse Rifles.

2632822675.name: Basic Sword Frame
2632822675.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Photonic Power Cells from the Cabal to charge the Weapon Core.

2632846356.name: Rain of Ashes
2632846356.description: This emblem tracks lifetime Submachine Gun final blows in the Crucible.

2633199258.name: WANTED: Calzar, Scarred Captain
2633199258.description: Begin your hunt in Shaft 13 in the EDZ.

2636847184.name: Suraya Hawthorne
2636847184.description: The Vanguard is reunited. It's time to strike back against the Red Legion. Find out the plan from Hawthorne.

2636847185.name: Suraya Hawthorne
2636847185.description: Hawthorne has moved into the Tower, and no one is more surprised than she is. Go see how she's adjusting.

2636847186.name: Suraya Hawthorne
2636847186.description: The Shard from your vision calls from the horizon. But Hawthorne has something for you before you go.

2636847187.name: Suraya Hawthorne
2636847187.description: Your Light is restored! Return to Hawthorne at the Farm and start using your powers to fight back.

2637670725.name: WANTED: Saturn Survivor
2637670725.description: Begin your hunt in the Sludge in the EDZ.

2638923320.name: Chocolate Ship Cookies
2638923320.description: Deliver these finely tuned treats to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

2639193717.name: (Heroic) Supply and Demand
2639193717.description: An old friend is looking for Red Legion supplies to… reappropriate. Scour Fallen territory for anything to scavenge.

2639211608.name: Countdown to Zero
2639211608.description: Complete strikes or Nightfall activities, and defeat enemies in strikes using the following methods. Your reward will be the fully Masterworked Loaded Question Fusion Rifle.

2639211609.name: Over Before It Started
2639211609.description: Return to Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

2645248361.name: Fossilized Hermaion Blossom
2645248361.description: Acquired by completing Nightfall strikes, Trials of the Nine matches, and Vanguard strikes.

2646629159.name: Luminous Engram
2646629159.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2649911453.name: Dancy Dance
2649911453.description: Sometimes you've got to dance like nobody's watching.

2653453774.name: Crimson Engram
2653453774.description:
An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

It will almost certainly contain a new reward when decrypted until you've received them all.

2654422615.name: Purchase Legendary Shards
2654422615.description:
The remnants of powerful weapons or armor, widely used for upgrading other gear.

The cost changes daily, so check back often.

2655453462.name: A New Frontier
2655453462.description: It's not just Red Legion in the European Dead Zone. Explore the area and see what the Fallen are up to.

2657400312.name: Powerful Sentry Mote
2657400312.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Sentry armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

2657400314.name: Weak Sentry Mote
2657400314.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Sentry armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

2657400315.name: Middling Sentry Mote
2657400315.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Sentry armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

2659365202.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 4
2659365202.description:
A charnel but effulgent orb—beacon in a loathsome dark—
Fêted, fetid corpses rise—a too-long-absent gibbous spark.

2661223204.name: Fieldwork
2661223204.description: "If you spot any of my Corsairs in the field, don't be shy to say hello." —Petra Venj

2662208161.name: Transfer Key
2662208161.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Transfer location aboard the Leviathan.

2662637005.name: Challenge: Heroic Public Events
2662637005.description: "Ah, I've seen how you Guardians fight. Put your back into it!" —Paladin Kamala Rior

2663272109.name: Relentless Tracker
2663272109.description: Visually marks targeted enemies. Deals more damage to low-health marked enemies.

2663272111.name: Upgraded Sensor Pack
2663272111.description: Provides radar while you're aiming. Enhances your radar resolution while crouched.

2663541547.name: Purification Ritual
2663541547.description: Defeat Vorgeth, the Boundless Hunger in the dungeon "The Shattered Throne" while Ascendant.

2664485240.name: Shadow of the Shard
2664485240.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in the European Dead Zone.

2664485241.name: Red Legion Stronghold
2664485241.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in the European Dead Zone.

2664485242.name: Devrim's Perch
2664485242.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in the European Dead Zone.

2664485243.name: Humanity's Cradle
2664485243.description: You can find this rare emblem only in chests hidden in the European Dead Zone.

2669435168.name: A Gift in Return

2671200217.name: Pulse Rifle Beta Frame
2671200217.description:
A Pulse Rifle frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.

2671544961.description: A gift from Tess. Visit her to see what's inside!

2672345035.name: WANTED: Mazan, Lost Captain
2672345035.description: Begin your hunt in Widow's Walk in the EDZ.

2674202880.name: Worldline Catalyst
2674202880.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

2675237434.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles and Trace Rifles.

2679237167.name: Sword Calibrated Frame
2679237167.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

2679249093.name: One-Two Punch
2679249093.description: Hitting an enemy with every pellet in a shot increases melee damage for a short duration.

2680121939.name: Enhanced Battery
2680121939.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size

2682771546.name: Dreaming Token of Eriviks
2682771546.description: The worthless token of a slain Captain, sworn enemy of Sjur Eido.

2683046243.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

2684355120.name: Sentry +3
2684355120.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

2684789946.name: Crucible Armor
2684789946.description: Armor awarded to Guardians who hone their skills against each other in the Crucible.

2684871267.name: Armor
2684871267.description: Armor for your current class that may be awarded from Bright Engrams.

2686009828.name: Devrim Kay
2686009828.description: The Fallen are all over (and under) the EDZ. Return to Devrim for now, and start helping Hawthorne.

2686009829.name: Devrim Kay
2686009829.description: Hawthorne has asked you to help her friend Devrim. Find him in the ruined town of Trostland.

2687049937.name: Black Armory Mod
2687049937.description: Purchase a Black Armory mod. The price increases with each purchase and resets daily.

2693831493.name: From Downtown
2693831493.description: Defeat multiple enemies with your Super in a strike.

2697866396.name: Val-kill-rie
2697866396.description: Defeat enemies on Mars using the Valkyrie.

Ghost tells you that the bugs you planted around the Drifter's shop in the Annex have flagged a possible lead to investigate, but they'll require on-site decryption.

Return to the terminal in the Hangar to audit your logs.

2698715026.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 10
2698715026.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

2699943854.name: Pulse Rifle Calibrated Frame

A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

2706719733.name: Secure the Lost Forges
2706719733.description: Defeat enemies while participating in the ignition of a lost forge.

2707470416.name: The Emperor
2707470416.description: Defeat Calus in the Leviathan Raid

2716564034.name: Into the Unknown

2716564035.name: Into the Unknown
2716564035.description: Enter the activity "Mystery and Potential" via the Gambit Director to rendezvous with the Emissary of the Nine.

2716564040.description: Enter the activity "Mystery and Potential" via the Gambit Director to rendezvous with the Emissary of the Nine.

2716564047.description: Enter the activity "Mystery and Potential" via the Gambit Director to rendezvous with the Emissary of the Nine.

2717996106.name: Triumph Points
2717996106.description: Complete Triumphs to earn points you can redeem for unique rewards.

2720533289.name: Magnificent Howl
2720533289.description: Rapidly landing two precision shots grants a short period of bonus damage until your next kill or miss.

2721885372.name: Dreaming Token of Xavoth
2721885372.description: The worthless token of a slain Ogre, sworn enemy of Sjur Eido.

2723596841.name: WANTED: Valus Dulurc
2723596841.description: Begin your hunt in the Ma'adim Subterrane on Mars.

2724713067.name: Diligent Invader
2724713067.description:
• Wager Motes and win in the Reckoning. Motes must be of the highest quality that can be produced by your Synthesizer.
 • Earn points in Gambit Prime by defeating opposing Guardians and denying Motes.

2726018197.name: Exodus Crash
2726018197.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Exodus Crash."

A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

2727008660.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2729271716.description: Assist or land final blows with clanmates in the Crucible.

2731650749.name: Gunsmith Arsenal
2731650749.description: Weapons obtained by increasing your standing with Banshee-44, the Gunsmith.

2731901709.name: Warlord's Sigil
2731901709.description: Eliminating enemies with melee attacks increases your melee damage.

2731901711.name: Helium Spirals

2731905003.name: Fated Engram
2731905003.description: An engram with a predestined outcome. It will contain a new Exotic if any remain to be collected.

2732814938.name: Whisper Catalyst

This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

2732913576.name: Red Dot-OAS
2732913576.description:
Accurized sight. Medium zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

2732913578.name: Red Dot-ORS
2732913578.description:
Snapshot sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

2732913579.name: Red Dot-ORS1
2732913579.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases handling speed

2733199859.name: Odder Dance
2733199859.description: Or maybe this one is Cayde's favorite.

2735996189.name: Sniper Rifle Beta Frame

A Sniper Rifle frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills with Sniper Rifles to finish the calibration.

2737561850.name: Hammer and Tongs

2741862070.name: "Sacrilege"
2741862070.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

2741975068.name: Slug Rifle
2741975068.description: This weapon lobs large, explosive, seeking slugs when you're firing from the hip. When you're aiming down sights, the slugs travel fast and straight, with higher damage and a lower rate of fire.

2746357568.name: Eva's Holiday Oven
2746357568.description: An heirloom passed down in the Levante family for generations, lost during the Red War, and now somehow imbued with the Traveler's power.

2746484552.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
2746484552.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

2747954952.name: Hawthorne's Heroes
2747954952.description: Grants a chance of receiving a Legendary engram when completing strikes with a clan member.

2751132992.name: Etched Engram

2752185429.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 4
2752185429.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

2753220950.name: Dead Orbit Engram
2753220950.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Dead Orbit.

2754634601.name: Complete Activities on the Tangled Shore
2754634601.description: Complete various activities around the Tangled Shore, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.

2754932056.name: Shaders and Mods
2754932056.description: Shaders, transmat effects, and Ghost projections awarded during the Dawning.

2755895280.name: WANTED: Blood Cleaver
2755895280.description: Hunt down the wanted Blood Cleaver that escaped from the Prison of Elders.

2756705552.name: WANTED: Kurg, the All-Seeing Force
2756705552.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee hiding out in the Pit in the EDZ.

2760383682.name: Ska Dance
2760383682.description: You can do this dance to any music.

2760701299.name: Innervation
2760701299.description: Reduces grenade cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Light.

2762058303.name: Exotic Engram
2762058303.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

2762493820.name: (Heroic) Stop and Go
2762493820.description: Power generators in the Red Legion base are open to attack—but only for a short time. Speed into the subterranean complex and shut them down.

2764373298.name: The Inverted Spire
2764373298.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "The Inverted Spire."

2767578267.name: Nascent Dawn 5/5
2767578267.description: This module is spent. Ana will continue tinkering with it, but in return for recovering her memories, she has finished construction of what she has been calling the production-line model of the rifle prototype she gave you.

2767578268.name: Nascent Dawn 5/5
2767578268.description: The module requires interface with a Sleeper Node in Alton Dynamo. CB.NAV seems to be associating it with several dozen server queries.

2767578269.name: Nascent Dawn 5/5
2767578269.description: There is yet another layer of data within this module, requiring... a lot of log entries on the Hive. The volume of requests may require rethinking normal scouting protocols. Perhaps disrupting a major ritual is in order.

2767578270.name: Nascent Dawn 5/5
2767578270.description: The module has stabilized, but its queries have immediately become more suspicious. It has begun requesting entries on Guardian combat patterns: kills, deaths, resurrections, everything.

2767578271.name: Nascent Dawn 5/5
2767578271.description: This module requires stabilization from the Rasputin Neural Net. Using the Valkyrie will open up the next layer of data.

2769048923.name: The Lost Gofannon Forge
2769048923.description:
The Gofannon Forge has been discovered and reclaimed from the forgotten Exodus Black crash.

Return to Ada-1 and tell her the good news.

2769545932.name: Luminous Engram
2769545932.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2770223582.name: Fan Fire
2770223582.description: This weapon can be fired quickly and continuously. Faster reload and increased accuracy on successive hip-fire damage.

2770239081.name: Luminous Crucible Engram
2770239081.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

2772358207.name: Last Call
2772358207.description: Fight alongside Cayde-6 to help Petra Venj regain control of the dangerous Prison of Elders.

2772363503.name: (Heroic) Anti-Anti-Air
2772363503.description: Infiltrate the Red Legion base and disable their network of flak turrets.

2773612717.name: Ornithological Sedatives
2773612717.description: This packet of medicine is perfect for Louis and his occasional bouts of high energy. Bring it to Hawthorne in the Tower Bazaar.

2775819545.name: Awaken the Warmind
2775819545.description: The timer is on, and your skills are required.

2778705488.name: Exotic Engram
2778705488.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

2779035018.name: Feeding Frenzy
2779035018.description: Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.

2779841496.name: Vigilance Staff
2779841496.description: Your reward for reaching maximum clan level in Season 2.

2779841497.name: War-Torn Staff
2779841497.description: Your reward for reaching maximum clan level in Season 3.

2779841499.name: Imperial Staff
2779841499.description: Your reward for reaching maximum clan level in Season 1.

2779841502.name: Royal Staff
2779841502.description: Your reward for reaching maximum clan level in Season 4.

2780353998.name: Forge Ignition
2780353998.description: Bring any Black Armory weapon frame or research frame to the Bergusia Forge to be crafted.

2781140917.name: The Crucible
2781140917.description: Complete 2 matches in the Competitive playlist.

2782457288.name: Killing Tally
2782457288.description: Kills increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.

2784778949.name: Machine Gun Beta Frame
2784778949.description:
A Machine Gun frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Defeat powerful enemies with Power weapons to finish the calibration.

2785355524.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
2785355524.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

2785662952.name: Expired Prismatic Facet
2785662952.description: Once used to activate the Prismatic Matrix, this facet's authenticator has expired. It should be dismantled into Bright Dust.

2788953856.name: Enhanced Unflinching Scout Rifle Aim
2788953856.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Scout Rifles.

2789669431.name: (Heroic) Exodus Siege
2789669431.description: The Fallen prepare to attack Failsafe's mainframe aboard the Exodus Black.

2792079122.name: Thief of Thieves
2792079122.description: Recover the supplies that the Fallen have taken.

2799093784.name: The Old-Fashioned Way
2799093784.description: Defeat enemies using melee abilities on Titan.

2799886702.name: Comfort Dance
2799886702.description: A nostalgic dance to help one simply feel better.

2800872395.name: Gratitude Package
2800872395.description: A thank you for being an early adopter of Destiny 2: Forsaken.

2801223209.name: Elastic String
2801223209.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

2801591300.name: Notorious Engram
2801591300.description: An engram containing different customization options, including Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

2802980754.name: Gift of Shaders
2802980754.description: A gift from Tess that contains a small stack of shaders.

2804022239.name: Basic Sniper Rifle Frame
2804022239.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in Artifact's Edge or the Hallows on Nessus.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

2805134531.name: Nightmare Fuel
2805134531.description: Dealing melee damage reloads your currently equipped weapon.

2812135235.name: Something Yet Remains
2812135235.description:
Your Thorn hums with the hungry indifference of the Void, but it lacks something essential. You know the original Thorn was intimately connected to the Hive, though you don't know exactly how. Wandering around the Tower to ask your mentors about the provenance of a banned weapon strikes you as a bad idea, but— There are quieter places to ask questions. Places off the beaten path, where knowledgeable Cryptarchs have settled down to do their work in peace and quiet…

Pay a visit to Tyra Karn at the Farm. The Farm is accessible via the EDZ Director.

2812313020.name: Waking Token of Querim
2812313020.description:
The worthy token of a slain Minotaur, sworn enemy of Sjur Eido.

It hums with potential.

2815055915.name: Gratitude
2815055915.description: Now that the crisis is over, return to Asher and receive his undoubtedly effusive congratulations.

2817410917.name: Bright Dust
2817410917.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

2818032566.name: Crucible Tournament
2818032566.description: Defeat Guardians with Arc, Solar, and Void damage in the Crucible. Being defeated in the Crucible sets back your progress.

2818140350.name: Dynamic Duo
2818140350.description: Hold  to convert your Arc Grenade into a supercharged Arc Soul. The Arc Soul functions as an autonomous turret.

2822142346.name: High-Velocity Rounds
2822142346.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed

2824362273.name: Ornaments
2824362273.description: Ornaments used to alter the appearance of your gear, found in Bright Engrams.

2825949957.name: Unflinching Rifle Aim
2825949957.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming any Rifle-class weapon.

2831135136.name: Enigmatic Invitation
2831135136.description: A cryptic missive, marked with the sign of the Drifter. Return to him to collect your reward.

2834657775.name: Crimson Engram
2834657775.description: An engram containing different customization options found exclusively during Crimson Days. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

2836754244.name: Crew Loyalty Package
2836754244.description: A package to reward you for your loyalty to the Drifter during the Season of the Drifter.

2837411633.name: Core Hound
2837411633.description: Completing a clan vendor challenge awards Enhancement Cores.

2839066781.name: Kinetic Weapon Targeting
2839066781.description: Slightly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Kinetic weapons.

2841100890.name: Starter Pack of Shaders
2841100890.description: Shaders allow Guardians to distinguish themselves by more than just their prowess in battle. Inside are 5 shaders to change the color of your gear. Not all of them may be new, but they're all stylish.

2841506332.name: World Gear
2841506332.description: Weapons, armor, and shaders that are unaffiliated with any faction and that drop from this season's Legendary engrams.

2841656848.name: Dawning's Gift: Amanda
2841656848.description: Bake Chocolate Ship Cookies in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Amanda Holliday in the Tower Hangar.

2841656849.name: Dawning's Gift: Banshee-44
2841656849.description: Bake Telemetry Tapioca in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver it to Banshee-44 in the Tower Courtyard.

2841656850.name: Dawning's Gift: Zavala
2841656850.description: Bake Gjallardoodles in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

2841656851.name: Dawning's Gift: Ikora
2841656851.description: Bake Traveler Donut Holes in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Ikora in the Tower Bazaar.

2841656852.name: Dawning's Gift: Sloane
2841656852.description: Bake Alkane Dragée Cookies in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Sloane in Siren's Watch on Titan.

2841656853.name: Dawning's Gift: Failsafe
2841656853.description: Bake Infinite Forest Cake in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver it to Failsafe in the Exodus Black on Nessus.

2841656854.name: Dawning's Gift: Hawthorne
2841656854.description: Bake Eliksni Birdseed in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver it to Hawthorne in the Tower Bazaar.

2841656855.name: Dawning's Gift: Devrim
2841656855.description: Bake Gentleman's Shortbread in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver it to Devrim in the European Dead Zone.

2841656858.name: Dawning's Gift: Asher
2841656858.description: Bake Radiolarian Pudding in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver it to Asher Mir in the Rupture on Io.

2841656859.name: Dawning's Gift: Shaxx
2841656859.description: Bake Vanilla Blades in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Lord Shaxx in the Tower Courtyard.

2848489726.name: Letter Fragment
2848489726.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

2848615171.name: Dragonfly
2848615171.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.

2850152951.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
2850152951.description: A rare item acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic adventures on Mercury.

2850886509.name: Telemetry Tapioca
2850886509.description: Deliver this dismantling delight to Banshee-44 in the Tower Courtyard.

2852891887.name: A Melted Hunk of Metal
2852891887.description:
Despite the burn damage, you recognize this weapon as a Thorn, a legendary weapon capable of severing Guardians from the Light. The Shadows of Yor, followers of an infamous Guardian-killer, are well-known for carrying Thorns. This one is broken, but you think it may be possible to fix it. A reputable (and discreet) gunsmith would know where to start.

Bring the ruined Thorn to Banshee-44 in the Tower.

2853812547.name: Trials Clan Engram
2853812547.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Trials of the Nine.

2855015536.name: Perfectly Normal Coin
2855015536.description: "Hmm. Do you think Xûr would know the difference?" —Ghost

2856291057.name: Dead Orbit Engram
2856291057.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Dead Orbit.

2860779836.name: Forge Ignition
2860779836.description: Bring any Black Armory Machine Gun frame, Auto Rifle frame, Sword frame, or research frame to the Volundr Forge to be crafted.

2862142448.name: A Gift in Return
2862142448.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

2864267637.name: A Lion
2864267637.description: It's not what it sounds like.

2864692676.name: Unbroken
2864692676.description: Find Thumos the Unbroken and take the key codes he carries—by any means necessary.

2867719094.name: Heavy Ammo Finder
2867719094.description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo on kill.

2868143379.name: The Blind Well
2868143379.description: Arcane Awoken technology with the power to split the seams between realities.

2868208254.name: Hand Cannon Beta Frame
2868208254.description:
A Hand Cannon frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills with Hand Cannons to finish the calibration.

2868525732.name: Wheel of Fortune
2868525732.description: Earned by completing a flawless run of Tier III in the Reckoning.

2868525738.name: Virescent
2868525738.description: Earned as a rare drop while delving beyond Branch 4 in the Verdant Forest during the Season of the Drifter.

2868525739.name: Heavy as Death
2868525739.description: Earned as a rare drop in the Iron Banner.

2868525740.name: The Collector
2868525740.description: Earned by completing the Triumph "Triumphant Collector."

2868525741.name: The Invader
2868525741.description: Earned by completing the Triumph "Triumphant Invader."

2868525742.name: The Reaper
2868525742.description: Earned by completing the Triumph "Triumphant Reaper."

2868525743.name: The Sentry
2868525743.description: Earned by completing the Triumph "Triumphant Sentry."

2869569095.name: Field Prep
2869569095.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.

2870095399.name: Thermoplastic Grenades
2870095399.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon bounce further. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Increases projectile speed

2870168892.name: Sneaky
2870168892.description: I'm sure no one can see you…

2873996295.name: Ricochet Dance
2873996295.description: They thought they brought it. They didn't.

2879093413.name: Boxer's Dance
2879093413.description: Float like a Warlock, sting like a Shank.

2885044740.name: Speak to Ikora in the Tower.
2885044740.description: Speak to Ikora to claim your reward.

2885248772.name: Pulse Rifle Calibrated Frame
2885248772.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

2885326917.name: Origin: Nessus
2885326917.description:
Kell's Scourge operatives intercepted on Nessus revealed Siviks's center of operations here on Nessus.

Investigate Siviks's center of operations to track the origin of the tainted Black Armory gear.

2888153229.name: Letter Fragment
2888153229.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

2888557110.name: Full Court
2888557110.description: Increases detonation damage as the projectile travels further before exploding.

2890083513.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Amanda
2890083513.description:
Life in the Hangar can get a bit messy, and Amanda doesn't often take breaks to deal with it. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat enemies on Nessus to collect tiny synthetic plant fibers
- Collect Dusklight from the EDZ to pulverize into thread

2890977363.name: For Glory
2890977363.description: Displays your Glory rank across seasons.

2892535447.name: The Crucible
2892535447.description: Complete 2 matches in the Quickplay playlist.

2895215636.name: No Modifiers
2895215636.description: Select a modifier from the options below to increase both challenge and score multiplier.

2895268185.name: New Pacific Arcology Armor
2895268185.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Sloane on Titan.

2896379761.name: Ghost Shells
2896379761.description: Ghost Shells awarded from Bright Engrams.

2901161082.name: Cache It In
2901161082.description: Loot the cache in the Carrion Pit, a Lost Sector in the Glade of Echoes on Nessus.

2904560094.name: Recycle Synths
2904560094.description: Dismantle a stack of these synths to recover Glimmer.

2904759590.name: Silver
2904759590.description: Rare Reef coins struck during the height of the Golden Age. Of great value to certain collectors.

2905883229.name: Future War Cult Engram
2905883229.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Future War Cult.

2906162525.name: Heroism in Battle
2906162525.description: Complete five strikes from the strike playlist.

2906162527.name: Crucible Crux
2906162527.description: Compete in the Crucible. Wins count more toward this bounty's progress.

2909777697.name: Looking for a Lead
2909777697.description:
Spider told you Drifter might be planning something on Titan. Aunor agrees it's worth taking a look around. Without any sense of where to start, you set a course for the Rig.

Complete a Heroic reprise of adventure "Siren Song" on Titan.

2910842650.name: Enhanced Ashes to Assets
2910842650.description: Gain even more Super energy on grenade kills.

2911045457.name: Vanguard Tactician Clan Engram
2911045457.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

2911106623.name: Fire and Fury
2911106623.description: Land Solar final blows in the Crucible.

2913848309.name: Strength
2913848309.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants on Mercury. Complete strike "The Garden World."

2916228301.name: European Dead Zone Armor
2916228301.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Devrim Kay in the EDZ.

2918247569.name: Flash of Inspiration
2918247569.description:
Just the right thing at just the right time.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

2919298429.name: Auto-Umbrella
2919298429.description: This programmatically deploying bumbershoot will keep everyone in Titan's command center dry. Deliver it to Sloane.

2919598262.name: A Gift from Eververse
2919598262.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the beginning of a new season.

2919938481.name: Teamwork Dance
2919938481.description: We're all on the same team, so let's dance!

2920601243.name: Meditation: "Offworld Recovery"
2920601243.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

2921090754.name: Soul Devourer
2921090754.description: Absorbing a Remnant strengthens Mark of the Devourer and partially refills the magazine.

2922587693.name: Illuminated Engram
2922587693.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 2 customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Curse of Osiris. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

2922990993.name: EDZ Treasure Map
2922990993.description: "Listen, I feel bad making you go after my stuff, so last night I snuck down to the EDZ. Sh-sh-sh, don't tell Zavala! Anyway, I got the cache, then got a tiny bit turned around and ended up in a Cabal base. You know how that is. The dogs and all. Had to stash the goods quickly and get out. So… can you go get it?” —Cayde-6

2922990996.name: EDZ Treasure Map
2922990996.description: "Stashed plenty of loot up at the old mill in the EDZ. To scare the Dregs off, I'd throw on some old Festival of the Lost masks and make 'em think the place was haunted." —Cayde-6

2922990997.name: EDZ Treasure Map
