2922990997.description: “Good news: I remember exactly where one of my old EDZ caches is. Bad news: those parts are Taken territory now. So I guess the question is: how bad d'you want it?”

2922990998.name: EDZ Treasure Map
2922990998.description: "New lead from Hawthorne. Not really much to go on, something about a fan. I know I must have a lot of them, so if you see one down in the EDZ, maybe ask them?" —Cayde-6

2922990999.name: EDZ Treasure Map
2922990999.description: "They thought they had me dead-to-sights… backing me down this cliff. But I could see some fellow Hunters sparrowing in from the highway. Classic. So I sparked up a little Golden Gun and bought my guys some time.  I know I dropped something good in that one." —Cayde-6

2923026987.name: Odder Dance
2923026987.description: Or maybe this one is Cayde's favorite.

2925817709.name: Thank You
2925817709.description: A little appreciation goes a long way.

2927042962.name: Gambit Calibrated Frame
2927042962.description: Craft the Gambit weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

2927042963.name: Gambit Arsenal
2927042963.description: Summon up to 15 Blockers in Gambit.

2927653646.name: Coldheart
2927653646.description: The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.

2928640162.name: Auto Rifle Reserves
2928640162.description: Increases the amount of Auto Rifle ammo you can carry.

2929163318.name: Keeping Our Spirits Up
2929163318.description: Amanda Holliday has a… holiday message for you. Enjoy the decorations in the Tower, then find her in the Hangar to learn about the Festival of the Lost.

2933984410.name: Tree of Probabilities
2933984410.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Tree of Probabilities."

2934007708.name: Welcome to Crimson Days
2934007708.description: Speak to Shaxx in the Tower.

2935851862.name: Struck a Nerve
2935851862.description: This emblem tracks number of strikes completed.

2944769992.name: Gofannon's Fire
2944769992.description: Tracks the number of Gofannon Forge ignitions completed.

2948970730.name: Heroic Evaluation
2948970730.description: Complete a Heroic adventure with at least one Black Armory weapon equipped.

2949415512.name: The Spider
2949415512.description: Return to the Spider in his lair.

2949415513.name: Talk to Spider
2949415513.description: Return to the Spider in his lair.

2949415514.name: Talk to Spider
2949415514.description: The Spider has some info on the Machinist that he wants to share with his Guardian friend.

2949415515.name: Talk to Spider
2949415515.description: Before you challenge Uldren, Spider has some information for his valuable Guardian friend.

2949415516.name: The Spider
2949415516.description: Cayde has been avenged. Now the Spider wants to cash in on his favor.

2951366222.name: (Heroic) Bad Neighbors
2951366222.description: Resolve a dangerous conflict between the Fallen and the Hive.

2956832212.name: Treasure Hunter
2956832212.description: Detects caches within a 50-meter range and increases Glimmer gain.

2958378809.name: Striker
2958378809.description: At close quarters, a fist is better than any gun.

2959556799.name: Dead Orbit Token
2959556799.description:
Proof of your efforts in support of Dead Orbit. 

Bring this to Arach Jalaal to increase your Dead Orbit reputation.

2961190721.name: A Gift from Eververse
2961190721.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the beginning of a new season.

2962326310.name: Cradle Engram
2962326310.description: An engram with proprietary markers. Someone connected to Clovis Bray's networks should be able to decrypt it.

2963333218.name: WANTED: Zerz, the Unstoppable Weight
2963333218.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee in Pathfinder's Crash in the EDZ.

2963333219.name: WANTED: Dust-Choked Thrag
2963333219.description: Hunt down a Prison of Elders escapee in Excavation Site XII in the EDZ.

2968642013.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
2968642013.description: A rare item acquired from public event chests.

2971074947.name: Into the Fray
2971074947.description: Defeat other Guardians with precision final blows in the Crucible.

2972736610.name: Enhanced Bomber
2972736610.description: Even faster grenade cooldown when using your class ability.

2975283266.name: Void Focus Restored
2975283266.description: Your affinity for the Void aspect of the Traveler's Light feels strong again. Return to the Shard in the EDZ to restore your connection.

2975283267.name: Void Light Stirring
2975283267.description: Discovering a warped Warlock bond has rekindled something inside you. Rebuild your strength in combat and public events.

2975594588.name: Winter Shaders Pack
2975594588.description: This pack contains shaders that evoke the best parts of winter and the Dawning.

2976515488.name: Acceptance
2976515488.description: Return to Lord Shaxx in the Tower.

2976515490.name: The Upward Turn
2976515490.description: Defeat opponents with precision final blows from Hand Cannons during Crucible matches in the Competitive playlist.

2976515491.name: Depression and Loneliness
2976515491.description: Complete Crucible matches in the Rumble playlist.

2976515492.name: Anger and Bargaining
2976515492.description: Defeat opponents with Solar final blows during Crucible matches in the Competitive playlist.

2976515493.name: Pain and Guilt
2976515493.description: Defeat opponents with final blows from Hand Cannons during Crucible matches in the Competitive playlist.

2976515494.name: Shock and Denial
2976515494.description: Complete Crucible matches in the Competitive playlist.

2977071352.name: Crucible Armor
2977071352.description: Armor awarded to Guardians who hone their skills against each other in the Crucible.

2977709078.name: Excavation
2977709078.description: Hold  to fire grenades. Release to detonate all live grenades simultaneously. Grenades stick to surfaces and set targets on fire.

2978634986.name: Ingredient
2978634986.description:
Choose an ingredient from the list below.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

2984830573.name: Throwing Shade
2984830573.description: Land Void final blows in the Crucible.

2985827016.name: Alloy Casing
2985827016.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability

2988193930.name: Journal of the Reef Cryptarch
2988193930.description: Amanda Holliday gave you the journal of Master Ives, but it's empty. The lost pages are found scattered across the decryption algorithms of Legendary and Exotic engrams, and in the possession of challenging Fallen enemies in the EDZ.

2989917675.name: Radiant Machine Gun Frame
2989917675.description: Craft the Black Armory Machine Gun by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

2993731985.name: Taken Anomaly
2993731985.description: Investigate the Taken anomaly on Io

2994361566.name: Machine Gun Alpha Frame
2994361566.description:
An uncalibrated Machine Gun frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat large numbers of Hive with Power weapons to start the calibration.

2995158922.name: Deathless
2995158922.description: Clear out the Knight that's keeping Sloane's crews from their work.

2996600235.name: Speak to Ikora Rey
2996600235.description: Talk to Ikora Rey in the City.

3000903801.name: Crimson Engram
3000903801.description:
An engram with vibrant encoding markers. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

It will almost certainly contain a new reward when decrypted until you've received them all.

3002413488.name: War in All Times Bundle
3002413488.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose future is perpetual conflict.

Contains a Future War Cult emote, 5 War Cult Endgame shaders, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

3002413489.name: Inevitable Exodus Bundle
3002413489.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose future is among the stars.

Contains a Dead Orbit emote, 5 Dead Orbit Resurrection shaders, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

3002413496.name: Sleeper's Bundle
3002413496.description: Lull your enemies to sleep as they burn to a crisp—and do it in style, with this stunning weapon ornament for Sleeper Simulant.

3002413497.name: Discovery Bundle
3002413497.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose eyes are on the stars.

Contains Season 3 shaders, Bright Engrams, and 500 Bright Dust.

3002413498.name: BrayTech Bundle
3002413498.description:
A bundle for Guardians who want to evoke the heights of the Golden Age.

Contains a Legendary jumpship, a Legendary Sparrow, a Legendary Ghost Shell, and 10 Clovis Bray shaders.

3002413499.name: Deep Freeze Bundle
3002413499.description:
A bundle for Guardians who want to survive the ice caps of Mars.

Contains the Azure Azazyel Sparrow, a transmat effect, and 10 shaders.

3002413500.name: Boons of Bray Bundle
3002413500.description:
A bundle for Guardians who embrace the new way of things.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.

3002413501.name: Destructive Research Bundle
3002413501.description:
A bundle for Guardians who've bonded with a returning legend.

Contains a weapon ornament for Polaris Lance, 3 Gleaming Boons of the Vanguard, and 3 Fireteam Medallions.

3002413502.name: Iron Ornament Bundle
3002413502.description:
A bundle for Guardians who live for the Iron Banner.

Contains a weapon ornament for Fighting Lion, 2 Gleaming Boons of the Crucible, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

3002413503.name: Iron Emote Bundle
3002413503.description:
A bundle for Guardians who remember the Iron Lords.

Contains an Iron Lord emote, 1 Gleaming Boon of the Crucible, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

3003891337.name: Shaders
3003891337.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.

3005212482.name: Destroyer of Worlds
3005212482.description: Board the world-eater vessel and defeat raid "Leviathan." Grow fat from strength.

3005544357.name: Vanguard Research Rewards
3005544357.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Ikora Rey:

3009732594.name: "Hope"
3009732594.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

3009759248.name: Resting Storm Bundle
3009759248.description:
A bundle for any Stormcaller who relishes moments of silence.

Contains the exclusive class-locked Stormcaller's Patience emote, 1 Fireteam Medallion, and 150 Bright Dust.

3009759249.name: Lightning Before Thunder Bundle
3009759249.description:
A bundle for any Striker who knows that time is on their side.

Contains the exclusive class-locked Striker's Patience emote, 1 Fireteam Medallion, and 150 Bright Dust.

3009759251.name: A Guardian's Best Friend Bundle
3009759251.description:
A bundle for any Guardian who wishes they could flip a coin and instantly receive unconditional love and constant companionship. And hair. So much hair.

Contains the exclusive emote Good Doggo, 1 Fireteam Medallion, and the Jade Coin transmat effect.

3010945892.name: Cache It In
3010945892.description: Loot the cache in the Quarry, a Lost Sector in the Sunken Isles of the EDZ.

3013363601.name: Playin' the Odds
3013363601.description: This emblem tracks lifetime Gambit Infamy rank resets.

3015667944.name: A Gift for the Crucible Master
3015667944.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Shaxx in the Tower Courtyard.

3018123692.name: Complete Vanguard Strikes
3018123692.description: Complete strikes to earn Dawning-themed rewards.

3020011541.name: The Long Play
3020011541.description: The Taken are assembling a new army to march on the Vex Collective. It is essential to stop them.

3022817118.name: Classified
3022817118.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

3022958964.name: Forge Saboteurs Hunt
3022958964.description:
Eliminate one of the Forge Saboteurs roaming around the lost forges.

Track them down in the Outskirts and the Gulch in the EDZ, and in Artifact's Edge and the Hallows on Nessus.

3030428920.name: Meditation: "Sacrilege"
3030428920.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

3032599245.name: Blinding Grenades
3032599245.description:
Grenade detonation has a brief blinding effect.
  •  Greatly decreases blast radius.

3035639340.name: Enhanced Hand Cannon Loader
3035639340.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Hand Cannons.

3038247973.name: Explosive Payload
3038247973.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact.

3038889598.name: Lantern Effects
3038889598.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

3040029584.name: Persistence of Vision
3040029584.description: Create Orbs of Light on Io.

3040412000.name: Advanced Paradox Amplifier
3040412000.description: Use to charge certain Prophecy Tablets. Using on an incorrect Tablet will still consume this offering. Acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic Mercury adventures.

3041136324.name: Cower
3041136324.description: Make it stop! Make it stop!

3045177304.name: Dawning's Gift: Drifter
3045177304.description: Bake Dark Chocolate Motes in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to the Drifter in the Tower Bazaar.

3045177305.name: Dawning's Gift: Ana
3045177305.description: Bake a Javelin Mooncake in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver it to Ana Bray in the Braytech Futurescape on Mars.

3045177306.name: Dawning's Gift: Petra
3045177306.description: Bake Ill-Fortune Cookies in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Petra Venj wherever she can be found in the Reef.

3045177307.name: Dawning's Gift: Spider
3045177307.description: Bake Candy Dead Ghosts in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to the Spider in his safehouse on the Tangled Shore.

3045177309.name: Dawning's Gift: Xûr
3045177309.description: Bake Strange Cookies in Eva's Holiday Oven, and deliver them to Xûr wherever the Nine have wished him to be.

3046697327.name: Between the Eyes
3046697327.description: Land precision final blows in the Crucible.

3047801520.name: Collector +3
3047801520.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

3047969693.name: Desperado
3047969693.description: Reloading while Outlaw is active increases your rate of fire.

3053363606.name: Powerful Sniper Rifle Frame
3053363606.description:
Forge a Black Armory Sniper Rifle from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

3053969994.name: Deep Storage
3053969994.description: Search the Pyramidion on Io for a map of the Infinite Forest to guide you to Panoptes.

3054567270.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Scavenger
3054567270.description: Linear Fusion Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

3056553352.name: Gunsmith Engram
3056553352.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

3058308164.name: A Gift for the Gunsmith
3058308164.description: Return the completed Dawning's Gift to Banshee in the Tower Courtyard.

3067573579.name: The Traveler, Alive (Titan)
3067573579.description:
A reward for defeating Ghaul and saving the Last City.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from the Red War, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

3069341742.name: Bow Targeting
3069341742.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Bows.

3070068572.name: Reconfigure Flair
3070068572.description: Generate a new random transmat effect by combining components from other effects.

3072425059.name: Bad Neighbors
3072425059.description: Resolve a dangerous conflict between the Fallen and the Hive.

3074658833.name: Hope
3074658833.description: Commander Zavala is building a resistance at a moon of Saturn. Make contact and join the fight.

3075556640.name: Sign of the Future
3075556640.description:
"Our Red War prophecy came true. We were ready, the others were not." —Lakshmi-2, Future War Cult Superior

Once you pledge to a faction during this Faction Rally, you can no longer use the other two factions' emotes until this Rally ends.

3076517070.name: Suraya Hawthorne
3076517070.description: The Vanguard is reunited. It's time to strike back against the Red Legion. Find out the plan from Hawthorne.

3081173348.name: The Fundamentals
3081173348.description: Holding  changes this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

3081361536.name: Pulse Rifle Scavenger
3081361536.description: Pulse Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

3081867624.name: Master of Arms
3081867624.description: Kills with any weapon improve this weapon's damage for a short time.

3085039018.name: Glimmer
3085039018.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.

3087039277.name: Spooky Eververse Gift
3087039277.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the Festival of the Lost.

3089161515.name: Corsair Down
3089161515.description: The fieldcom device crackles weakly. You can just hear an encoded SOS, repeating something about a bay.

3089965770.name: Vengeance of Valhalla
3089965770.description: Defeat multiple enemies at a time on Mars using the Valkyrie.

3096702027.name: Genesis
3096702027.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.

3100590152.name: MIDA Radar
3100590152.description: Radar stays active while aiming down sights.

3101704126.name: Armor
3101704126.description: Armor for your current class that may be awarded from Bright Engrams.

3101758893.name: Etched Engram
3101758893.description: An engram containing different customization options, including Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

3103393814.name: Classified
3103393814.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

3104672106.name: Cayde-6
3104672106.description: Cayde has officially resumed his duties as Vanguard Scout. Find him in the Hangar and catch up.

3105935002.name: Sunbreaker
3105935002.description: Forge the fury of undying suns.

3107896334.name: Gunsmith Engram
3107896334.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

3118323620.name: Drink at the Well
3118323620.description: Can be found as a rare drop after you defeat any Plague of the Well.

3118323621.name: Transcendent
3118323621.description: Earned by completing all Ascendant challenge time trials.

3124601568.name: Spring Cleaning Bundle
3124601568.description:
A bundle for any Guardian with their thoughts on those who came before us.

Contains the exclusive Qingming ornament for Jade Rabbit, the Spring Fountain transmat effect, and 150 Bright Dust.

3124601570.name: Hop Along Bundle
3124601570.description:
A bundle for any Guardian who believes rabbits are a symbol of good luck.

Contains the exclusive Cottontail Shell Ghost, 3 Jubilant Engrams, and 5 shaders from the Revelry.

3124601571.name: Mood to Party Bundle
3124601571.description:
A bundle for any Guardian looking to jump headlong into the festivities of the Revelry.

Contains 5 Jubilant Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 250 Bright Dust.

3124871000.name: Outlaw
3124871000.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.

3125472888.name: Fire and Fury
3125472888.description: Land Solar final blows in the Crucible.

3126703610.name: Radiant Machine Gun Frame
3126703610.description: Craft the Black Armory Machine Gun by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

3129880544.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880544.description: "So this cache… I don't know. It seemed like a good idea at the time. How do you feel about climbing trees?" —Cayde-6

3129880545.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880545.description: "So down I went. I thought maybe the deeper it got, the better access I would have to their core Mind or Nexus points. I do read Ikora's Vex reports. Sometimes. Anyway, found nothing but roots." —Cayde-6

3129880546.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880546.description: "I guess I was afraid that Mind juice would somehow seize control of my weapons or something. That stuff isn't some kind of luxurious milk bath, trust me." —Cayde-6

3129880547.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880547.description: "I was just doing what Failsafe said. I mean, she seems reliable, half the time. So I entered this cave and set up my little fallback point, took a few steps in, and bam, the battle began." —Cayde-6

3129880548.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880548.description: "One point, I thought I'd broken free, so I made a break for a path through a tangle of roots. Caught sight of the cache and then bam, I was back in the loop again." —Cayde-6

3129880549.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880549.description: "Of course, I didn't go charging into Nessus without a plan. I made sure I had caches everywhere. Started with the first dead Vex construct I found." —Cayde-6

3129880550.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880550.description: "I don't know what they call it. The eyeball thing. Under that. You'll know it when you see it." —Cayde-6

3129880551.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880551.description: "It was like I was being called closer, like something wanted my help. Then I get to this tower with a triangular doorway and go through. That's when it got really weird." —Cayde-6

3129880556.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880556.description: "I wonder if the Vex even realize I hide stuff between the gaps in their block networks. Hmmm. Maybe that's how they know so much about me." —Cayde-6

3129880557.name: Nessus Treasure Map
3129880557.description: "Good news: I left myself a reminder note for this cache! Bad news: the note says ‘Whatever you do, under any circumstances, do not look down.' That's enough to go on, right?”

3130957805.name: The Temptation
3130957805.description:
Want to see what this artifact can do?

Feed it Light by defeating Guardians in the Crucible. Being defeated will impede progress.

3131895545.name: Unflinching Sidearm Aim
3131895545.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Sidearms.

3134905452.name: City Dance
3134905452.description: "Oh, so you can do a backspin? Watch and learn!" —Lord Shaxx

3135119576.name: Crucible Cash
3135119576.description: Gain bonus Glimmer when completing Crucible matches.

3135533115.name: Electric Flavor
3135533115.description:
It courses through everything we touch... and taste.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

3138331493.name: Motes! Fast!
3138331493.description:
"Okay. You bought us some time, but we gotta pick up the pace. Work on an accelerated timeline. Listen. I need you to get as many Motes as you can. Route 'em straight to me. I'll explain everything later." —The Drifter

Bank Motes in Gambit or Gambit Prime.

3142289711.name: Accurized Rounds
3142289711.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range

3145463456.name: An Arsenal of Tricks
3145463456.description: Defeat opponents with final blows from any ability. Earn bonus progress for Supers and opponents with a higher Power level.

3146477522.name: EDZ Engram
3146477522.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the European Dead Zone.

3147280338.name: Silver
3147280338.description: Rare Reef coins struck during the height of the Golden Age. Of great value to certain collectors.

3147530190.name: Trials Engram
3147530190.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

3147640224.name: Rasputin Armory Code
3147640224.description: A single-use cipher to access Rasputin's emergency weapon reserves.

3148236515.name: Kill It with Fire
3148236515.description: Get Solar kills in a strike.

3150716013.name: Basic Machine Gun Frame
3150716013.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

3151536500.name: SPO-28 Front
3151536500.description:
SUROS holo sights. Medium zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

3151536501.name: SPO-57 Front
3151536501.description:
SUROS threat evaluation. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

3151536503.name: SPO-26 Front
3151536503.description:
SUROS lightweight red-dot sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases range

3151770741.name: Winterdrift Engram
3151770741.description: An engram containing different customization options found exclusively during the Dawning. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

3153402106.name: (Heroic) Unexpected Guests
3153402106.description: Ikora's worried about some Taken emanations from beneath the moon's surface.

3159615086.name: Glimmer
3159615086.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.

3161446425.name: Bug in the System
3161446425.description: Corrupt a Vex data-harvesting operation by withstanding an onslaught of Hive.

3161816588.name: Slideshot
3161816588.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.

3162804764.name: Powerful Invader Mote
3162804764.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3162804766.name: Weak Invader Mote
3162804766.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3162804767.name: Middling Invader Mote
3162804767.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3162844631.name: Basic Machine Gun Frame
3162844631.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in the Outskirts or the Gulch of the EDZ.
- Obtain Compound Ether from the Fallen to charge the Weapon Core.

3164154904.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 7
3164154904.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3164163668.name: Speak with Arach Jalaal
3164163668.description: To celebrate, Dead Orbit offers Guardians a Legendary Weapon.

3165700730.name: Spring into Action
3165700730.description: There are rumors floating around the Tower that Osiris may have hijacked the Infinite Forest to run his own simulation. Enter the Verdant Forest to judge that for yourself.

3167196501.name: A Gift in Return
3167196501.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

3168101969.name: Bright Dust
3168101969.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

3169607361.name: Emotes
3169607361.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

3170949474.name: Pulse Rifle Alpha Frame
3170949474.description:
An uncalibrated Pulse Rifle frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills and defeat Scorn with Pulse Rifles to start the calibration.

3173533365.name: Shaders
3173533365.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.

3173727367.name: The Obsidian Accelerator
3173727367.description: The ancient weapon frame has opened to reveal… something unexpected. Take it to Ada-1 to figure out what it is.

3174068456.name: Final Check-In
3174068456.description: Speak with Hawthorne in the Tower one last time.

3174068458.name: Return to Hawthorne
3174068458.description: Speak with Hawthorne in the Tower.

3174068459.name: Progress Report
3174068459.description: Speak with Hawthorne in the Tower.

3174366925.name: Bow Alpha Frame
3174366925.description:
An uncalibrated Bow frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills and defeat Taken with Bows to start the calibration.

3177308360.name: Steady Rounds
3177308360.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range

3177615969.name: Auto Rifle Dexterity
3177615969.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Auto Rifles and Trace Rifles.

3179188489.name: Curtain Call
3179188489.description: Thank you, thank you! Oh, thank you!

3179992453.name: For the Armory
3179992453.description: Complete Black Armory daily bounties over the course of the week.

3183180185.name: Emotes
3183180185.description: Allows for the configuration of equipped emotes from your entire emote collection.

3183598773.name: Gofannon Forge Ignitions
3183598773.description: Complete ignitions of the lost Gofannon Forge on Nessus.

3186242776.name: Payback
3186242776.description: Time for Zavala's grand entrance—finally attacking the Red Legion base in the EDZ head-on.

3186325460.name: Displays of Affection
3186325460.description: Complete public events in a fireteam of two.

3186325461.name: Love Story
3186325461.description: Complete a story mission in a fireteam of two.

3186325462.name: Two's Company
3186325462.description: Complete an adventure in a fireteam of two.

3186325463.name: Loved and Lost
3186325463.description: Loot a Lost Sector in a fireteam of two.

3187140226.name: Deep Conversation
3187140226.description: Failsafe has a plan to retrieve Vex data. But she'll need Ghost's help.

3189251502.name: Fistfuls of Bullets
3189251502.description: Melee kills overload the magazine to double its capacity.

3189772341.name: Sniper Rifle Dexterity
3189772341.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Sniper Rifles.

3191466416.name: Imperial Engram
3191466416.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

3192779410.name: From the Mouths of Babes
3192779410.description: Return to Shaxx to claim the Recluse.

3194959243.name: Memory Evaluation
3194959243.description: Complete a daily Heroic story mission with at least one Black Armory weapon equipped.

3195063045.name: Asher Mir
3195063045.description: Asher Mir has an idea for how to deal with the Almighty. Find him in the Rupture.

3196242660.name: Base Frame
3196242660.description: Original manufacturer's frame, with no modifications.

3199320591.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 9 Fulfilled
3199320591.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3201469151.name: Cerebral Explosion
3201469151.description: The universe contains mysteries that would shatter the minds of the unready.

3201772785.name: Power Weapon Targeting
3201772785.description: Slightly improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Power weapons.

3202154035.name: Not a Weapon
3202154035.description:
Whatever this artifact is, it's definitely not the weapon you were expecting.

Return to Ada-1 and show her the artifact you forged.

3205137978.name: Radiolarian Pudding
3205137978.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

3207732940.name: Ascendant Challenge
3207732940.description: "The Awoken have long practiced the art of walking between worlds." —Techeun Kalli

3208839961.name: Four-Headed Dog
3208839961.description: Shoots erratic bullets from all gun barrels at the same time.

3210179545.name: Victory Taunt
3210179545.description: The Fallen have some good taunts.

3210602102.name: Gjallardoodles
3210602102.description: Deliver these explosively delicious treats to Commander Zavala in the Tower Courtyard.

3210853326.name: Letter Fragment
3210853326.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

3215252549.name: Determination
3215252549.description: This emblem tracks the number of Heroic story missions completed.

3215463713.name: Bright Engram
3215463713.description: A vibrant engram containing many different customization options. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

3217885969.name: Unknown
3217885969.description: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

3219234253.name: Two Flames in the Dark
3219234253.description: Complete a Nightfall strike with a linked friend.

3221031499.name: Super Efficient
3221031499.description: Defeat multiple enemies with a single Super while on Titan.

3221267833.name: Cache It In
3221267833.description: Loot the cache in the Grove of Ulan-Tan, a Lost Sector in the Lost Oasis on Io.

3225062820.name: Stormcaller's Patience
3225062820.description: "Let it flow through you, but not consume you. You are a conduit. Between sky and earth. Electricity and matter. Life and death." —Ikora Rey

3225959819.name: Nightstalker
3225959819.description: Draw from the Void. Light the way.

3226021348.name: Black Armory Key
3226021348.description: An ornate key with a Black Armory symbol.

3227164047.name: The Spider's Call
3227164047.description: Travel to the Tangled Shore and talk to the Spider.

3229162160.name: Speak with Tess in the Tower
3229162160.description: To celebrate your victory over the Vex, Tess Everis has a gift for you in the Tower.

3230558873.name: End the Arms Dealer
3230558873.description: Complete Strike Quest: The Arms Dealer in EDZ.

3230867320.name: Mask Upgrade
3230867320.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

3230867321.name: Mask Upgrade
3230867321.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

3230867322.name: Mask Upgrade
3230867322.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest while wearing the Festival of the Lost mask to unlock this perk.

3230963543.name: Flared Magwell
3230963543.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed

3231728835.name: Imperial Engram
3231728835.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

3233713706.name: A Gift in Return
3233713706.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

3234971817.name: Faction Rally: Public Events
3234971817.description: Represent your faction in public events today.

3238421897.name: Vanguard Gear (Past Seasons)
3238421897.description: Weapons, armor, and shaders from previous seasons' Vanguard sets.

3239027226.name: Superlative
3239027226.description: Get Super kills while on Mercury.

3240298419.name: MERCURY REWARDS
3240298419.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Brother Vance.

3241194940.name: Jump Jets
3241194940.description: Provides additional aerial maneuverability and enables accurate hipfire while you're in the air during Lift.

3241194941.name: Mecha Holster
3241194941.description: Reloads stowed Submachine Guns and allows you to ready them instantly. Improves your handling with SMGs and your movement while wielding one.

3241194942.name: Linear Actuators
3241194942.description: Increases sprint speed. Sprinting builds up a static charge. After melee-attacking an enemy, that charge will chain damage to nearby enemies.

3244569127.name: Festival Dance
3244569127.description: Join the celebration and move to the beat!

3244905727.name: Reputation Bundle
3244905727.description: Contains a large stack of reputation tokens.

3245389147.name: Grenade Idea
3245389147.description: Defeat enemies on Mars using grenades.

3246018325.name: Vex Milk
3246018325.description:
An ingredient that adds a bit of radiolarian liquid to anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

3248072134.name: Drifter's Hideaway
3248072134.description:
"All right. We got everything we need, kid. Uh… If you wanna bring it all up to the Derelict, I… maybe… left a message for you up there." —The Drifter

Enter the activity "Mystery and Potential" via the Gambit Director and search the Derelict for the tape the Drifter made for you.

3256616328.name: Accidental Dance
3256616328.description: Again! Really? Why do you keep doing this dance?

3257531595.name: Io Engram
3257531595.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Echo Mesa of Io.

3258006823.name: Sting Operation
3258006823.description:
You picked up a lead while you were spying on the Drifter's conversations. He's sending someone to pick up an important shipment from Spider. Maybe you can get there first…

Visit the Spider in the Tangled Shore.

3258345482.name: Glimmer
3258345482.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.

3260691472.name: Five Glow Bright Bundle
3260691472.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know how to fill the void.

Contains 5 Ephemeral Engrams and 3 random shaders.

3260691474.name: A Single Flame Bundle
3260691474.description:
A bundle for Guardians who don't let the light go out.

Contains 1 Ephemeral Engram and 1 random shader.

3260691475.name: Three Candles Bundle
3260691475.description:
A bundle for Guardians who've begun to illuminate the dark.

Contains 3 Ephemeral Engrams and 2 random shaders.

3261404234.name: Hand Cannon Calibrated Frame
3261404234.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

3261677096.name: Machine Gun Calibrated Frame
3261677096.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

3264613269.name: Iron Confidence
3264613269.description: Defeat opponents with final blows from any weapon. Earn bonus progress for Special weapons, Heavy weapons, and opponents with a higher Power level.

3271395075.name: Arcology Engram
3271395075.description: Contains a reward for your efforts at the New Pacific Arcology on Titan.

3274513672.name: Shaders
3274513672.description: Possible shaders found with each Bright Engram opened.

3275789089.name: Shield Disorient
3275789089.description: Energy matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants.

3279749842.name: Bounteous
3279749842.description: Grants a chance to receive an additional bounty when redeeming a clan bounty.

3282002294.name: Dead Orbit Loyalty
3282002294.description:
Pledge loyalty to Dead Orbit.

Once you pledge to a faction for this rally, you cannot pledge to another faction for any characters on your account. Choose wisely!

3282419336.name: Raid Banner
3282419336.description: Can be used before any raid encounter to allow fireteam members to gain Super energy and Heavy ammo.

3282680891.name: Warmhearted Gift
3282680891.description:
Extra Confectionary Hearts? Donate them to Lord Shaxx's Crimson Days event for a random reward!

Chance to receive Enhancement Cores, mods, weapons, gear, and resources.

3283469208.name: Martian Publicity
3283469208.description: Grants a chance for Heroic public events on Mars to reward an additional Mars token.

3286420028.name: Dead Drop
3286420028.description:
The Jerky is dialed into a Fallen transponder somewhere on Titan. You'll need to pick up the goods in person to complete your errand for Drifter.

Complete a heroic reprise of adventure "Thief of Thieves" on Titan.

3289150151.name: Radiant Sword Frame
3289150151.description: Craft the Black Armory Sword by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

3289360006.name: Kill It with Fire
3289360006.description: Get Solar kills in a strike.

3289621657.name: Crucible Engram
3289621657.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Crucible.

3290874772.name: Exotic Engram
3290874772.description: An engram with remarkable encoding markers. A Cryptarch would be thrilled to decode this to reveal its true nature.

3292852610.name: Into the Haul
3292852610.description: Visit the Derelict to wager your synthesized Mote in the mysterious trial that the Drifter calls "The Reckoning."

3294126233.name: Radiant Hand Cannon Frame
3294126233.description: Craft the Black Armory Hand Cannon by completing a Gofannon Forge ignition on Nessus.

3300194663.name: Cayde's Will
3300194663.description: Bring the recovered Ace of Spades parts back to Banshee-44 in the Tower.

3300816228.name: Auto-Loading Holster
3300816228.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.

3301904089.name: Spike Grenades
3301904089.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon do increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability

3302590929.name: Encrypted Engram
3302590929.description: A rare engram with unusual markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of equipment.

3305171798.name: A Single Sweater Arm
3305171798.description: Not a dropped stitch in sight on this expertly crafted sleeve to keep one of Asher's arms warm. Bring it to him on Io.

3306200210.name: Jumpships and Sparrows
3306200210.description: Jumpships and Sparrows awarded during Festival of the Lost.

3306727104.name: Vanguard Calibrated Frame
3306727104.description: Prototype the Vanguard weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

3306873822.name: Recharged the Forge
3306873822.description: A reward for completing the Black Armory campaign.

3308651736.name: Controlled Destruction
3308651736.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Grenade Launcher.

3308857600.name: Legendary Engram
3308857600.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

3310167124.name: Power Lifting
3310167124.description: Get Power weapon multikills on Io.

3311977193.name: Helical Fletching
3311977193.description:
Aerodynamic and light. 
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases stability

3312464851.name: Future War Cult Arsenal
3312464851.description: Weapons obtained by working with Future War Cult to prepare for the wars to come.

3313665935.name: Meditation: "Combustion"
3313665935.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

3314893280.name: Celestial Key
3314893280.description: This must unlock something within the Dreaming City…

3314893281.name: Empyreal Key
3314893281.description: This must unlock something within the Dreaming City…

3314893282.name: Glittering Key
3314893282.description: This must unlock something within the Dreaming City…

3314893283.name: Ethereal Key
3314893283.description: This must unlock something within the Dreaming City…

3317098328.name: Absolution
3317098328.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns each time you pick up an Orb of Light.

3317991331.name: Vanilla Blades
3317991331.description: Deliver these deadly delights to Lord Shaxx in the Tower Courtyard.

3318771700.name: Coded Engram
3318771700.description: A common engram. A Cryptarch can decode this into a piece of equipment.

3320129257.name: Beyond Infinity
3320129257.description: It's time to enter the Infinite Forest and find Osiris. Be prepared for anything.

3320847045.name: Bow Beta Frame
3320847045.description:
A Bow frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills with Bows to finish the calibration.

3321772950.name: WANTED: The Eye in the Dark
3321772950.description: Hunt down the wanted Eye in the Dark that was taken from the Prison of Elders.

3325480370.name: The Guardian, Quickened
3325480370.description:
A reward for accelerating your journey to the Reef.

Contains any Bright Engrams, Ghost Shells, jumpships, Sparrows, shaders, Fireteam Medallions, and Eververse Bounty Notes not previously claimed from other Eververse rewards.

3325808341.name: Arcstrider's Patience
3325808341.description: "It may look like fun—and trust me, it is—but don't drop that thing. You might hurt yourself." —Cayde-6

3326070435.name: Throw Down
3326070435.description: Land melee final blows in the Crucible.

3326204863.name: Smooth Grip
3326204863.description:
This weapon is slightly easier to hold and aim.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

3326830047.name: Imperial Engram
3326830047.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

3328998530.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998530.description: "So this cache… all I remember is it's in a very… blue room. You'll know it when you see it." —Cayde-6

3328998531.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998531.description: "Mapping these pings to the latest from Sloane, looks like you'll be tearing through some kind of ceiling garden. Good luck with that.” —Cayde-6

3328998536.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998536.description: "I take it you like to jump, right? I see the way you jump all around the Tower. Guardians these days—no respect for gravity." —Cayde-6

3328998537.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998537.description: "Getting pings on another one somewhere high up in one of those towers. From what I hear, the Fallen are using those towers as some kind of junkyard. Could be like a needle in a haystack. Good luck.” —Cayde-6

3328998538.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998538.description: "OK, I actually made a sketch to remind me of this one. And it looks like I put it… near some kind of windmill. Or fan. Or something." —Cayde-6

3328998539.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998539.description: "I always used Titan as a rest stop before hitting the Reef. Something about those waves. This one's right under your nose. And your feet." —Cayde-6

3328998540.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998540.description: "This one is in some kind of wall. What was it with the Golden Age that they built walls around everything?" —Cayde-6

3328998541.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998541.description: "What idiot crashed the tank into the wall? It definitely, one hundred percent, absolutely wasn't me. You believe me, right?" —Cayde-6

3328998542.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998542.description: "So I chased the gang of Awoken thieves up to the Arcology. That bridge didn't look too stable, and I'm not into methane baths, so I stashed what I had and picked up their trail inside." —Cayde-6

3328998543.name: Titan Treasure Map
3328998543.description: "Titan who gave me the lead said he stood there watching their spawning crud just repel off my cache… too scared to touch it. You aren't scared of a little Hive fungus are you?" —Cayde-6

3329220148.name: Spinfoil Hat
3329220148.description: "I never got the sense that Cayde was paranoid, but who knows what kind of rays are polluting the system these days." —Ghost

3329640351.name: Mysterious Invitation
3329640351.description: A puzzling note, marked with the sign of the Drifter. Return to him to collect your reward.

3329783963.name: All in a Day's Work
3329783963.description: Defeat other Guardians in the Crucible.

3337692349.name: Mulligan
3337692349.description: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

3337739523.name: Ascendant Challenge
3337739523.description: "The Awoken have long practiced the art of walking between worlds." —Techeun Kalli

3338110750.name: All in a Day's Work
3338110750.description: Defeat other Guardians in the Crucible.

3346926308.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 3
3346926308.description:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

3347978672.name: Alchemical Etchings
3347978672.description: Your Rifts gain the additional ability to automatically reload allies' weapons. Empowering Rift makes weapons effective over longer ranges.

3347978673.name: Strange Protractor
3347978673.description: Sprint speed increased. After a short time sprinting, your currently equipped weapon is automatically reloaded.

3352019292.name: Secret Victories
3352019292.description: This emblem tracks the number of Ascendant chests you've opened in the Dreaming City.

3356597058.name: Chosen
3356597058.description: The Almighty is finished. Time to go home, save the Traveler, take back the City, and end this war. Be brave.

3357615447.name: Might of the Armory
3357615447.description: Complete the "Last Wish" raid, the "Scourge of the Past" raid, or "The Shattered Throne" dungeon with at least four pieces of Black Armory gear equipped.

3358532450.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Rahool
3358532450.description:
Rahool could use a gift equal to what he's given Humanity over the years. Complete the following objectives:

- Collect engrams for raw materials
- Defeat Taken enemies to capture their shadowy essence

3360898490.name: A Gift from Eververse: Curse of Osiris

3363980975.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 3
3363980975.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3364008067.name: Cabal Oil
3364008067.description:
An ingredient that toughens and thickens up anything it touches.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

3364911712.name: VEIST Rapid-Fire
3364911712.description: Full Auto. Deeper ammo reserves. Slightly faster reload when magazine is empty.

3365897133.name: Explosive Head
3365897133.description: Arrows explode after a short delay.

3366241478.name: Offering to the Oracle
3366241478.description: A fragment of amethyst, offered in supplication to the mysterious Oracle Engine.

3370146904.name: Thin the Herd
3370146904.description: Defeat enemies on the Tangled Shore.

3370146908.name: Super Visible
3370146908.description: Get Super kills on the Tangled Shore.

3370146909.name: Flotsam and Jetsam
3370146909.description: Defeat Hive in the Jetsam of Saturn.

3371775011.name: High Tension String
3371775011.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability

3373736292.name: Sticky Grenades
3373736292.description: Grenades fired from this weapon attach on impact and detonate when enemies are in proximity.

3374603313.name: Candy Dead Ghosts
3374603313.description: Deliver these… things to the Spider in his safehouse on the Tangled Shore.

3375085635.name: Complete Activities on Io
3375085635.description: Complete various activities around Io, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic Adventures.

3376603750.name: And More...
3376603750.description: This category contains more items than are previewed here.

3377778206.name: Gift of the Lighthouse
3377778206.description: An artifact used to upgrade powerful weapons at the Mercury Forge. The forging process consumes it.

3388190489.name: Coded Engram
3388190489.description: A common engram. A Cryptarch can decode this into a piece of equipment.

3388578095.name: Reignite the Izanami Forge
3388578095.description: Now that the igniter is fully repaired, use it to reignite the Izanami Forge.

3389746221.name: Cower
3389746221.description: Make it stop! Make it stop!

3389901685.name: "Unbroken"
3389901685.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

3392989359.name: Failsafe
3392989359.description: Cayde has left Nessus to join up with Zavala. Before you leave for Io, meet Failsafe face to face.

3394927300.name: Radiant Sniper Rifle Frame
3394927300.description: Craft the Black Armory Sniper Rifle by completing a Gofannon Forge ignition on Nessus.

3395037976.name: INVADER: Heavy Duty
3395037976.description: Defeat enemy Guardians with Power weapons in Gambit Prime.

3395037977.name: INVADER: Doctor Invader
3395037977.description: While invading, heal the enemy Primeval in Gambit Prime.

3395037978.name: INVADER: Mote Piñata
3395037978.description: As a fireteam, deny Motes in Gambit Prime.

3395037979.name: INVADER: Supercharged
3395037979.description: Defeat opposing Guardians with Supers in Gambit Prime.

3395037983.name: INVADER: Guardian Killer
3395037983.description: Defeat opposing Guardians in a single Gambit Prime match.

3400433026.name: Arc Light Stirring
3400433026.description: Discovering a broken Titan gauntlet has rekindled something inside you. Rebuild your strength in combat and public events.

3400433027.name: Arc Focus Restored
3400433027.description: Your affinity for the Arc aspect of the Traveler's Light feels strong again. Return to the Shard in the EDZ to restore your connection.

3400784728.name: Triple Tap
3400784728.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return 1 round to the magazine.

3403476648.name: Corsair Badge
3403476648.description: An Awoken sigil, defiled by enemy hands.

3407025535.name: Iron Engram
3407025535.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Iron Banner.

3407224589.name: Trials of the Nine
3407224589.description: Speak to the Emissary to collect your reward.

3408374275.name: Ives's Last Engram
3408374275.description: Petra Venj entrusted Amanda Holliday with all of Master Ives's possessions. Now that the Cryptarch's death has been avenged, this engram belongs to the Guardian who brought that justice.

3408756889.name: Superhuman
3408756889.description: Defeat multiple enemies with a single Super while in the EDZ.

3409714006.name: Auto Rifle Alpha Frame
3409714006.description:
An uncalibrated Auto Rifle frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat Cabal with Auto Rifles to start the calibration.

3411095149.name: Cache It In
3411095149.description: Loot the cache in the Drain, a Lost Sector in the Outskirts of the EDZ.

3411140517.name: Bakin' Friends
3411140517.description: Return to Eva Levante in the Tower Bazaar.

3412439828.name: Arach Greeting
3412439828.description:
"Be reminded: You've sworn to the emigration. It may be needed at any time." —Jalaal, Dead Orbit Arach

Once you pledge to a faction during this Faction Rally, you can no longer use the other two factions' emotes until this Rally ends.

3415614992.name: All for One, One for All
3415614992.description: Complete the All for One, One for All challenge.

3416645339.name: Reversing the Polarity
3416645339.description: The Cabal tend to use a single technology to power everything in their arsenal. Take advantage of that design flaw to send them a message.

3416944458.name: Recuperation
3416944458.description: Replenishes health each time you pick up an Orb of Light.

3417843082.name: Future War Cult Loyalty
3417843082.description:
Pledge loyalty to Future War Cult.

Once you pledge to a faction for this rally, you cannot pledge to another faction for any characters on your account. Choose wisely!

3421463185.name: Resonate Stem
3421463185.description:
This is a broken Resonate Stem for Project: CB.NAV. You can hack several of them together to generate a working Override Frequency. 

Override Frequencies contain harmonic code, so only one can be created at a time.

3421631141.name: Poor Reception
3421631141.description: The Fallen are trying to block all communications in the EDZ. Find the source of the interference and shut it down.

3423221701.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Hawthorne
3423221701.description:
Hawthorne and her feathered friend have been through a lot over the years. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat enemies on Nessus to collect organosynthetic construction residue
- Collect Alkane Spores from Titan to catalyze it into a new form

3425386926.name: Rampage
3425386926.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.

3427785728.name: Will of the Thousands
3427785728.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Will of the Thousands."

3428439414.name: Talk to the Cryptarch
3428439414.description: This weapon is a relic from the Golden Age. Perhaps there's more to it than it seems? Cryptarch Rahool may have the answer.

3429800428.name: Fiberglass Arrow Shaft
3429800428.description:
Heavy and consistent. 
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly decreases stability

3430763904.name: Brother Vance
3430763904.description: Speak to Brother Vance to learn about Heroic adventures on Mercury.

3431948556.name: Ornaments
3431948556.description: Ornaments used to alter the appearance of your gear, found in Bright Engrams.

3433396026.name: Meyrin RDS
3433396026.description:
Lightweight sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases range

3433396027.name: Meyrin RDL
3433396027.description:
Superior scope. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range

3438534621.name: Combat Grip
3438534621.description:
This weapon's recoil direction is more vertical.
  •  Greatly controls recoil

3438694663.name: Tactical Refresher
3438694663.description: Defeat opposing Guardians and complete Crucible matches. Grants Power 640 gear on completion.

3442032312.name: COLLECTOR: Leave One On Their Porch

3442032313.name: Collectors Don't Carry Cash
3442032313.description: Bank Motes of Dark in Gambit Prime.

3442032314.name: COLLECTOR: Bang Knuckles
3442032314.description: Defeat enemies with melee abilities in Gambit Prime.

3442032315.name: COLLECTOR: Bank Robber
3442032315.description: As a team, drain Motes of Dark from the enemy bank in Gambit Prime.

3442166510.name: Compete in the Mayhem Crucible playlist
3442166510.description: Enter and complete matches in the Mayhem Crucible playlist.

3443748294.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 1 Fulfilled
3443748294.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3445216955.name: Talk to Tyra Karn
3445216955.description: Bring the results of the Cryptarch's research to Tyra Karn.

3446707994.name: "Spark"
3446707994.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

3448549678.name: Looped
3448549678.description: No one's heard from Cayde-6 since the Hunter took off for an uncharted world. Track him down.

3449949721.name: Ghost Shells and Emotes
3449949721.description: Celebrate the Dawning in style with exclusive Ghost shells and emotes.

3451625162.name: Echo Mesa
3451625162.description: Tracks Ghost Scans, Region Chests, and Lost Sectors on Io.

3452040806.name: Volundr Forge Ignitions
3452040806.description: Complete ignitions of the lost Volundr Forge in the EDZ.

3452835241.name: Complete Activities on Nessus
3452835241.description: Complete various activities around Nessus, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic adventures.

3459475454.name: Huckleberry Catalyst
3459475454.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

3460994790.name: The Extra Mile
3460994790.description: Completing the weekly clan milestone rewards an additional 5 Legendary shards.

3465198467.name: Composite Stock
3465198467.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed

3466057365.name: MIDA Multi-Tool Catalyst
3466057365.description:
This weapon generates Orbs on multikills and displays the number of enemies defeated by using it.

When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon receives additional bonuses.

3466378503.name: Inner Light
3466378503.description: Land Super final blows in the Crucible.

3467573387.name: On the Trail
3467573387.description: Petra Venj and the Spider are your best—and only—allies in your quest to avenge Cayde-6.

3470828242.name: Flame Refraction
3470828242.description: Kills with this weapon return a fraction of the ammo used to the magazine from reserves, extending the beam's duration.

3473675290.name: World Gear
3473675290.description: Weapons, armor, and shaders that are unaffiliated with any faction and that drop from this season's Legendary engrams.

3478145735.name: Vanilla Blades
3478145735.description: Deliver these deadly delights to Lord Shaxx in the Tower Courtyard.

3481861797.name: Dawnblade
3481861797.description: Spread your wings and set the sky ablaze.

3482477523.name: Simulation of Grief
3482477523.description: With the fate of her original captain discovered, speak to Failsafe at the Exodus Black.

3483007223.name: Lost Prophecy, Another Verse Fulfilled
3483007223.description: Take the Prophecy Tablet to the Infinite Forge in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3489008282.name: Auto Rifle Loader
3489008282.description: Increases reload speed of Auto Rifles and Trace Rifles.

3491436641.name: Blood of Izanami
3491436641.description: Tracks the number of Izanami Forge ignitions completed.

3492030167.name: Trials Engram
3492030167.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

3492396210.name: Implosion Rounds
3492396210.description:
This weapon's projectiles travel faster and have a controlled explosion.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Decreases blast radius

3494199208.name: Giving
3494199208.description: You didn't think I'd forget, did you?

3494541306.name: Sniper Rifle Beta Frame
3494541306.description:
A Sniper Rifle frame with uncalibrated sights obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills with Sniper Rifles to finish the calibration.

3494979213.name: Scout Rifle Targeting
3494979213.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Scout Rifles.

3496337357.name: Trials Engram
3496337357.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

3498953303.name: Dead Orbit Engram
3498953303.description: Contains a reward for your efforts on behalf of Dead Orbit.

3503444841.name: Catalyst Seeker
3503444841.description: Increases the drop rate of Crucible and strike catalysts when playing with clanmates.

3504197951.name: Unforeseen Repercussions
3504197951.description: This weapon's beam superheats its targets upon impact, causing delayed explosions.

3506296588.name: Welcome Package
3506296588.description: Contains all you need to get started with this season's Crucible Ranks

3507339254.name: A Second Opinion
3507339254.description: Now that the Fallen can make no more enhanced Ether, talk to Devrim about what to do next.

3510138048.name: Protecting Teammates
3510138048.description: You gotta watch your fireteam's back.

3511642555.name: Unflinching Submachine Gun Aim
3511642555.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Submachine Guns.

3513791699.name: Mulligan
3513791699.description: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

3514796977.name: Essence
3514796977.description:
Add Essence of Dawning to complete the baking process.

Can be found by completing activities and challenges anywhere in the system.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

3515212050.name: Oversize Weapon Dexterity
3515212050.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, Shotguns, and Bows.

3516481561.name: Fossilized Hermaion Blossom
3516481561.description: Use to charge certain Prophecy Tablets. Using on an incorrect Tablet will still consume this offering. Acquired by completing Nightfalls, Trials of the Nine matches, and Vanguard strikes.

3516481562.name: Paradox Amplifier
3516481562.description: Brother Vance can upgrade this item to Advanced Paradox Amplifier. Acquired by completing strikes, Crucible matches, and Heroic Mercury adventures.

3516481563.name: Radiolarian Culture
3516481563.description: Brother Vance can upgrade this item to a Concentrated Radiolarian Culture. Acquired from public events and chests.

3516790604.name: WANTED: Thyrdron
3516790604.description: Begin your hunt at the Orrery on Nessus.

3518207880.name: Trials of the Nine Arsenal
3518207880.description: Weapons obtained by competing in the Trials of the Nine.

3519016320.name: Leviathan Armor
3519016320.description: Armor obtained by increasing your reputation with Emperor Calus.

3519175185.name: New Digs
3519175185.description: Drifter has moved shop to the Annex. Drop by the Tower and pay him a visit.

3520124296.name: Meditation: "Will of the Thousands"
3520124296.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

3520605595.name: Submachine Gun Loader
3520605595.description: Increases reload speed of Submachine Guns.

3522688672.name: Not Forgotten
3522688672.description: Return to Lord Shaxx in the Tower.

3523296417.name: Demolitionist
3523296417.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.

3523575486.name: Emotes
3523575486.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

3525010810.name: Quick Launch
3525010810.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed

3529196966.name: Fossilized Hermaion Blossom
3529196966.description: Fossilized flowers from the Hermaion trees created by the Traveler when it terraformed Mercury.

3529617614.name: Legendary Engram
3529617614.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

3530955149.name: A Gift from Eververse: The Red War

3531414277.name: Gunsmith Engram
3531414277.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting the Gunsmiths.

3531644535.name: Lighthouse Engram
3531644535.description: An engram signed with a key unique to the Followers of Osiris.

3531980021.name: Scourge of the Scorn
3531980021.description: "The Scorn seek revenge for the death of the Fanatic. They will never willingly leave the Dreaming City." —Petra Venj

3532839402.name: Recycle Synths
3532839402.description: Dismantle a stack of these synths to recover Glimmer.

3535507612.name: (Heroic) Road Rage
3535507612.description: Asher's worked up about Vex interest in the Io Vault. He's got an unusual suggestion for how to deal with the problem.

3536086285.name: The Jade Rabbit
3536086285.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

3539260224.name: Unbreakable Bond Bundle
3539260224.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who develop lasting bonds.

Contains Crimson Engrams, Bright Dust, a weapon ornament for Graviton Lance, and a Fireteam Medallion. Available only during Crimson Days.

3539260225.name: Stealth Survival Bundle
3539260225.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who prefer to blend in while firing their MIDA Multi-Tool.

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, a Fireteam Medallion, and the Tactical ornament for the MIDA Multi-Tool.

3539260226.name: Limitless Starter Pack
3539260226.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to start off the season in style. 

Contains Bright Engrams, Bright Dust, and a stack of Mercury Vex Chrome shaders.

3539260227.name: Star of Dark Nights Bundle
3539260227.description:
A bundle for Guardians who watch for the rising sun. 

Contains the exclusive Star of Dark Nights Sparrow, Dawning engrams, Bright Dust, and a stack of Dawning-themed shaders.

3539260228.name: Benevolence Bundle
3539260228.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose generosity knows no bounds.

Contains 1 Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Crucible.

3539260230.name: Rolling Start Bundle
3539260230.description:
A bundle for Guardians who need to get somewhere fast.

Contains an instant-summon Sparrow, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Vex Chrome shaders.

3539260231.name: Solid Gold Bundle
3539260231.description:
A bundle for Guardians who don't mind flaunting their extravagance.

Contains the exclusive Nothing Gold jumpship, 10 Golden Trace shaders, 3 Gleaming Boons of the Vanguard, and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Crucible.

3546241902.name: Glimmer
3546241902.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.

3547610540.name: Unflinching Bow Aim
3547610540.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Bows.

3548782974.name: Dead Orbit Rewards
3548782974.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Arach Jalaal:

3554445700.name: Black Armory signature
3554445700.description:
The source of the Vex transponder signal has been located.

Go to this unexplored area of Nessus and track the signal that is using a Black Armory signature.

3554553057.name: Gift of Shaders
3554553057.description: A gift from Tess that contains a small stack of shaders.

3554978440.name: Tainted Artifact
3554978440.description: The Drifter wants to talk. Meet him in the Tower.

3556600478.name: Seasonal Eververse Gift
3556600478.description: A gift from the Eververse Trading Company to celebrate the beginning of a new season.

3556845561.name: Aqueduct Key
3556845561.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Aqueduct location aboard the Leviathan.

3563608633.name: Echo Mesa, Io Armor
3563608633.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Asher on Io.

3564089590.name: City of Secrets
3564089590.description: Search for clues about the thief in the Dreaming City.

3564415280.name: Forge Ignition
3564415280.description: Bring any Black Armory Pulse Rifle frame, Bow frame, or research frame to the Izanami Forge to be crafted.

3565220806.name: Io Engram
3565220806.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Echo Mesa of Io.

3565864927.name: Prototype Engram
3565864927.description: A vibrant engram containing many different Season 3 customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Warmind. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

3566416015.name: Telemetry Tapioca
3566416015.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

3569211145.name: Closing Time
3569211145.description: Land final blows at close range in the Crucible.

3570386371.name: This Is Our Story
3570386371.description: Complete a story mission with a linked friend.

3570785821.name: Getting Your Hands Dirty
3570785821.description: Seize upon the Taken invasion of the EDZ, direct their assault against the Red Legion, and end it before it gets out of control.

3576637475.name: The Inner Storm
3576637475.description: Get Arc kills in a strike.

3578462974.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
3578462974.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

3581109410.name: Take It Orb Lose It
3581109410.description: Generate Orbs of Light on Mercury.

3582466566.name: New Pacific Arcology Armor
3582466566.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Sloane on Titan.

3584253096.name: WANTED: Queenbreaker
3584253096.description: Begin your hunt in Trostland in the EDZ.

3588389153.name: Invader +2
3588389153.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

3589620857.name: Sacrilege
3589620857.description: Since the loss of her Light, Ikora has many questions—and she's not leaving Io without answers.

3590171412.name: Serpent's Ruin
3590171412.description: Unlocked after you defeat a thousand Hunters.

3590244420.name: Solar Focus Restored
3590244420.description: Your affinity for the Solar aspect of the Traveler's Light feels strong again. Return to the Shard in the EDZ to restore your connection.

3590244421.name: Solar Light Stirring
3590244421.description: Discovering a blackened Sunmaul has rekindled something inside you. Rebuild your strength in combat and public events.

3591739443.name: Bow Dexterity
3591739443.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.

3592498273.name: The Hanged Man
3592498273.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants in the Dreaming City. Complete strike "The Corrupted."

3593771608.name: Solstice of Heroes
3593771608.description: Complete all armor objectives, and upgrade the complete set at the Statue of Heroes.

3597022727.name: Technocrat's Doom
3597022727.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "Insight Terminus."

3598503521.name: Base Magazine
3598503521.description: Original manufacturer's magazine, with no modifications.

3598744336.name: High Plains Blues
3598744336.description: Search the Tangled Shore for Cayde's killers.

3602650885.name: Powerful Invader Mote
3602650885.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3602650886.name: Middling Invader Mote
3602650886.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3602650887.name: Weak Invader Mote
3602650887.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Invader armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3604392404.name: Sword Beta Frame
3604392404.description:
A Sword frame with unbalanced heft obtained from Ada-1.
Get Multikills with Swords to balance the blade.

3605462288.name: The Traveler, Alive
3605462288.description:
A reward for defeating Ghaul and saving the Last City.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from the Red War, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

3606794095.name: Rabbit Effects
3606794095.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

3607179340.name: A Gift in Return
3607179340.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

3610814281.name: Volatile Light
3610814281.description: Rounds fired from this weapon have no damage falloff, overpenetrate targets, and ricochet off hard surfaces. Projectile damage increases after bounce.

3611551832.name: Weak Collector Mote
3611551832.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Collector armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3611551833.name: Middling Collector Mote
3611551833.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Collector armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3611551834.name: Powerful Collector Mote
3611551834.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Collector armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3612413361.name: Heroic Adventures
3612413361.description: Complete a Heroic adventure on Mercury.

3612988418.name: Talk to Ikora Rey
3612988418.description: Go to the Last City to speak with Ikora Rey.

3617686262.name: (Heroic) Unsafe at Any Speed
3617686262.description: A nasty Fallen Pike gang is wreaking havoc in the area. Capture enemy vehicles and use them to even the odds.

3621677368.name: Lost Prophecy, Another Verse
3621677368.description:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

3621792645.name: Linear Fusion Rifle Targeting
3621792645.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Linear Fusion Rifles.

3622565027.name: Expired Prismatic Facet
3622565027.description: Once used to activate the Prismatic Matrix, this facet's authenticator has expired. It should be dismantled into Bright Dust.

3622748469.name: Titan Rewards
3622748469.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Sloane:

3622962296.name: We're in This Together Now
3622962296.description:
After hearing everything Drifter has to say, you feel compelled to visit him.

Visit Drifter in the Annex of the Tower.

3622962298.name: Time to Regroup
3622962298.description:
While you were picking up the Jerky for the Drifter, he received a call with bad news. One of his old enemies, Shin Malphur, might have broken an agreement. Drifter wants you to come back to the Tower to "regroup."

Visit Drifter in the Annex.

3622962299.name: Cold Feet
3622962299.description:
"You heard it? You heard the tape? Ah, damn. Damn! I didn't expect you to just go DO it. Listen, kid, I got the jitters about this. Come see me before you go lookin' for the rest of those stupid tapes." —The Drifter

Visit the Drifter in the Annex of the Tower.

3625355092.name: Burst Guard
3625355092.description: Sword Guard has low efficiency and high defense.

3628351880.name: Alkane Dragée Cookies
3628351880.description: Deliver these unbreakable (?) treats to Sloane in Siren's Watch on Titan.

3631073608.name: COLLECTOR: Collecting from Chests
3631073608.description: Collector bounty. Loot chests found in patrol zones throughout the system.

3631073609.name: Collecting from Patrols
3631073609.description: Collector bounty. Complete patrols throughout the system.

3631073610.name: COLLECTOR: Collecting on Nessus and Io
3631073610.description: Collector bounty. Loot Lost Sector caches found on Nessus or Io.

3631073611.name: COLLECTOR: Collecting in the EDZ and Titan
3631073611.description: Collector bounty. Loot Lost Sector caches found in the EDZ or on Titan.

3631073612.name: COLLECTOR: Collecting Resources
3631073612.description: Collector bounty. Gather planetary resources from patrol zones throughout the system.

3631073613.name: COLLECTOR: Collecting from the Reef
3631073613.description: Collector bounty. Loot Lost Sector caches found on the Tangled Shore or in the Dreaming City.

3631073614.name: COLLECTOR: Collecting from Incursions
3631073614.description: Collector bounty. Complete Heroic public events in the EDZ or on Nessus.

3631443773.name: An Ancient Black Armory Frame
3631443773.description:
An ancient Black Armory weapon frame with an inscription on the side:

"Fire of the Queens! The Lords of War!
We've unshackled the forges, let bellows blast anew!
Our Regalia shines, we grasp tools hand in hand.
Burn hot, burn bright, and temper iron to sweet steel."

3633698719.name: Weak Synthesizer
3633698719.description:
A Mote synthesizer jimmied off of a defunct Gambit bank, redesigned for recombination rather than energy conversion.

Insert Synths found in Gambit Prime to create Motes.

3635117993.name: Inseparable Shaders Pack
3635117993.description: This pack contains a small stack of shaders that evoke the inspiring nature of an unbreakable bond, in honor of Crimson Days.

3635407737.name: Character Stats Armor Mods
3635407737.description:
Chance to contain an armor mod that slightly enhances a character stat.

Character Stats Affected:
Resilience
Mobility
Recovery

3635991036.name: Gunslinger
3635991036.description: A lone wolf who lives for the perfect shot.

3638113959.name: Letter Fragment
3638113959.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

3639925183.name: Sparrows
3639925183.description: Speed through Crimson Days alongside your Crimson Bond with these exclusive Sparrows.

3641410350.name: Powerful Pulse Rifle Frame
3641410350.description:
Forge a Black Armory Pulse Rifle from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

3642491337.name: Tesseract
3642491337.description: While sprinting, press  to perform an AoE attack. After sprinting and then jumping, press  while airborne to teleport forward.

3643160247.name: Nothing Left to Say
3643160247.description: Climb the Watchtower to stop Uldren and the Fanatic.

3643424744.name: Overflow
3643424744.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo reloads this weapon to beyond normal capacity.

3647557929.name: Unflinching Large Arms
3647557929.description: Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Shotguns.

3649430342.name: Twintails
3649430342.description: Shoots two rockets, one Void and one Solar, that can track onto the same target.

3649793344.name: "Hijacked"
