3649793344.description: Complete the campaign mission you have selected from Ikora.

3651031892.name: The Oracle Engine
3651031892.description: "We lost contact with one of the Techeuns out in the Mists. Scope it out, Guardian." —Petra Venj

3656536807.name: The Guardian, Quickened
3656536807.description:
A reward for accelerating your journey to the Reef.

Contains any Bright Engrams, Ghost Shells, jumpships, Sparrows, shaders, Fireteam Medallions, and Eververse Bounty Notes not previously claimed from other Eververse rewards.

3657459777.name: Unsafe at Any Speed
3657459777.description: A nasty Fallen Pike gang is wreaking havoc in the area. Capture enemy vehicles and use them to even the odds.

3661387068.name: Chambered Compensator
3661387068.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

3661779168.name: Rare Infusion
3661779168.description: Select a piece of Rare gear to consume. That item will be used to infuse another item with power.

3662465906.name: Dreaded Visage
3662465906.description: Grants ability energy when you're damaged. When critically wounded, regain maximum health on kills.

3662465907.name: Transfusion Matrix
3662465907.description: Kills with Arc melee abilities trigger health regeneration and restore melee energy.

3664001560.name: Purchase Glimmer
3664001560.description:
A common currency, often exchanged for other useful items.

The cost changes daily, so check back often.

3665594271.name: Spell of Abolition
3665594271.description: Practice the dark arts of the Techeun.

3666208348.name: Jagged Edge
3666208348.description: Increased damage at the cost of sword ammo.

3666889414.name: Final Calculations
3666889414.description: The final calibration has been completed. Return to Ana Bray for further information.

3667189958.name: Trials Engram
3667189958.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the Trials of the Nine.

3668782036.name: The Fate of All Fools
3668782036.description: Chain body shots to gain bonus damage on your next precision shot and return ammo to the magazine.

3670792765.name: Sidearm Scavenger
3670792765.description: Sidearms get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

3672748946.name: Herald Dance
3672748946.description: Dance until your presence is announced!

3673633528.name: Coal in the Shape of an Engram
3673633528.description: Giving gifts is part of the Dawning's traditions. Doing unto others as they've done unto you is another. Bring this to Rahool in the Tower Courtyard.

3676627761.name: Unflinching Light Arms Aim
3676627761.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Sidearms, Hand Cannons, Bows, and Submachine Guns.

3680229091.name: Holliday Family History
3680229091.description: Visit Amanda Holliday in the Tower.

3680642383.name: Perfect Taste
3680642383.description:
This flavor will hit the bull's-eye every time.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

3682348043.name: The Up and Up
3682348043.description: Prevent the Vex from completing a simulation of Fallen combat tactics.

3682636565.name: Notorious Engram
3682636565.description: An engram containing different customization options, including Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

3684471172.name: Pipeline Key
3684471172.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Pipeline location aboard the Leviathan.

3688234127.name: By Your Bootstraps
3688234127.description: Return to the Drifter to claim 21% Delirium.

3690882495.name: Legendary Infusion
3690882495.description: Select a piece of Legendary Gear to consume. That item will be used to infuse another item with power.

3693672882.name: Emotes
3693672882.description: Emotes occasionally unlocked when opening Bright Engrams.

3694103464.name: Mixing It Up Bundle
3694103464.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to bake it to the limit.

Contains the exclusive Baking Cookies emote, the Shower of Gifts transmat effect, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.

3694103465.name: Dawning's Genesis Bundle
3694103465.description:
A one-time bundle to celebrate the return of the Dawning.

Contains 5 Winterdrift Engrams, the Glad Tidings jumpship, the Dawning Ghost projection, and 250 Bright Dust.

3694103467.name: Dawning's Delight Bundle
3694103467.description:
A bundle for Guardians who wish the Dawning would never end.

Contains 3 Winterdrift Engrams, 5 Aniline Shock shaders, and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.

3696141218.name: Dark Chocolate Motes
3696141218.description: Deliver these tempting morsels to the Drifter in the Tower Bazaar.

3696508896.name: EDZ Engram
3696508896.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within the European Dead Zone.

3696608133.name: Titan Rewards
3696608133.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Sloane:

3704339233.name: Cradle Engram
3704339233.description: An engram with proprietary markers. Someone connected to Clovis Bray's networks should be able to decrypt it.

3708227201.name: Surrounded
3708227201.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.

3709694516.name: Crackshot
3709694516.description: Defeat enemies on Titan with headshots.

3712099029.name: Bright Engram
3712099029.description: A vibrant engram containing many different customization options. Return it to Tess Everis to reveal its contents.

3712380576.name: Thunk, Thunk, Boom
3712380576.description: Defeat enemies or Guardians with Grenade Launchers in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

3712380577.name: Up Close and Personal
3712380577.description: Defeat enemies or Guardians with Swords or Shotguns in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

3712380584.name: Block and Key
3712380584.description: Send Blockers against the enemy team in Gambit.

3712380587.name: The Big Haul
3712380587.description: Bank a large number of Motes in a single Gambit match.

3712380588.name: Overkill
3712380588.description: Get a shutout in a Gambit match by winning two rounds in a row.

3712380589.name: Teamwork
3712380589.description: As a fireteam, defeat enemy Guardians in Gambit.

3712380590.name: Primeval Slayer
3712380590.description: As a fireteam, defeat Primevals in Gambit.

3712380591.name: Raining Metal
3712380591.description: Defeat enemies or Guardians with Rocket Launchers in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

3713367945.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 5
3713367945.description:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

3713839994.name: Micro-Missile
3713839994.description: This weapon fires in a straight line and has a massively increased projectile speed.

3714540133.name: Masking Your Intent
3714540133.description: With a Festival of the Lost mask equipped, complete the challenge that Tess Everis has given you.

3715790138.name: Blade of Bergusia
3715790138.description: Tracks the number of Bergusia Forge ignitions completed.

3716816813.name: Catch!
3716816813.description: Land grenade final blows in the Crucible.

3717395988.name: Long Distance Plan
3717395988.description: Defeat enemies in strikes with any Sniper Rifle.

3721562488.name: Decrypted Cache Key
3721562488.description: A single-use cipher that unlocks a gift from Rasputin for helping with his experiments.

3721627275.name: Swap Mag
3721627275.description: Swap weapons much faster for a short duration after emptying the magazine.

3721881826.name: Purchase Dusklight Shards
3721881826.description:
A resource normally found in the EDZ and of interest to its residents. Sometimes used to upgrade gear.

The cost and availability change daily, so check back often.

3722990653.name: Armory Key
3722990653.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Armory location aboard the Leviathan.

3723014355.name: Brother Vance
3723014355.description: Return to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse.

3723531833.name: Burning Souls
3723531833.description: Dodging gives a small health and shield bump.

3723896048.name: Masked Hero
3723896048.description: Complete Heroic public events while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

3723896049.name: Masked Competition
3723896049.description: Complete a Crucible match while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

3723896056.name: The Nightmares' Nightmare
3723896056.description: Defeat Nightmares in the Haunted Forest.

3723896057.name: The Haunter
3723896057.description: Defeat enemies in the Haunted Forest.

3723896058.name: Forest Clearing
3723896058.description: Defeat enemies in the Haunted Forest with grenades.

3723896059.name: Hauntingly Accurate
3723896059.description: Defeat enemies in the Haunted Forest with precision damage.

3723896060.name: Prepare for Launch
3723896060.description: Defeat enemies in the Haunted Forest with a Grenade Launcher.

3723896061.name: Forest Fire
3723896061.description: Defeat enemies in the Haunted Forest with an Auto Rifle.

3723896062.name: Masked Mayhem
3723896062.description: Defeat other Guardians in the Crucible while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

3723896063.name: Masked Defender
3723896063.description: Defeat enemies anywhere in the system while wearing a Festival of the Lost mask.

3725791126.name: Armor
3725791126.description: Armor awarded during Festival of the Lost.

3727927441.name: Ghost Shells and Ships
3727927441.description: Ghost Shells and ships awarded during the Dawning.

3728290548.name: Middling Sentry Mote
3728290548.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Outlawed Sentry armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3728290549.name: Weak Sentry Mote
3728290549.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Illicit Sentry armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3728290551.name: Powerful Sentry Mote
3728290551.description:
A key to the Reckoning. If you succeed, your reward is one piece of Notorious Sentry armor.

Usable only near the Reckoning in the Haul.

3732622839.name: Burst Guard
3732622839.description: Sword Guard has low efficiency and high defense.

3734460516.name: Neverending
3734460516.description: Clear sections of the Infinite Forest.

3735714465.name: Iron Banner: Season 3
3735714465.description: Speak with Lord Saladin at the Iron Banner grounds beneath the Traveler.

3736652745.name: Vanilla Blades
3736652745.description: Combine the correct ingredients to bake this treat in Eva's Holiday Oven.

3737339918.name: Nessus Engram
3737339918.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Arcadian Valley of Nessus.

3738007406.name: The Verdant Forest
3738007406.description: Complete a run of the Verdant Forest.

3738388105.name: Destination Calibrated Frame
3738388105.description: Craft the destination weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

3741470853.name: Chicken-Sized Horn and Cape
3741470853.description: This outfit, made of the finest materials, is truly fit for a Colonel. Deliver it to Cayde in the Tower Hangar.

3742215016.name: Bomb Threat
3742215016.description:
You've extracted a number of keywords from your surveillance transcript that suggest, perhaps, the Drifter has planted explosives somewhere—but the Drifter's Gambit takes place throughout the solar system. They could be anywhere. You resolve to head up to the Derelict to begin your investigation. Maybe there's a clue there somewhere.

Enter the activity "Mystery and Potential" via the Gambit Director and search the Derelict for some kind of clue.

3745714096.name: WANTED: Hiraks' Familiar
3745714096.description: Begin your hunt in Siren's Watch on Titan.

3746952128.name: Encrypted Engram
3746952128.description: A rare engram with unusual markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of equipment.

3751354116.name: Shock Blast
3751354116.description: This weapon fires blasts of high-damage Arc energy that overpenetrates enemies.

3752885090.name: Letter Fragment
3752885090.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

3755070117.name: Payday
3755070117.description: Larger magazine. Increased accuracy when firing from the hip.

3758643336.name: Dreaming City Arsenal
3758643336.description: Complete 3 public events in the Dreaming City.

3758643337.name: Dreaming City Calibrated Frame
3758643337.description: Craft the Dreaming City weapon by completing any forge ignition activity.

3759858535.name: Scavenger: Cabal
3759858535.description: Improves rewards from eliminating Cabal enemies.

3763419925.name: Dawning's Gift Schematic: Sloane
3763419925.description:
The relentless spray of Titan's methane ocean can be exhausting for its defenders. Complete the following objectives:

- Defeat Hive Acolytes to collect their water-resistant skin
- Collect Datalattice from Nessus to create pseudo-organic algorithms

3768438372.name: Agile Bowstring
3768438372.description:
Durable yet light bowstring.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability

3771117564.name: Io Engram
3771117564.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Echo Mesa of Io.

3771134119.name: Prime Research
3771134119.description:
Keep spying on the Drifter for Aunor by playing his games. Drifter knows your true motivations, but he also needs Motes.

Bank Motes while playing Gambit or Gambit Prime.

3771709415.name: Conduit Key
3771709415.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Conduit location aboard the Leviathan.

3773198235.name: A Gift in Return
3773198235.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

3776970371.name: Drain Key
3776970371.description: Use this to open Calus's Gift at the Drain location aboard the Leviathan.

3777789414.name: The Jerky
3777789414.description: Coordinates to Golden Age salvage collected by the Fallen on Titan. Essential to the Drifter's new Gambit.

3777829357.name: Aeon Energy
3777829357.description:
Dodging grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Barricade energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.

3778574417.name: Heavyweight
3778574417.description: Get Power weapon multikills in a strike.

3780056901.name: Warmind Engram
3780056901.description: An engram containing items crafted by Rasputin.

3781205288.name: INVADER: Invading with Style
3781205288.description: Invader bounty. Rapidly defeat two opposing Guardians.

3781205290.name: INVADER: Invading with Power
3781205290.description: Invader bounty. Defeat Guardians with Power weapons in the Crucible.

3781205291.name: INVADER: Supercharged
3781205291.description: Invader bounty. Defeat Guardians with Super abilities in the Crucible.

3781205292.name: Invading the Hive
3781205292.description: Invader bounty. Defeat Hive Knights or Wizards on the Tangled Shore.

3781205293.name: Invading Infested Places
3781205293.description: Invader bounty. Complete heroic public events on Titan or the Tangled Shore.

3781205295.name: INVADER: Invading by Surprise
3781205295.description: Invader bounty. Defeat enemies from behind or without taking damage from them.

3782248531.name: Modulus Report
3782248531.description:
Recorded performance data employed by the Black Armory to expand their arsenal.

Used to buy weapon frames from Ada-1.

3784207446.name: Auto Rifle Scavenger
3784207446.description: Auto Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

3784800263.name: Vanguard Tactician Engram
3784800263.description: Contains a reward for your efforts aiding Zavala in eliminating prime targets.

3785594741.name: Crucible Effects
3785594741.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

3791013348.name: (Heroic) Arecibo
3791013348.description: Investigate a mysterious broadcast that only you and your Ghost can hear.

3791358445.name: Meditation: "A Garden World"
3791358445.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

3791769270.name: Broken Courier
3791769270.description: "One of my people is calling for evac. Got a minute?" —Petra Venj

3792590697.name: Confectionery Heart
3792590697.description:
A candy heart to keep your Bond sweet.

Acquired from Crimson bounties as well as match completions within the Crimson Days playlist.

3794435484.name: The Magician
3794435484.description: Collect metaphysical samples from defeated combatants on Io. Complete strike "The Pyramidion."

3795647179.name: New Pacific Arcology Armor
3795647179.description: Armor obtained by performing tasks for Sloane on Titan.

3796465595.name: Impact Casing
3796465595.description:
Increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability

3797779334.name: Dark Chocolate Motes
3797779334.description: Deliver these tempting morsels to the Drifter in the Tower Bazaar.

3798852852.name: Smart Drift Control
3798852852.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed

3801387947.name: Machine Gun Frame
3801387947.description:
Forge a Black Armory Machine Gun from this frame.

This frame is refunded for Modulus Reports on weekly reset.

3803357562.name: Minor Modifications
3803357562.description: Completing a weekly Hawthorne bounty awards mod components.

3803462520.name: Linear Fusion Dexterity
3803462520.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Linear Fusion Rifles.

3804749722.name: Pulse Rifle Targeting
3804749722.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Pulse Rifles.

3808901541.name: Viper Strike
3808901541.description: This emblem tracks lifetime precision kills in Gambit.

3809316345.name: Countermass
3809316345.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed

3813989326.name: Scatter Projectile Targeting
3813989326.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Auto Rifles, SMGs, Pulse Rifles, Sidearms, and Fusion Rifles.

3815698580.name: From the Mouths of Babes
3815698580.description: Complete Crucible Triumph "The Stuff of Myth."

3816548857.name: I'll Make You Rich(er)
3816548857.description: Send Blockers and complete Gambit matches. Grants Power 640 gear on completion.

3819100474.name: Another's Vengeance
3819100474.description: You can find this rare emblem once you reach a certain score in the Nightfall "The Hollowed Lair."

3820876489.name: Vanguard Valiant
3820876489.description: Grants a chance to receive an extra Vanguard token whenever you get one.

3821870046.name: (Heroic) Calling Them Home
3821870046.description: Hawthorne is broadcasting a message from the Farm to guide refugees there. Help her amplify it to reach the entire region.

3824621145.name: Auto Rifle Calibrated Frame
3824621145.description:
A calibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1.

Return to Ada-1 with the Radiant Matrix so she can prepare the frame for the final step, forging.

3827198035.name: Straight Fletching
3827198035.description:
Modern fletching for straight paths. 
  •  Increases accuracy

3827624774.name: Sniper Rifle Calibrated Frame
3827624774.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

3829523414.name: Luminous Planetary Engram
3829523414.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

3831705402.name: Gunsmith Rewards
3831705402.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Banshee-44:

3833616500.name: Io Engram
3833616500.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Echo Mesa of Io.

3841010419.name: Hephaestus (Heroic)
3841010419.description: Destroy dangerous information before it falls into the wrong hands.

3841268160.name: Vanguard Research Engram
3841268160.description: Contains a reward for your efforts assisting Ikora Rey with her research.

3841895008.name: Return to Hawthorne
3841895008.description: Speak with Hawthorne in the Tower.

3841895009.name: Progress Report
3841895009.description: Speak with Hawthorne in the Tower.

3841895010.name: Final Check-In
3841895010.description: Speak with Hawthorne in the Tower one last time.

3842267830.name: Classified
3842267830.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

3843317553.name: Classified
3843317553.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

3844225097.name: Insight Terminus
3844225097.description: This emblem tracks your high score for the Nightfall "Insight Terminus."

3845117254.name: Eliksni Birdseed
3845117254.description: Deliver this high-end falcon food to Hawthorne's falcon Louis in the Tower Bazaar.

3845731526.name: Spooky Shaders Pack
3845731526.description: This pack contains shaders that remind Guardians of the Festival of the Lost.

3849887370.name: Mods
3849887370.description: Transmat effects and Ghost projections found when you're opening Bright Engrams.

3850781558.name: Seed of Light
3850781558.description:
A manifestation of the Traveler's power, filled with potential.

This will unlock a new path in the subclass of your choice. This item is very rare, and using it consumes it.

3851482980.name: Nascent Dawn 1/5
3851482980.description: This module is attempting to sync to a telemetry network. Clovis Bray once had the "CB.NAV" system dedicated to collecting data for its Warminds, but it's currently fragmented beyond repair. Exposing it to the telemetry contained in Mars patrol beacons might allow the module to find what it's looking for.

3851482981.name: Nascent Dawn 1/5
3851482981.description: The patrol beacons have helped backfill some of the missing data, but there are some areas that Vanguard Scouts don't record for their handlers. Mapping at least one of these areas might allow the module to complete a full sync.

3851482982.name: Nascent Dawn 1/5
3851482982.description: You've collected enough Resonate Stems to compose an Override Frequency. These keys are a fundamental part of CB.NAV, and can access nodes for cached data. Each override is imprinted with specific telemetry data, and when you're approaching the correct node, it emits a signal for you to follow.

3851482983.name: Diary 1/5
3851482983.description: This module has combined with data from the node and unlocked a log belonging to "A.Bray." Take it to Ana for more information.

3856768043.name: Enhanced Shotgun Loader
3856768043.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Shotguns.

3861836061.name: Iron Banner: Season 2
3861836061.description: Complete 30 Iron Banner matches during Season 2.

3865257976.name: Dragonfly
3865257976.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.

3867153595.name: Ice and Shadow
3867153595.description: A friendly Guardian has requested assistance on Mars. Help her investigate falling Warsats and battle a new threat.

3867894145.name: Sunshine
3867894145.description: Get Solar ability kills on Mercury.

3868395919.name: Victory Enduring
3868395919.description: Xol has been defeated and Mars is saved. Return to Zavala for an update.

3868766766.name: Particle Repeater
3868766766.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability

3870590760.name: Null Taste
3870590760.description:
Between the light and the dark lies deliciousness.

Once selected, it will be consumed in the oven—so choose wisely!

3871703307.name: Stolen Black Armory Gear
3871703307.description:
A piece of Black Armory gear dropped by the Fallen.

Ada-1 should know about this.

3871870218.name: Titan Treasure Map
3871870218.description: "Reef Awoken are weird like that. She assured me it was a gold mine, so I went exploring. Check near some kind of generator machine thing, there should be one I haven't hit in years." —Cayde-6

3871870220.name: Titan Treasure Map
3871870220.description: "And just to amuse myself I would find natural x's in any environment and stash something somewhere beneath them, just to be able to say those words to myself… 'X marks the spot.'”

3871870221.name: Titan Treasure Map
3871870221.description: "Those Fallen on Titan. I've been after them for years. They ransacked an old trove I kept in the Sink on Venus, then went completely dark. Getting pings on one, but everyone who's been after it gets lost in the dark way down below." —Cayde-6

3871870222.name: Titan Treasure Map
3871870222.description: "You know what I used to love about my rest stops on Titan? Walking into the Arcology and thinking about it in its heyday. But then you get to thinking of how much we actually lost, and now the Hive just spawning everywhere… and the will to fight boils right back up." —Cayde-6

3871870223.name: Titan Treasure Map
3871870223.description: "We Exo must've had it made back in the Golden Age. Just my presence alone seems to bypass any active security measures in the Arcologies." —Cayde-6

3871884143.name: Disruption Break
3871884143.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.

3872241398.name: Arcology Engram
3872241398.description: Contains a reward for your efforts at the New Pacific Arcology on Titan.

3872722523.name: Sniper Rifle Calibrated Frame
3872722523.description: Collect Radiant Seeds by defeating powerful enemies.

3876745998.name: Nessus Engram
3876745998.description: Contains a reward for your efforts in the Arcadian Valley of Nessus.

3879752304.name: Legendary Engram
3879752304.description: An engram with complex markers. A Cryptarch should be able to decode this into a piece of powerful equipment.

3884127242.name: Dornröschen
3884127242.description: The weapon's laser overpenetrates enemies and refracts off hard surfaces.

3884317539.name: Notorious Engram
3884317539.description: An engram containing different customization options, including Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.

3884996325.name: Redrix's Claymore
3884996325.description: "On the ladder and in the fight, momentum is the answer."

3887892656.name: Voidwalker
3887892656.description: From the smallest atoms bloom the greatest explosions.

3890735265.name: Meditation: "Omega"
3890735265.description: Revisit this mission and reflect on its role in your recovery.

3893037510.name: For the Vanguard
3893037510.description: While completing Vanguard Strikes, defeat enemies with your abilities. Super kills are worth extra points.

3893300466.name: Floating Dance
3893300466.description: Victory feels so good, so dance!

3894015680.name: Look 'Em in the Eye
3894015680.description: Use any weapon to defeat enemies at close range in a strike.

3898454159.name: Tainted Artifact
3898454159.description: The Drifter wants to talk. Meet him in the Tower.

3899944893.name: Cataloguer
3899944893.description: This emblem tracks the total number of items you've added to your Collections.

3900642287.name: The Gateway
3900642287.description: The Vex stir on Mercury, and legendary outcast Osiris is involved. Head to the Lighthouse to investigate.

3900788300.name: A Gift in Return
3900788300.description:
Your hard work in baking a holiday treat for someone has been rewarded with this package of Dawning delights.

The package may contain Legendary gear, Enhancement Cores, mods, and materials.

3902390596.name: Lost Prophecy, Another Verse
3902390596.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3903548288.name: Glimmer
3903548288.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.

3905543891.name: Black Hole
3905543891.description: Second shot of a burst rips a hole through space-time, doing high damage and recoil with no falloff.

3906702045.name: The Chasm of Screams
3906702045.description:
While you were speaking to Tyra, she mentioned something called the Hated Path, a sort of primer to transform an ordinary Hand Cannon into a Thorn. Bathe your Light in horrors. Feed your weapon with death. Bind it with sickness. Horrors, death, sickness… that all sounds like the Hive nests on Titan to you.

Defeat the Arbiters, Sardav and Telesh, then defeat Savathûn's Song in an epic reprise of strike "Savathûn's Song" on Titan.

3907299874.name: New Tricks
3907299874.description: Improves Skip Grenade, and you gain an additional Skip Grenade charge. Skip Grenade returns energy when it damages enemies.

3909982964.name: Vicarious Exploration
3909982964.description: Acquire cache codes in Lost Sectors on Nessus.

3910640537.name: Scout Rifle Reserves
3910640537.description: Increases the amount of Scout Rifle ammo you can carry.

3911060637.name: Cache It In
3911060637.description: Loot the cache in the Methane Flush, a Lost Sector in Siren's Watch on Titan.

3912669572.name: Hive Larva
3912669572.description: Hive Larva obtained by defeated Hive with precision damage.

3913463509.name: Insectoid Robot Grenades
3913463509.description: This weapon's grenades are insectoid robots that chase targets and explode close to them.

3913600130.name: Whirlwind Blade
3913600130.description: Consecutive rapid sword strikes increase this weapon's damage output.

3915945113.name: Overcharge
3915945113.description: Land final blows using Energy weapons in the Crucible.

3917342622.name: Powerful Bow Frame
3917342622.description:
Forge a Black Armory Bow from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

3917450714.name: Textured Grip
3917450714.description:
The friction on this weapon's grip is particularly strong.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases stability

3921851413.name: Knife Trick
3921851413.description: How did you get Petra to teach you this?

3922324861.name: Nessus Rewards
3922324861.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Failsafe:

3922376908.name: Overcharge
3922376908.description: Land final blows using Energy weapons in the Crucible.

3923153487.name: Powerful Sniper Rifle Frame
3923153487.description:
Forge a Black Armory Sniper Rifle from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

3923650007.name: Concentrated Radiolarian Culture
3923650007.description: Use to charge certain Prophecy Tablets. Using on an incorrect Tablet will still consume this offering. Acquired from public events and chests.

3926508004.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 5
3926508004.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

3926860544.name: Ghost Effects
3926860544.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

3927963100.name: Cerebral Uplink
3927963100.description: Highlights priority targets and improves the regeneration speed of your grenade, melee, and Rift abilities.

3927963101.name: Abyssal Extractors
3927963101.description: Void-damage kills increase ability energy recharge rate.

3927963102.name: Actual Grandeur
3927963102.description: Provides additional damage resistance during Nova Bomb. Nova Bomb kills grant Super energy.

3927963103.name: Conduction Tines
3927963103.description: Arc ability kills increase the recharge rate of your Arc abilities and extend the duration of Stormtrance.

3929856859.name: Lost Crew
3929856859.description: Help Failsafe find two long-lost members of her crew.

3931192718.name: Recovered Memories
3931192718.description: Tracks number of completions for raid "Scourge of the Past."

3931192719.name: Scourge of Nothing
3931192719.description: Tracks number of completions for raid "Scourge of the Past."

3934366192.name: Critical Victory!
3934366192.description: Land five precision final blows and complete one Crucible match.

3934366193.name: To the Best of Your Abilities
3934366193.description: Land five melee or grenade final blows and complete one Crucible match.

3934366194.name: Dance and the Universe Dances with You
3934366194.description: Equip your favorite dance emote and show your moves all over the system.

3934366195.name: Walking the Beat
3934366195.description: Complete patrols all over the system.

3934366198.name: Just Super!
3934366198.description: Land three final blows with your Super and complete one Crucible match.

3935138332.name: Golden Age Engram
3935138332.description: This engram is gold inside and out, showing the wealth of that Age.

3935601127.name: Payback
3935601127.description: Land the final blow on the player who last defeated you in the Crucible.

3938115510.name: Impact Induction
3938115510.description: Causing damage with a melee attack reduces your grenade cooldown.

3939711411.name: FLASHPOINT: MERCURY: COMPLETE
3939711411.description: Visit Brother Vance for a reward.

3942839806.name: Rise to the Challenge
3942839806.description: Speak to Ikora in the Tower.

3942846147.name: 1AU
3942846147.description: The time has come to stop the Almighty. Board the ship, and shut down its annihilation weapon.

3946295144.name: Nope
3946295144.description: No way, no time, no how.

3948620423.name: The Crucible
3948620423.description: Return to Shaxx to collect your reward.

3951064360.name: Not Even the Darkness
3951064360.description: Enter the Infinite Forest in pursuit of Saint-14.

3952575122.name: Powerful Machine Gun Frame
3952575122.description:
Forge a Black Armory Machine Gun from this frame.

Forging this weapon will result in a powerful reward.

This frame is refunded for a Ballistics Log on weekly reset.

3953212968.name: Into the Fray
3953212968.description: Assist or land final blows in the Crucible. Ability final blows are worth extra points.

3955563185.name: Steadfast Engram
3955563185.description: A engram containing different customization options—including ornaments for Exotics found in Forsaken and Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess to reveal its contents.

3958460049.name: Don the Hat
3958460049.description: Different people celebrate in different ways.

3958726625.name: Calling Them Home
3958726625.description: Hawthorne is broadcasting a message from the Farm to guide refugees there. Help her amplify it to reach the entire region.

3960522253.name: Emotes
3960522253.description: Allows for the configuration of equipped emotes from your entire emote collection.

3961677637.name: A-void-ance Therapy
3961677637.description: Get Void kills while on Mars.

3962776530.name: Schmoradric Cube
3962776530.description: "Something tells me if we put a few items in here… ah, never mind. Might as well just take it back to Cayde." —Ghost

3965082101.name: The Warmind, Resurgent
3965082101.description:
A reward for reviving Rasputin and befriending Ana Bray.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary Sparrow, 5 shaders from Warmind, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.

3965366490.name: Comm Signal Booster
3965366490.description: Devrim Kay gave you this signal booster to bring to Hawthorne.

3968812011.name: Auto Rifle Alpha Frame
3968812011.description:
An uncalibrated Auto Rifle frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get multikills and defeat Cabal with Auto Rifles to start the calibration.

3970637031.name: Harbinger's Pulse
3970637031.description: Multikills with this weapon immediately reload your equipped Kinetic and Energy weapons from reserves.

3975312523.name: Submachine Gun Reserves
3975312523.description: Increases the amount of Submachine Gun ammo you can carry.

3977277090.name: The Bad News
3977277090.description: An encrypted list of nine different coordinates beyond the heliopause.

3977735242.name: Tracking Module
3977735242.description: Adds tracking capability to rockets. Locks onto targets when aiming down sights.

3979401449.name: Larceny
3979401449.description: Break into the Red Legion base and steal the personal shuttle of Thumos the no-longer-Unbroken.

3981050152.name: Tyra Karn
3981050152.description: Tyra — another Guardian who has lost her connection to the Light — has a warning about the Shard from your vision.

3981206730.name: Reformat Shader
3981206730.description: Generate a new random shader by combining components from other shaders.

3983457027.name: Aggressive Frame
3983457027.description: Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

3983568343.name: Basic Bow Frame
3983568343.description:
An uncalibrated weapon frame obtained from Ada-1. It's missing a charged Weapon Core.

- Recover a Weapon Core from a stolen Black Armory crate in Artifact's Edge or the Hallows on Nessus.
- Obtain Unstable Radiolaria from the Vex to charge the Weapon Core.

3985546802.name: Hail the Monarch
3985546802.description:
"Only a monarch can raise the City from these ashes." —Hideo, New Monarchy Executor

Once you pledge to a faction during this Faction Rally, you can no longer use the other two factions' emotes until this Rally ends.

3987308529.name: Vanguard Tactician Rewards
3987308529.description: Exchange these items for rewards from Zavala:

3990233964.name: Melted Hammer

4027863050.name: Queen's Wrath

4027863051.name: Queen's Wrath

Purchase The Jerky from Spider.

4141540845.description: You've recovered all the pages of Ives's journal, but the unique encryption on each page is uncrackable by conventional means. Amanda Holliday is reaching out to her network of associates and will contact you when she has any new developments.

It hums with potential.

- Fallen "Glimmer Extraction"

4209151772.name: Letter Fragment
4209151772.description: Torn Remnants from a Once-Kept Journal

4252280581.name: Vanguard Tactician Armor
4252280581.description: Armor obtained by carrying out special operations for Zavala.

4255886137.name: Power Weapon Loader
4255886137.description: Slightly increases reload speed of any equipped Power weapon.

4257821615.name: Lost Prophecy, Verse 6
4257821615.description: The Prophecy Tablet reacts to your deeds. Return it to Brother Vance in the Lighthouse on Mercury.

4258500190.name: Sentry +1
4258500190.description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

4258517136.name: Clan Rewards
4258517136.description: Go to Hawthorne and claim your rewards for helping your clan.

4259401308.name: Fitted Stock
4259401308.description:
This stock makes the weapon stable but heavy
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

4260536069.name: Timely Dance
4260536069.description: Adapting the power of the Vex.

4260904433.name: Radiant Auto Rifle Frame
4260904433.description: Craft the Black Armory Auto Rifle by completing a Volundr Forge ignition in EDZ.

4260919524.name: Mark 15 Lens
4260919524.description:
Ocular sights. Long zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range 
  •  Decreases handling speed

4260919525.name: Mark 10 Glass
4260919525.description:
Ocular sights. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

4263744734.name: Bow Alpha Frame
4263744734.description:
An uncalibrated Bow frame obtained from Ada-1.
Get precision kills and defeat Taken with Bows to start the calibration.

4264313515.name: A Frame Job
4264313515.description: Travel deep into enemy territory, ambush the Red Legion, and trick them into retaliating against the Fallen.

4265778716.name: Random Mod
4265778716.description: Purchase a random weapon or armor mod.

4267078158.name: Hidden Messages
4267078158.description:
Drifter has left a series of personal messages for you in the EDZ. Naturally, he won't tell you where you can find them…

Search the EDZ for the tapes Drifter left you. One tape can be found near computer consoles in each of the following patrol areas and Lost Sectors: Trostland, Skydock IV, Flooded Chasm, Soujourner's Camp, Excavation Site XII, Winding Cove, and Scavenger's Den.

4267945040.name: Full Auto Trigger System
4267945040.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

4276106296.name: Telescopic Zoom
4276106296.description: Get precision kills with Sniper Rifles in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

4276106297.name: Measure Once, Cut Once
4276106297.description: Get precision kills with Pulse Rifles or Bows in Gambit. Defeated Guardians are worth extra points.

4276106298.name: Crack Shot
4276106298.description: Get precision kills with Scout Rifles or Hand Cannons in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

4276106299.name: Zap-Happy
4276106299.description: Defeat enemies or Guardians with Fusion Rifles or Linear Fusion Rifles in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

4276106302.name: Backup Plan
4276106302.description: Defeat enemies or Guardians with Sidearms in Gambit. Guardians are worth extra points.

4276106303.name: Quickfire
4276106303.description: Rapidly defeat two or more enemies with Auto Rifles or Submachine Guns.

4282096169.name: Enhanced Rocket Launcher Dexterity
4282096169.description: Greatly increased ready and stow speed for Rocket Launchers.

4283856335.name: Waking Token of Xavoth
4283856335.description:
The worthy token of a slain Ogre, sworn enemy of Sjur Eido.

It hums with potential.

4285666432.name: Five of Swords
4285666432.description:
Is it a portent of victory, or warning of overconfidence?

Enables modifiers in Nightfall strikes. More challenging modifiers apply larger score multipliers.

4289096107.name: Scorn Slayer
4289096107.description: Grants additional rewards when you're defeating Scorn.

4291096740.name: Surveillance
4291096740.description:
"That's one to check off our bucket list," Ghost remarks dryly. "Let's see if the feed's working."

Return to the Tower Hangar terminal you used to author a message to Aunor. Activate the terminal to monitor the bugs you just planted.

4291096741.name: Wiretapping the Annex
4291096741.description:
Aunor wants you to bug Drifter's new haunt in the Annex. She believes that eavesdropping on Drifter remotely will yield valuable intel on his next move.

Find suitable locations in the Annex to plant audio surveillance devices.

4291263503.name: Strange Cookies
4291263503.description: Deliver these treats, whose will is clearly not their own, to Xûr wherever the Nine have wished him to be.

4291815766.name: Reveling Strike
4291815766.description: Complete a strike with Spring Fever modifier active.

4291815767.name: Spring Lightning
4291815767.description: Defeat combatants with Arc abilities in Gambit.

4291815768.name: Lightning Striker
4291815768.description: Defeat combatants with Arc abilities in strikes.

4291815769.name: Crucible Lightning
4291815769.description: Defeat opposing Guardians in the Crucible with Arc abilities.

4291815770.name: Verdant Explorer
4291815770.description: Clear branches in the Verdant Forest.

4291815771.name: Verdant Roar
4291815771.description: Defeat combatants in the Verdant Forest using grenades.

4291815772.name: Verdant Light
4291815772.description: Defeat combatants in the Verdant Forest with your Super.

4291815773.name: Verdant Hunt
4291815773.description: Defeat combatants in the Verdant Forest.

4291815774.name: Season of Lightning
4291815774.description: Use Arc abilities to defeat combatants across the system.

4291815775.name: Burst Lightning
4291815775.description: Use Arc Grenades to defeat combatants across the system.

4293195997.name: Cayde's Will
4293195997.description: To collect the biorhythmic data that Banshee needs to tune the Ace of Spades to your hand, defeat enemies and invaders with Hand Cannons in Gambit matches. Defeated invaders count more toward this quest step's progress.

4294212322.name: Imperial Engram
4294212322.description: Contains a reward for your efforts within Emperor Calus's Leviathan.

4294587094.name: Rasputin Key Fragment
4294587094.description: Ana Bray can probably piece these fragments together to make something useful.
